lirik:
1.Jahowa sihol pujionku, ai Ham do Naibata sitompa au.
Sai suruh Tonduy-Mu hu bangku, mangajar au mamuji goran-Mu.
Marhiteihitei Jesus AnakMu, ase dear dodingku hu Bamu.

2.Bai Anak-Mu bobahon ahu ase Bamu iboban au homa.
Sorapkon Tonduy-Mu hubangku, manogu au bai dalan na torsa.
Ase tongtong gok damei uhurhin, janah mesek mamuji Goran-Mu.

3.Sai holong atei-Mu Jahowa, papandei au mamuji Goran-Mu.
Sai ulang asal puas hata, ningon botul mamuji hu Bamu.
Ham Bapa, Anak pakon Tonduy-Mu, doskon najongjong au i lobei-Mu.

4.Tonggokku na lang tarpajojor, Tonduy Napansing patalarhon in
Au gabe anak-Mu goranon, Tonduy homa do mangkatahon in.
Ase ibagas Kristus Anak-Mu boi au mardilo Bapa hu Bamu.

5.Ai Tonduy-Mu do mangajarhon martonggo au domu bai rosuh-Mu
Sirsir do tong Ham manangihon tonggokku marhiteihon Anak-Mu
Ibagas Jesus jaloonku do, mardapot-dapot pasu-pasu-Mu.

6.Sonin ma au marolob-olob, marhamegahon malas uhurhin.
Ai ra do Ham mamparuhurhon, na husuhutkon hu Bamu ijin.
Pasu-pasu-Mu sai sirnip do in, lobih humbani panagamankin.

7.Ibagas Kristus au manean, ai pitah Ia hasiholankin.
Marhitei Jesus sai saud ma Amen, na hupindohon rapkon Tonduy in.
Hupuji Ham ronsi sadokahniin, ai Ham tumang do hamegahonkin.

1. Paturut Ham bennami, 0 Jesus holong-Mu
Ase ulang hanami, itipu munsuh- Mu

2. Palongkot Ham, o Tuhan, bannai hata-Mu in
ase roh tuahnami sadokah-dokah nin.

3. Sinondang-Mu patotap, ale Panondang in,
na kahou pe sai alop hun parlajangan in.

4. Paturut Ham bennami tongtong panumpak-Mu
paganda Ham bennami holongni atei-Mu.

5. Panjaga-Mu patotap bannai jabolon-Mu
ulang hanai tarolat ibahen munsuh-Mu.

6. Paturut Ham, o Tuhan, bannai bujur-Mu in
sonai ‘ge hatotapan padaoh Ham dousa in.

1. Hujon ma ho, ale tonduyhu, na horahan loheian tong.
Manjalo layak ni Tuhanku, pinasirsir-Ni in tongtong.
Ibere Jesus do daging-Ni marhitei-hitei ruti on.
Ibere do pakon daroh-Ni marhitei-hitei anggur on.

2. Age tongtong pe ari-ari daroh-Ni mangurasi au,
Anjaha seng marnamangadi, manogu hu lambung-Ni au;
Sihol au mangan parpadanan ni Jesus Kristus, Tuhankin.
Na padameihon partinggilan, na pasonangkon uhurhin.

3. Sai holong aitei-Mu, o Tuhan, timpaki au sadari on.
Ai hata-Mu do hidalankon mangankon parpadanan on.
In pe patorang Ham uhurhu mardingat dear layak-Mu;
In ma tinaron-Mu dousangku ibaen holong ni atei-Mu.

4. Patoguh Ham pangarapanku, na dob salosei dousangkin.
Marsijoloman ‘ge uhurhu bai daroh-Mu na durus in.
Sai roh ma ham, ale Tuhanku, marhitei parpadanan on.
Baen rumah-Mu totap uhurhu, Ham ma ompung ni au tongtong.

1. Na hun surga in, suruh tonduy-Mu
Ale Jesus Tuhan nami, ai sol ondoskon nami
Hu Bamu ijon dari nami on

2. Sadokani on namatoras do
Na mangkahui hanami, dob tardidi bei hanami
Bai Kuria-Mu pinapansing-Mu

3. Na maluah ma hanai on rombang
Humbai namatoras nami, gabe ondos ma bannami
Langkah nami on hulobeian on

4. Na maposo rap hanai on gonap
Sai urupi Ham hanami Jesus Kristus, Tuhannami
Ase sai tongtong hubujuron on

5. Holong atei-Mu, suan Hata-Mu
Masuk bani uhurnami, in ma pangguruan nami
Sai hombar hujin gabeinami in

6. Togu hanai on, bai na ngalut on
Ham ma irikkonon nami ronsi das bai ajalnami,
‘se masuk hujin bai na sonang in.

1. Ham tong-tong ihutkononku, Jesus sipagoluh ahu
Seng anjai tadingkononku, ham napaluahkon au
Humbai ganup dousangku, pakon humbai uhum in
Natong-tong habiaranku, ibaen pardousaonkin

2. Ai ija ma jumpahan ahu, sada Tuhan songon ham
Namanogu-nogu ahu bai nasonang songon Ham
Namanaron hamateian lao mangkopkop tonduy hin
Ase masuk au manean ugas sisurungan in

3. Atap aha pe namasa, malas uhur, pusok pe,
Jolomanku na maharga na marholong atei pe’
Ai sadokah au manggoluh, ‘ge dob bois bohalhon,
Ningon Ham, o Sipagoluh, pujionku sai tongtong.

4. Sai iankon Ham uhurhu, Jesus, bani Tonduy-Mu.
Ronsi ujung ni langkahku, ham, o Tuhan togu au.
Ia rotap pe hosahku, gombur pakon matangkin,
Jolom Ham tongtong tanganku, ronsi das hu surga in.

1. Martuah do hasoman na sajabu, marhasomankon Tuhan Jesus in
Na mangirikhon Jesus sai maradu, na so marholang na martonggo in
Ai sai tong do holong atei Ni Bani, manungkun rosuh ni uhur Ni in
Janah tongtong manungkun bai hataNi, ibaen ganupan parlahouni in.

2. Martuah ma naboru ‘ge dalahi, sisada uhur bani Jesus in.
Na rap marholong atei bai Tuhanni, na marujahon hatuahon in.
Niondoskonni holong ni atei-Ni hu bani halak na porsaya in,
In do hatengeran ni uhurni, barang sonaha pangandungan nin.

3. Martuah na satangga pangajari, bai dakdanakni ase tong bujur
Na so marparontian mamodahi, lao manonggohon haganup bujur
Hubani Jesus ase tong Tuhanni, ma masu-masu haganupan in
Janah ibere holong ni ateiNi, mambobanhonsi hu lambung-Ni in.

4. Martuah do ganupan na sajabu, na malas uhur tong ibagas Ham.
O Jesus, na rosuh mamasu-masu parholong atei in ibagas Ham.
Martuah ma tongon ganup sidea, age mardondon hasunsahan pe;
Ao sai iapoh ham tongtong sidea, ronsi itogu Ham hu rumah-Mu.

1. Jesus Naibata, sai bobahon Ham,
Hu Bamu ganup hanami, na tinobus-Mu ganupan.
Jolom Ham tongtong tangannami on.

2. Ia mas pe na sahit ope,
Ham patoguh uhurnami, ulang bungbang be hanami.
Pangandungan do dalan roh Bamu.

3. Roh pe na borit na sahit,
bai hasoman 'ge bannami, Ham patenger uhurnami;
Bai ujungni in Ham patoguh in.

4. Pambaennami bei bahen Ham tunei,
ia roh pe hasunsahan Ham ma, Jesus, palamlamkon.
Sonang use in tonduynami in.

1. Hanami na satangga on, ilobei-Mu, o Jesuskin
Ham ihutkonon nami
Ham ma ompungni hanai on, sadokah na marhosah in,
sai pasu Ham hanami
Ham ma Raja, ihutonkon pangguruan sisungkunan
Tong bai Hata-Mu, o Tuhan

2. Sai pasu-pasu hanai bei, Ham pasirsirhon bohal pe,
padaoh Ham hasombuhon
Horasi Ham angkula in, sai tuk ma baen Ham gogohni
sai tahan bani horja
Tolong, tolong, ase tong martenger uhurlah hanami
Ham ma Tuhan mangidopi

3. Rajai ham hanai tongtong, pasorap Ham bai uhurhon
gok damei uhurnami
Marhiteihitei Tonduy-Mu, iankon uhurnai ganup
patoguh Ham hanami
Daoh ma, daoh ma, partinggilan, humbennami haganupan
Damei ma jolomannami

1. Jesus Kristus do manobus, haganupan jolma on
Naniarsik ni sibolis, bai mulani ronsi on
Jesus Kristus do Rajanta, napagoluh hajojor

2. Sipujion do Tuhanta, ai holong atei-Ni in
Ihutonkon do Hata-Ni, ai idop uhur-Ni in
Bai pardousa na mananda, samborni uhurni in

3. Ondos ma Bamu tonduyhu, sai parorot Ham ma au
Ai na sunsah do uhurhu, anggo sai gok bangku au
Sai jamai Ham tong tanganku, ase ulang magou au

4. Sai landit tungkis dalanku, munsuh pe buei tongtong
Abatanni do langkahku, ase ulang au sonang
Pasaud Ham ma na hutuju, dalankin baen Ham torang

5. Ulang lopas Ham au magou, ai tinobus-Mu do au
Sai taluhon Ham pangagou, ‘se hu lambung-Mu ma au
Das hu ujung au pamonang, das baen Ham hu surga au.

1. Irikkon nasiam ma Au, sonai nini Tuhanta
Sai parnalang ma dirimu, Hatangku malah harga.
Sai mambur bahenlah ganup, parlahoumin na so talup.

2. Au do palihar dalanmin, na dompak hagoluhan.
Ai seng be kahou langkahmin, daoh pakon hamagouan.
Au parhiteian na bujur, bai hasonangan na botul.

3. Hupatuduhkon dalan in, sisimbilonkonnima,
Ganup geduk in uhurumin sipaubahonnima;
'Seng tong pansing ma tonduymin, ronsi rotapni hosahmin.

4. Na toruh uhur do Au on, sai tong holong ateiHu.
Lamlam uhurHu, ai tongtong lamlam homa HatangKu,
Tongtong hutatap Naibata, ai pe Au on ihutkon ma.

5. Seng na tarbaen hanami in, ipingkir uhurnima;
Ulang mabiar halaniin, Au do hasomannima.
TaluhononKu munsuh in, tenger uhurmu pasal in.

6. Na manghargahon hasohniin , in do mansedahonsi;
Sagala na marnalang in, in do pagoluhkonsi.
Na so mamorsan silang in, na so talup be Bangku in

7. Marmogah-mogah hita bei, lao mangihutkon Jesus.
dagingta 'ge tonduyta pe, tulakhon lah bai Jesus;
Ai na mangengkar Tuhan in, seng dapot hasonangan in.

1. Sanggah holong tong Tuhanta, na mangidah hita on
Imbang hita ma dirinta tanda jora hita on.

2. Sai tundali na madorsa, sai dompakkon Naibata,
Tanda na tongon porsaya ho bai Tuhan Naibata.

3. Ia dalan hagoluhan, na sompit turnang do in.
Ulang ma ho marnasogan, tong jaga bai munsuh in.

4. Anggo dalan hamagouan na bolag tumang do in;
Hu bai apuy do iboan na mardalan in hujin.

5. Tenger uhurmin manlawan, imbang dousamin gogoh,
Ase ulang ho tartaban, janah surut lehleh ho.

6. Sai martonggo ulang holang, ase tambah gogohmin,
Janah sai tongtong ho sirang humbai ganup munsuhmin.

7. Ulang sai kawah-kawahkon arta na i tanoh on;
Jaga uhurmin, tamparhon uhurni dunia on.

8. Hisapmin tongtong ampogi, sai taluhon dagingmin;
Ase ulang irajai hadousaon uhurmin,

9. Sai ganupan ma papoltik na hinamonangkonmin,
Ulang mosor be manggulmit, ai harga tumang do in.

10. Anggo domma ho dapotan, ulang parlanseihon in,
Seng ope das bai tujuan tonduymin hu surga in.

11. Haganup na bujur uhur mangihutkon Jesus in,
Sai ilawan na masambor ronsi rotap hosahnin.

12. Dirimin do munsuhnima pakon sipangagou in.
Anggo hagoluhannima, in ma Tuhan Jesus in.

1. Batu gingging Ham tongon, huondoskon tonduyhon.
Burihanni daroh-Mu, na roh humbai lambung-Mu
Napaluah au do in, humbani pardousaonkin.

2. Na nidok ni titah in, mahol mandalankon in.
Halak na ringgas botul, pala tangissol bujur.
Na dong sasap dousain, halani pitah sonin,

3. In pe misir mando au, lao hu dolog Golgata.
Bani hayu silang-Mu, ale Jesus Tuhankin!
Ulang tulak Ham hunjin, au na pusok uhur in.

4. Ai sadokah au ijon, barang rotap hosahkon.
Lao dohor pe ajalhin, bani paruhuman in;
Batu gingging Ham tongon, sai Bamu rna tonduyhon.

1. Na ijon do au Tuhanku namanombah hu Bamu
Ganup iluh ni matangku, hu sombahkon hu Bamu.
Uhur-Mu mando hubangku, na masihol au Bamu.

2. Pardimata Ham uhurhu, rajai Ham ma diringkon
Ham do tong pangarapanku, sipagoluh tonduyhon
Uhur-Mu na mando bangku, bangku Ham Bamu au on.

3. Holong atei-Mu hubangku, in hupindo hu Bamu
Sibereon-Mu Tuhanku, bai sijalo Hata-Mu.
Uhur-Mu ma lah hubangku, pasaud Ham ma Hata-Mu.

4. Ham do mata ni aringku, sipamalas uhurhin.
Na masihol do tonduyhu hu Bamu, o Jesuskin.
Uhur-Mu ma lah hubangku, ase sabou uhurhin.

5. Sai tangihon, itangiskon uhurhon sombuhni in.
Sai tangihon, itangiskon tonduyhon siholni in.
Uhur-Mu ma bai uhurhu, sai Bamu ma tonduyhon.
6. Habayakon, halilian, uhur ni dunia on
in do gabe parsahitan, na parah bai uhurhon.
Ham ma lah hinasiholan, hutundalhon tanoh on.

1. Payah ai tungkis tumang dalan hu nagori atas.
Tapi martuah tumang halak na ijin mamontas.
Mangirikkon Jesus in, torus hu ujungni in.

2. Upah sibanggalan in dapot na bujur uhurni.
Na mangimbang dousa in pakon hisap nidagingni,
Pitah holong-Mu do in, boi manasap dousangkin.

3. Ai sab daroh na hinan, na gantung bani parsilang.
Ihirahon do hinan upah na marhasurungan.
Non ijia hata-Nin :”Domma gonap horjangkin,”

4. Tuhan Jesus togu Ham hanai bala-Mu ganupan.
Ase hu parayak Ham, ai Bamu do haliharon.
Dob pe tanggal daging in, dapot hasonangan in.

5. Sai tenger ma uhurmin, na mangimbang hisapnima!
Ingat Jesus na dob in, manggalari dousanima.
Ai marhitei Jesus in dapot hasonangan in.

1. Sai mulak, sai mulak na mardagang do ho!
Ai daoh ho nuan, sirang do tuah min.
O pardagang ou! Mulak! Mulak ma ho!
Mulak! Mulak ma ho!

2. Sai mulak, sai mulak, na sininta dokah!
Sai datei uhurmu, ai buei dousamu.
O pardagang ou! Mulak! Mulak ma ho!
Mulak! Mulak ma ho!

3. Sai mulak, sai mulak, ho hun siou nadaoh!
Hadoyuokon do in, dageionmu ijin.
O pardagang ou! Mulak! Mulak ma ho!
Mulak! Mulak ma ho!

4. Sai mulak, sai mulak, ai na sonang ma ho.
Sahei ma dousamu, dapot pinintamu.
O pardagang ou! Mulak! Mulak ma ho!
Mulak! Mulak ma ho!

1. Sai bujur ma ho mangimbang hajahatonmin ganup
Taram sogop uhur holong ni Tuhanta in bamu.

2. Imbang, ai haru do dalan, na sornpit bahalni in;
Tadin g do bai hamagouan, na so lao hu surga in.

3. Imbang, ase tong maringgas pabulatkon uhurmin.
Bai Tuhanta Jesus Kristus; Sai tundalhon dousa in.

4. Sai gomosi partonggoan bai Tuhanta Jesus in.
Ulang ho marparsaranan bornin ‘ge arian in.

5. Ia monang ho sahali mantaluhon dousa in.
Ulang ho marnamangadi, jaga hasomanni in.

6. Ai sadokah marianan i dunia on ope .
Na so holang do jagaon dousa, uhur, daging pe.

judul: Asal Rap Ampakon Tuhan Jesus Au
lirik:
1. Asal rap ampakon Tuhan Jesus au.
Sadokahni mangiankon tanoh hasusahan au.
Sonang do uhurhu, ai hubotoh Jesus hasomanku.

2.Anggo Tuhan Jesus hasomanku tong
Bahenonku do maporus sigompangi tonduyhon.
Sai martuah diri, anggo Jesus do hasoman diri.

3.Sonang do uhurhu rapkon Jesus in.
Ai isasap do dousangku, ipatorang langkahkin.
Ase ulang magou tonduyhin bahenon ni pangagou.

1. Gopas parugasnima ganupan balani,
Tuhanta Jesus Kristus hu parmusuhan in.
Ai seng tarbaen lang monang manlawan malah ho;
Ai munsuh ni Tuhanta maningon talu do.

2. Tangihon pandilo-Ni hu parmusuhan in;
Irikkon ma hata-Ni mangimbang dousa in.
Tuhanmu hasomanmu manahan munsuh in.
Tongtong sai hatengerhon Tuhanta Jesus in.

3. Seng dong tarpangajamhon pargogoh diri da.
Ai seng dong in margagan anggo bai Naibata.
Ai sihol bereon-Ni do bam sinjata-Nin.
Ai seng tarbaen lang talu munsuhmu baenon-Nin.

4. Taronkon rahahan da, iparsahitan in.
Podas do in marpunsa ibaen Tuhanta in.
Ibere do gogohmu hu bam manaron in.
Ibaen ma ho gamot-Ni bai harajaon-Nin.

1. Sadokah ho i tanoh on papintor uhurmin
Padingat-dingat ma tongtong nidok ni Tuhanmin

2. Sai songon hayu dear ho ramos parbuahniin
Bulung ni pe tabun homa usihi ma sonin

3. Buei do hadearon ni bah tubuh in tongtong
Pausih dirimin hujin baen uhurmin sintong

4. Ambungkon humbai uhurmin na so margagan in
Ganup na humbai Tuhan in ramot ma jaga in

5. Sai tiru Tuhan Jesus in na roh mangkopkop ho
Pambaen-Ni ge hata-Ni in hagoluhanmu do

6. Ai Ia do padomu ho hu bani Naibata
Daroh-Ni iduruskon do i dolog Golgata

7. Harga do hita haganup itobus Jesus in
‘Se sonang hita haganup i lobei-lobei-Nin

8. Halani ai sai ringgas bei mangimbang dousa in
Ganup na hagoluhkon bei na humbai Tuhan in

judul: Na Monang in Do Da Use Mangankon
lirik:
1. Na monang in do da use mangankon buah ni hayu hagoluhan in.
Lang boi be idahonni hamagouan ‘ge hamateian paduahon in.
Ai Naibatani hatundalanni mambaen langkahni tongtong torang.
mambaen langkahni tongtong torang.

2. Na monang in da seng boi be kahuan, ni hamateian paduahon in.
Sai jongjong do tong ia mangadapkon, bohing-Ku i nagori atas in.
Sai diahonni ijin Tuhanni, ‘ge hasomanni na monang in.
‘ge hasomanni na monang in.

3. Na monang ini do bereon-Ku mangan, i surga, manna na ponop ope;
ai parlahouni do tongtong ingaton, margoran na bayu homa use;
na sinuratkon bai batu intan, tongtong martuah sijalo in.
tongtong martuah sijalo in.

4. Na monang in mangidah pambahenan-Ku, in ma na marmahani bangsa in;
Ai huondososkon deba kuasang-Ku, bai tangan ni ganup na monang in;
Sai ropukon-Ni ijin imbang-Ni, patundukon-Ni do musuhkin.
patundukon-Ni do musuhkin.

5. Na monang in do da na manjalo hiou, na putih i nagori atas in
Goran-Ni on do na so bulih magou, humbai pustaha hagoluhan in
Tarsingatan-Ku bai Naibatang-Ku, ganup hasoman na monang in
ganup hasoman na monang in

i rumah in tongtong Ia marian, manjujung Goranni Jahowa in
Uhirhonon-Ku hujin Goran-Ku, sijujungonni i surga in
sijujungonni i surga in

Saporti Au ilambungni Bapang-Ku, marrupei do bai hasonangan in
Ai na marsaran bai hasonangan, ganup na monang, na bujur in,
ganup na monang, na bujur in

Dunia on, sibolis pakon daging, sai tong manarik au bai dousa in

bai iananku i surga in

Ia do na pasonangkon au

anggo rapkon Jesus in au lao
anggo rapkon Jesus in au lao.

anggo sai iiring Jesus au.
Hu nagori atas pe sai torus,
do boanon ni Tuhanku au,
do boanon ni Tuhanku au.

Jesus do hasomankin tongtong .
Sai sora-Ni do tongtong hu bogei ,
pasonangkon au na marsik on,

arta pakon hagoluhankin;

hu ondoskon hu tangan-Ni in,

malas uhur mangirik kon in;
Seng tagamon sunsah be uhurhu,
rapkon Tuhankin i surga in,
rapkon Tuhankin i surga in.

1. Tuhan Jesus Siparmahan ganup biri-biri do.
Jesus gok Bamu uhurhu, sai irikkononku Ham

Anggo bokas-Mu hu tonggor, sai irikkononku Ham,

Janah Ham homa manogu, ganup jolma roh Bamu,
ganup jolma roh Bamu, ganup jolma roh Bamu.

1. Bintang Pambobai Batu Gingging in

Ruti hagoluhan bah na torsuk in
Alat situjuan in ma Jesus in.
Alat situjuan in ma Jesus in.

2. Ham tongon gogohku, pangajamankin,
damei ni uhur-Mu, hasonangankin

in ma alo Tuhan; Ham tumang do in.

ai tor humbai ise gogoh lao hujin?

Holong niarapkon; ham do Jesuskin.

1. O Jesus Panondang i dunia on
Mulani na torang tangar hatangkon
Sai holong atei-Mu bai pardousa on
Ham ma mangapohi namarhoru on

2. Sasap Ham dousangku ale Tuhankin
halani daroh-Mu na madurus in
Ulang lang uhurhu lanjar soh Bamu
halani sahit-Mu pakon daroh-Mu.

3. Tonduy, daging uhur ampa gogoh nin,
Ulang bai na sambor, sai Bamu ma in!
Ningon gok Bamu ma au hinopkop-Mu.
Ase saud martuah au jabolon-Mu.

1. Sai hinsah, sai gogoh, sai hinsah mardalan ho.
Sion hu nagori atas, tongkin pe ho ulang soh.
Suluhmin baen marsinalsal! Bai na lihar in mardalan ho.
Sai hinsah, sai gogoh.

2. Taron ma, ho Sion, taron na masahit in;
Hata-hata parlajouan, ulang habiari in.
Tatap rudang hagoluhan! Bai parroh ni hasunsahan in.
Taron ma, taron ma.

3. Tundal ma, tundal ma, tundal ma dunia on;
Hasangapon iparbagah, ulang tatap tanoh on.
Ulang sombah begu-begu! Halilian na binaenni in.
Tundal in, tundal in.

4. Uji ma, uji ma. Sion uji tonduy in,
na tongtong mangojur-ojur ho mambahen dousa in.
Sai suhutkon bai Tuhan-mu! Na pintor atap geduk pe in.
Uji ma, uji ma.

5. Torus baen, torus baen, Sion torus uhurmu.
Mamingkiri hasonangan binahen ni Naibata.
Sai simbili hamagouan, Sion sai timbangi dalanmin.
Torus baen, torus baen.

6. Pakei ma, pakei ma, pakei gogohmin ganup.
Patidakkon na marholong, uhurmin bai Jesus in.
Na marsinta ho, o Sion, mangirikkon ganup Hata in.
Pakei ma, gogohmin.

7. Golom ma, golom ma, Sion golom bujurmin.
Sai tongtong ma ho margogoh lao mangimbang munsuhmin.
Seng daoh be ho hun surga, asal monang bai ujungni in.
Bujurmin, golom in!

1. Jesus goluhni Tonduyhu, ham do haporusankin.
Anggo tumpu bai tonduyhu bolis pakon setan in.

2. Jolom au Jesus Tuhanku, jolom au sai tongtong.
Ulang sirpang be naiheihu humbai dalan na sintong.

3. Bai musim ni haba-haba pinaroh ni musuhkin,
Togu au das hu labah bani parsaranan in.

4. Sai dingdingi Ham o Tuhan, au na sihol roh bamu.
Sa papodas pagoluhkon, se na ondos hu Bamu.

5. Lang adong be hagoluhan, anggo seng na hun Bamu.
Ganup jolma, ale Tuhan, sai manombah hu bamu.

1. Na martuah nini Jesus, na sombuh tonduyni in;
Ai langkahni do na torus hu nagori atas in.
Sai na sonang uhurni na manggolom Hata in.

2. Na marhoru pe tarbahen gabe sonang uhurnin;
Ai horuni in mabahen roh na mangapohi in.
Sai na sonang uhurni ganup na iapoh in.

3. Na martuah hataonkon na lamlam maruhur in;
Ai sidea do manean ganup na i tanoh in.
Sai na sonang uhur ni na mangampog ringis in.

4. Barang ise na horahan bani hapintoron in,
na martuah do sidea, ai tongon do jumpah in.
Sai na sonang uhur ni na marhapintoron in.

5. Ise na marholong atei, nin Tuhan Jesus in.
Na sonin do na marrupei balos ni holongni in.
Sai na sonang uhur ni na maridop uhur in.

6. Halak paruhur na pitah, na so saor bai dousa in.
In do tarbaen mangidah Bapa na Mapansing in.
Sai na sonang uhur ni, sisimbili dousa in.

7. Halak na manuan damei, in ihira Naibata.
Gabe anak do sidea sada pakon Naibata.
Sai na sonang uhur ni, na mambahen damei in.

8. Pakon halak na binuru iben hapintoron in.
Sipujion, ai marguru bai doyukni upahniin.
I nagori atas in mulgap ma tuahni in.

1. Hu nagori atas do pardalanta in.
Ganup na pininta lo dapot ma ijin
Anggo ijon mubah-ubah do ganup,
seng sadiha na talup, i tanoh on.

2. Hu nagori atas in sai na tonggor bei,
bai siang ni ari in age borngin pe.
Botul baen in sai martonggo ho gogoh.
‘se marulih homa ho bai Jesus in.

3. Hu nagori atas in tonggor ma tongtong.
Anggo dong na hurangmin i dunia on.
Lang bulih be bumbang uhurmin ijin;
Ai sirsir do haganup bai Naibata.

4. Hu nagori atas in laho do ganup,
halak na porsaya in bai Tuhanta rup.
Ihutkon in, imbang sipangagou in,
‘ge borit parkorhonnin, tongkin do in.

5. Hu nagori atas in lao Tuhanta in,
humbai hangaluton in tinaron-Ni in.
Irikkon ma, humbai hatoruhon in,
dalan lao hu surga in bai Naibata.

6. Hu nagori atas in lao ma hujin;
Gari hamateian in parhiteian do.
Ididah ho ujung nidalanta in,
rumah ni Bapanta in i surga in.

7. I nagori atas in hasonangan in;
Rap mandoding ma ijin na porsaya in.
Haleluya! In do ilolobkon bei!
Bai Jesus parmonang in. Haleluya!

1. O Tuhan pareksa ham au sondangi uhurhu tangkas.
Ai seng dong margogoh be au.
Bamu au paringgas, Bamu au padonok, Bamu mando au.
Bamu au paringgas, Bamu au padonok, Bamu mando au.

2. Huja ma marguna be in, age pe marnah ringgit au?
Ibabou hasusurankin,
Ham Jesus artangku, hujai do siholhu, sonang uhurhin,
Ham Jesus artangku, hujai do siholhu, sonang uhurhin,

3. Ganup huondoskon Bamu, ai Ham do ompung ni hinan,
Tongtong huondoskon bamu,
ai Ham do, o Jesus, sihopkop ganupan, gok bamu au on.
ai Ham do, o Jesus, sihopkop ganupan, gok bamu au on.

4. Hujamah tangan-Mu tongtong, dalanku pe torang, sonang.
Sabou ma tongtong uhurhon,
ai ham Sipargogoh, ai Ham sipargoluh, pagoluh ham au.
ai ham Sipargogoh, ai Ham sipargoluh, pagoluh ham au.

5. Ipuji uhurhu do tong Ham Jesus, hasomanku tong;
Gogohku ham mando tongon,
sai gok ma uhurhu, mamuji goran-Mu, hupuji bujur.
sai gok ma uhurhu, mamuji goran-Mu, hupuji bujur.

6. Bamu ma Tuhanku au lao, dob bois bohalhu ijon.
Pargogoh, parlayak do Ham,
parorot, urupi, sai tong hasomani, sai togu au on.
parorot, urupi, sai tong hasomani, sai togu au on.

1. Binsar ma , binsar ma, marsinondang ma;
haliharon ran hun babou, lao pagoluh na itanoh;
hanai on ganup, hanai on ganup.

2. Ngalut ni goluhkin sitarononkin.
Parsahitan, halojaon,
do rupeimu hajolmaon,
na itanoh on, na i tanoh on.

3. Tuhankin, tuah ni hajolmaon in,
Ham ma baen hatudalanku,
Ham tongtong pangarapanku,
Jesus goran-Mu hatengerankin.

4. Torih ma rupeimin, seng marsibar in.
Ulang ho itoroh longkot,
ulang rupeimin lao surut!
Tuju goluhmin, na ibaboi in.

1. Dear ni in panogu-Mu Jahowa,
bani ganup na pinarmahan-Mu
Seng anjai roh bahenon-Mu na dorsa
Seng tarponopkon Ham be bujur-Mu
Gati suhar do pambahenan-Mu
Bai uhurni na so mananda Ham
Hape halani in marrohan bei
Bai haliharon na tinobus-Mu

2. Ai mintor ra Tonduy-Mu mangirikkon,
bai titah na binaen ni jolma in?
Ham na tongtong tarlobih in maruhur,
sai sura-sura-Mu do saud in.
Sai talu do na pag mangimbang Ham,
age ganup marbois gogoh in;
Ai Ham do na so halompouan in,
maningon saud do sura-sura-Mu.

3. Iimbang Ham do na jungkat maruhur,
na gijang uhur ipatoruh Ham.
Tapi ganup na martoruh ni uhur,
in do na tong ihaholongi Ham.
Parhata na gogoh i tanoh on,
tongtong ihagigihon uhur-Mu.
Bai na sombuh maidop uhur-Mu,
sai sihol in tongtong urupan-Mu.

4. O Tuhan, sai na puji ma goran-Mu,
ai ipagoluh Ham do hanai on!
Tandaon nami ma pambahenan-Mu,
dob ipalihar Ham panonggor on.
O Naibata, holong ma uhur-Mu,
manogu hanai na ngalutan on.
Holong ma atei-Mu bannami on,
‘se ondos hu Bamu bahenon-Mu.

5. Jahowa, sai pasabou Ham uhurhu,
mangkamalaskon na binahen-Mu.
Ajari au, patorang Ham langkahku,
lao mangayaki Ham hu surga-Mu.
Sai ulang lopas Ham be kahou au,
pasorap Tonduy-Mu bai uhurhon.
Mangiring-iring au i tanoh on,
ronsi na ondos au hu lambung-Mu.

1. Jahowa Siparmahan au, aha pe lang hurangni.
Na sambor pe sai ipadaon, do humbai pinahan-Ni
Tudu ibaen na lambut in, lao pagoluhkon tonduyhin.
Ibaen holong atei-Ni.

2. Itogu au bai na lihou, bah tubuh hagoluhan.
Ibaen do tonduyhin siou, bai dalan hasonangan.
Sonang do uhur hin tongtong, sadokah au itanoh on,
pasangapkon goran-Ni.

3. Itanoh hamateian pe seng pala habiaran.
Ai isondangi do hape sonang do au mardalan.
Simambu pakon tungkot-Mu do pasonangkon uhur hin,
Hal do sijolomanku.

4. Sirsir ibaen Ham meja in i lobei ni matangku.
Lao mandompakkon musuhkin na so habiaranku;
Ulungku pe marminak do panginumanku sirnib do,
panumpak-Mu do bangku.

5. Tongtong do hinalayak-Mu rupeihu bai goluhku.
Holong ni atei-Mu tudu mangirikkon langkahku.
Jadi dob bois bohalhin, sai iananku rumah-Mu,
sadokah ni dokahni.

1. O Jesus na Pagoluh au, Anak ni Naibata.
Holong atei-Mu togu au, ondos bai Naibata.

2. Tongon sonang do uhurhin mardingat layak-Mu;
Ai Ham do hagoluhankin bani parmatei-Mu.

3. Anggo domma manosal au halani dousakin,
iipuk daroh-Mu do au anggo hudingat in.

4. Ibuat Ham do horungkin papuho uhurhon,
na sonang au halani in, bai hasombuhonkon.

5. Hutanom mando uhurhin hubagas uhur-Mu,
sonang ma au halani in, au pinagoluh-Mu.

6. Huhatengerhon hata-Mu, ai na sintong do in;
Hudingat bagah-bagah-Mu na so ubahon in.

7. O Jesus, Ham do huankin, sai gok bamu ma au;
Ai Ham do hagoluhankin age lao matei au.

8. Ihasiholi uhurhin au sol ianan-Mu;
Ai pe urasi tonduyhin, papansing Ham ma au.

judul: Ai Jumpah Au na Holong Atei
lirik:
1. Ai jumpah au na holong atei, au na tarbuang in hinan.
Jesus Tuhan parholong atei hubangku na kahou hinan.
Nuan hutanda Tuhankin, parholong atei banggal in,
parholong atei banggal in.

2. Halani buei ni dousangku, sai hona uhum au tama;
Hape roh Jesus ipadomu au use pakon Naibata.
Madurus do daroh-Ni in, mambahen pardomuan in,
mambahen pardomuan in.

3. Ai holong ni atei do hansa sipangusagahonkon in.
Sipujionku do Jahowa dob roh na papangkeihon in.
Tongtong malas do uhurhin, mamuji holong atei in.
mamuji holong atei in.

4. Ai anggo in seng taragouhon baenon ni na itanoh on.
Sai holong-Mu huunsagahokon, bani tonggoku pe tongtong.
Totap uhurhu matei pe, mardingat layak-Mu hape,
mardingat layak-Mu hape.

5. Ai pe, ale Tuhan Jahowa, ulang be buat holong-Mu.
Boan ma au, alo Naibata, dob matei au hu lambung-Mu.
Sai malas uhurhin ijin, mamuji holong atei in,
mamuji holong atei in.

1. Sai jolom Ham tangan ku, sai togu au
Ronsi rotap hosahku, parorot au;
Na dong au ra mardalan, sahalak au
Sai Ham ma ale Tuhan manogu au

2. Baluti Ham uhurhu na horu in.
Bai holong na tarsulur na banggal in.
Sai sasap Ham dousangku, ale Tuhan.
Sai gok Bamu uhurhu hunjon hujan.

3. Ai anggo hasunsahan, buei do in
Sonai pe pangahapan, sonang do in
Age golap huidah i tanoh on
torang do marpangidah bai uhurhon.

4. Bai jampal-Mu o Tuhan, i lobei-Mu.
Paturut Ham marsaran jabolon-Mu.
Pitpit hubaen matangku manjolom Ham.
Ai sonang do uhurhu na rongkon Ham.

5. Sal jolom Ham tanganku, sai togu au.
Ronsi rotap hosahku jagai Ham au.
Patorang Ham langkahku hu surga in.
Ham ma patunggungonku tongtong ijin.

1. Ai domma jumpah au ondolan ni tonduyhin na magou on
Daroh ni Jesus do manahan sadokah ni dokah ni in.
Maseda pe dunia on, tongtong togap ondolan on.

2. Ai ipaherbang do tangan-Ni lao mangalehon jolma on.
Halani holongni atei-Ni bai hita sindunia on
Na roh ampakon na so roh, ganup sol toguon-Ni do.

3. Ulang maseda hajolmaon, ninuhur ni Jahowa in;
Isuruh do bai hajolmaon, Anakni Sipagoluh in.
Sai ihartuki Hata-Niin do labah ni uhurta in.

4. Domma mogap ganup dousanta bai darohni Tuhanta in.
Ai anggo porsaya do hita seng bulih hona uhum in.
Ibaen hata ni daroh in na mangkahui jolma in.

5. Halani ai unobkonon ma dousangku bai paridian in.
Hupasasapkon ma dousangku bai Jesus Sipagoluh in.
Anggo manolsol diri au bai Jesuskin tongtong au lao.

6. Ondolan on ma iananku, sadokah au itanoh on.
Sai in ma hagoluhkononku paima rotap hosahkon.
Tongtong do sipujionkin Tuhanku, Sipagoluh in.

1. Hosah-Ni do binerehonni Tuhan Jesus in,
manobus hita on iben layak-Ni in.
I dolok Golgata; igalar do utangta in bai Tuhan Naibata
Bai Tuhan Naibata.

2. Sai timbang ma holong-Ni in hubam pardousa in;
Papakei pangkopkop-Ni in na patandahon in.
Ai pe paubah uhurmin, tangihon Jesus in;
Sai hagigihon dousamin, ‘ge hadorsaonmin,
ge hadorsaonmin.

3. Sai antan ma masahit in itaron Jesus in.
Anjaha parulihkon in baen hagoluhanmin.
Onsdoskon ganup dousamin bai Jesus Tuhanmin.
Pasonangon-Ni tonduymin, lao hu lambung-Ni in,
lao hu lambung-Ni in.

4. Ai pe ihutkon ma tongtong Siparsan dousamin;
Sadokah ho i tanoh on, pabujur uhurmin.
Patunggung ma Tuhanta in, sa puji-puji ma.
Daroh-Ni na mapansing in, tobusmu na harga,
tobusmu na harga.

1. Ai ambit lang do Ham parholong atei Ham huja ma au.
Halani holong-Mu ampakon layak-Mu, hu surga au.

2. Tarima kasih ma Bamu o Naibata parlayak Ham!
Sibahen dalan in marhitei Jesus in hu surga in.

3. Andohar ma holong ateihu sai tongtong bujur Bamu.
Age huja pe au sai hasomani au, sonang tumang.

4. Isuruh Anak-Mu hubangku Tonduy-Mu na hum Bamu.
Manogu tonduyhin hu hasonangan in, na puji Ham

1. Holong do atei ni Naibatangku
parholong atei mangidah au.
Ai ipasirsir do haluahonku
marhitei Jesus Anak-Ni in.

2. Tarsangkut ahu ibahen dousa ,
hape idingat Tuhanku au.
Ai do ‘se ningku tong:
Holong do atei ni Naibatangku mangidah au.

3. Tibal do ahu bai hamateian,

Ai do ‘se ningku tong:
Holong do atei ni Naibatangku mangidah au.

4. Na roh do Jesus pardameianku,
Parmahan Banggal na bujur in.
Ai do ‘se ningku tong:
Holong do atei ni Naibatangku mangidah au.

5. Itaron Jesus do hamateian,
manggalar utang ni dousangkin.
Ai do ‘se ningku tong:
Holong do atei ni Naibatangku mangidah au.

6. Manggoluh ahu binaenni Hata
ni Tuhan Jesus bai tonduyhin.
Ai do ‘se ningku tong:
Holong do atei ni Naibatangku mangidah au.

7. Hagoluhanku tongtong Hata-Ni,
sombuh horahku binaen ni in.
Ai do ‘se ningku tong:
Holong do atei ni Naibatangku mangidah au.

8. Tobu do holongni Tuhanku,
na pasabouhon paruhurhon.
Ai do ‘se ningku tong:
Holong do atei ni Naibatangku mangidah au.

9. Ai ipamalum haholongon-Ni
ganupan sahitni uhurhon.
Ai do ‘se ningku tong:
Holong do atei ni Naibatangku mangidah au.

10. Marmalas uhur jaha gok damei,
do au ibahen holong-Ni in.
Ai do ‘se ningku tong:
Holong do atei ni Naibatangku mangidah au.

11. Sai teanonku do hasonangan,
ronsi sadokah-dokahni in.
Ai do ‘se ningku tong:
Holong do atei ni Naibatangku mangidah au.

12. Sai pujionku do uhur holong,
ni tinuduhkonni Naibata.
Ai do ‘se ningku tong:
Holong do atei ni Naibatangku mangidah au.

1. Ambit lang Ham rupeihu ale Jesus,
jaha daroh-Mu manghakui ahu
mintor huja ma ahu na mardousa, marhaporusan.

2. Ai seng be dong na songon Ham Tuhanku,

3. Halani ai hupuji Ham, o Jesus,
ai dihut au itogu Ham, Tuhanku,
bai partumpuan ni ganup tinobus, ibaen daroh-Mu.

1. I surga do huan-huanta, na tong bujur maruhur in.

Ai pe baen hita Jesus in tongtong huan-huanta in.

2. Simole-ole songon sanggar hasoman na i tanoh on;
Tongtong do Jesus na tarsulur, huan-Ni pe jonam tongtong.
Ai pe baen hita Jesus in tongtong huan-huanta in.

3. Sai marpangkaut do hasoman bai holong ni atei ni in;

Ai pe baen hita Jesus in tongtong huan-huanta in.

4. Mangkopkop hita do itaron na marsik in i Golgata.
Ganup dousanta do iporsan manasap in bai Naibata.
Ai pe baen hita Jesus in tongtong huan-huanta in.

5. Sai humpit hita do uhur-Ni, sintong do parsaoran-Ni in;
Manongtong holong ni atei-Ni bai ganup niain-Ni in.
Ai pe baen hita Jesus in tongtong huan-huanta in.

6. O Jesus, huan-huannami, sai tangkap tangannami on.
Tongtong rajai ma uhurnami, hu surga boan hanai on.
Ijin ma tong parsaoran in sadokah ni dokahni in.

1. Ise do diha-dihanta, na so ra be mubah in.
Diha-diha na tarsulur in ma Tuhan Jesus in.
Ai buei pe diha-diha banta i dunia on.
Sai marsirang do magira, anggo matei daging on.

2. Anakboru pakon tondong, na marsapangan pe.
Kawan ampakon hasoman, tading do ganup hape;
‘Ge pe itaruhkon huta das bai panimbunan in.
Mulak do use sidea itadingkon bangkei in.

3. Anggo Jesus, sai idingat do diha-diha-Ni in;
Ai tonduyta pe idingat das bani ajalta in.
Na tadingkon pe ganupan na i atas tanoh on,
i lambung-Ni do dapotan hasonangan na tongtong.

1. Sadokah Jesuskin mangkasomani au

2. Parmahan Jesuskin, biri-birini au

4. Buei i tanoh on na manggompangi au
Sai Tuhan Jesus do tongtong, na manramotkon au
