Podas bai Jesus laho au patorsa langkahkin.

6. Hutonggor ma tongtong Jesusku, rupeihin
Ai Ia tuah na tongtong na so marhinggan in

1. Jahowa Naibatanta do, tarbaen batar-batarta
Munsuhta ningon talu do, ibaen parlingodanta
Ai anggo munsuh in, sibolis gorannin,
bajan do akalnin parseda jolma in, seng dong na pag mangkubu.

2. Gogohta seng tarbahen in jadi pangajamanta;
Pinilihni Jahowa in hansa pamonang hita .
Ai ise gorannin na jamin monang in
Tuhanta Jesus in, sigomgom ganup in,
na so bulih lang monang.

3. Gok pe habiar tanoh on, laho mandorab hita .
Ulang mabiar hita on, ai ningon monang hita.
Age manggila pe, sibolis banta bei,
seng habiaran be; Ai ‘ge sa hata pe,
kuh do manaluhonsi .

4. Ai Hata ni Jahowa in na dong tarkahuasi;
Tuhanta do sijaga in, ambah ni jabolon-Ni.
Hosahta, arta pe , na dong in banta pe,
iayob munsuh in, uhumi ma hujin,
Tuhanta hasomanta!

1. Parroh ni Harajaon-Mu, ai ma jumbalang-Mu;
Halani ai O Jesuskin, seng bulih sundat in.
Ai anggo omei bonih in, lanjar do seng marbuah in
Maningon lobei matei in, ponop ibagas tanoh in
Dear do in, ibaen na matei in

2. O Jesus, seng na ondos Ham bai hasangapon in,
ambit pori mangengkar Ham manaron boritnin,
Sai jalo hanai on ganup bai harajaon-Mu ganup ;
Seng na mangengkar hanai on maniru Ham i tanoh on .
Pamasuk bei hu surga hanai bei.

3. Na matei Ham i tanoh on, na songon bonih in;
Palihar Ham dunia on ondos Bamu do in.
Sai suruh Ham jabolon-Mu lao manlioti tanoh on.
Mangambilankon hata-Mu! Mangurup pe hanami on.
Manumpak bei, ganup hanami pe.

1. O, Jesus Tuhan nami, sai tonggor hanai on
Holong ma ham bannami, paluah hanai on.

2. Irikkononkonnami ganupan titah-Mu;
Tadingkononkonnami gigi ni uhur-Mu.

3. Sihol botohonnami naha parsahitnin,
itaron Tuhannami bai na tarsilang in.

4. Ganupan dousanami iporsan Ham ijin,
‘se ulang matei holi, ibahen dousa in.

5. Ai pe, 0 Tuhannami, tumpaki hata in,
masuk ‘bai uhurnami, sai longkot ma ijin .

1. Andohar apuy-Mu ma gara, parholong atei na sintong
Podas homa ibotoh halak, Ham Jesus, Raja na sintong
Domma tongon mamungkah siang, ikehen i huluan in;
Bahat tumang do tong na hurang ai sol lihar do ganup in.

2. Pamalas janah sai pagoluh, palihar liot tanoh on.
Patidak diri mu, Pargoluh, Pardamei, hu dunia on.
Ganupan ma halak mamuji bai parholong ni atei-Mu.
Janah rogop ma haganupan manombah Ham bai hotak-Mu,

3. Puhoi, baen pansing, pasada ganupan Kristen hu Bamu;
Sai ulang dong be age sada na so mananda holong-Mu.
Padomu Ham ma tong hanami marhitei-hitei Tonduy-Mu.
Sondangi Ham hasoman nami na so mananda goran-Mu.

1. Jesus, Raja ni Kuria, na pansing janah porsaya.
Pasu-pasu Ham au on.
Sai papuho Ham uhurhu, mangirikkon Ham Rajangku,
Pargogohi Ham au tong, pargogohi Ham au tong.

2. Tonduy Napansing ma here,
roh bai uhur ni kuria bai ganup dunia on.
Ase tong sada uhurni, gembit merap pe halakni.
Pasangapkon Ham tongtong, pasangapkon Ham tongtong.

3. Pangku-Mu paluah Ham ma humbai begu-begu setan,
pakon uhur daging in
Ham tumang ma, ale Tuhan malas uhur ni humpulan.
Na manjujung Goran in, na manjujung Goran in

4 . Ganup na i parujian na manaron parsahitan,
sai kawahkon Ham ganup.
Sai patoguh Ham uhurni mangundukkon tinaronni.
Ase sai marbuah in, ase sai marbuah in.

5. Sai pauli Ham Kuria,
‘se harosuh-Mu isura haganup pagori-Mu;
Halak na toruh maruhur na magigi bai na sambor.
Sibalosi hata-Mu sibalosi hata-Mu

6. Ai harga tumang hanami na tinobus-Mu ganupan,
ingat Ham hanami on.
Togu Ham hanai, 0 Tuhan humbai lombang hasunsahan.
Hu nagori atas in, hu nagori atas in.

1. Buei ope na siat in, bai pesta parunjukan
Ganupan sipardousa in, porsaya sirahanan!
Ai Naibata mandilo ham, hubani hasonangan in,
Ham lo, ham lo, idilo Naibata

2. Tama longang uhurta bei mambogei pangontang-Ni.
Antong, sai ulang engkar be, tangihon pardilo-Ni!
Ai Naibata marpio ham halani ai sai roh ma ham.
Sai roh, sai roh hu surga ma ham roh.

3. Pardousa ho, ninuhurmin, na so talup be dihut?
Na dong halani dousamin mambaen na sundat bongkot.
Ai domma sahei dousamin igalar Tuhan Jesus in.
Sahei, sahei , salosei utangmin,

4. Haporsayai ma Hata in, ai in do haluahon.
Arapkon Tuhan Jesus in, daroh-Ni in ma jolom.
Age gok dou sa uhurmin, maluah do bahenon-Nin.
Tongon, tongon, maluah baenon-Nin.

5. Sonaha uhurmu ijin? Sai rap ma masuk hita,
Bai pesta parunjukon in, bai na sonang magira.
Na puji ma Tuhanta in na marholong ni atei in.
Tongtong, tongtong, holong atei-Ni in.

1. O Tonduy na manggoki uhur, ni saksi-saksi na parlobei in,
Seng ongga-ongga marnamundur, mangimbang munsuh ni Tuhanta in
Puhoi pakon uhur nami on mandodingkon

2 . Andohar apuy-Mu ma gara, marlintun bani bangsa haganup,
Jahowa, Ham paingkat halak na bujur mangkatahon hata-Mu,
Kawahkon Ham bolag sabion in, jabolon-Mu seng piga ope in.

3. Ai anak-Mu do mangajarhon bannami hata pangindoan in;
Buei do na mangkaringgaskon lao mangkorjahon na nidok-Ni in,
Halani ai, tangihon Ham ma in, Nimu lah Amen saud ma Hata in.

4. Antong buei baen Ham suruhan, na sai tongtong igoki Tonduy-Mu.
Janah na ringgas marambilan manogu halak hu gomgoman-Mu,
Taluhon Ham sibolis in tongtong ramoti hata-Mu i tanoh on .

5. Urupi Ham hanai hun Sion sai suruh Ham bannami Tonduy-Mu,
Lao paluahkon hajolmaon usih songon na binagahkon -Mu ,
Sondangi Ham ganup dunia on, pasiat hata-Mu i tanoh on.

6. Sai bahen Ham doras mardalan hu sab dunia on ambilan-Mu .
Sai bahen Ham marhulan-hulan, halak na masuk hu Kuria-Mu;
Puhoi pakon Israel ganup, ‘se mulak use hu Kuria-Mu ,

7. Pauli Sion na marumbak, padaoh Ham na mangambat hata-Mu ;
O Tuhan, roh ma Ham manumpak horja ni haganup jabolon-Mu.
Sai tong pansing ma pohon anggur-Mu, ase ibere buah hu Bamu .

8. Kawahkon Ham ma parguruan, sai Tonduy-Mu ma sorap bai ganup.
Sihatkon Hata hagoluhan bai uhur ni parguru in ganup .
Sai suruh Ham ma guru na bujur, paruhur mangondingi tong botul.

1. Bolag ope na golap in, bai bangsa na iatas tanoh on,
Sibolis do na manrajai in, isombah halak begu-begu in

2. Sai tatap bangsa haganup, ai loja do sidea haganup .
Sombuhni do mandilo surga in mangindo tolong bai Jahowa in.

3. Torang do bagah-bagah ni Bapanta i nagori atas in .
Ganupan jolma iarahkon do hubani sonang ni uhur-Ni lo.

4. Sai gogoh bei pasaudkon in mamboan Hata hagoluhan in .
Bai ganup bangsa na i tanoh on, porlu baen hita horja in tongtong .

5. Ham Raja na i surga in, na dob manobus manisia in.
Doras sondangi Ham na golap in, Bamu ma togu hajolmaon in.

1. Ringgas hita rup, manogu ganup,
na pag manendel , na hengkeng hobal,
bai hata ni Tuhan, na sangap tongtong
rosuh-Ni ma bahen idunia on

2. Sai ulang be da mabiar ganup,
boiskon ma da gogoh-mu ganup!
Age roh sibolis lao mandorab ho,
sai tatap ma Jesus na lampou gogoh ,

3. Horjahon bujur hata-Ni ganup,
sai monang jojor baeonon-Ni ganup .
Ai Ia do Raja na monang tongtong,
patitir pe bala manginsurut tong .

4. Holong ateimu Tuhan Naibata,
pasaud hata-Mu tumpaki homa;
haganupan horja ni jabolon -Mu;
Martuah homa ma baen Ham jolma on!

Sai torang ma langkah nima, sai Naibata hasoman nima
Ampakon malekat ni pe,
Anggo iramoti Jesus, hanima lang tarbaen lang bulus,
Do langkah nima in hape,
Bulat Tuhanta ma hasoman nima da, ganup ari;
Hanami pe ingat homa tonggohon bani Naibata.

1. Ham Naibata banggal tumang, janah borat dousangku,
Seng dong ijon itanoh on, tarbaen haporusanku.

2. ‘Ge pe huja au laho da mangalop hatuahon,
Seng dapot in bai tanoh in. bai ganup hajolmaon.

3. On pe Bamu naman au roh, sai ulang tulak ahu;
Pahombun Ham, O Naibata, panringis-Mu hu bangku.

4. Ai daroh-Mu na harga in, Jesus baen pardearan;
Sahei ijin do utangkin bai hayu na marsilang,

5. Irik pe tong. sai roh sintong ‘ge uhum-Mu hu bangku.
Jorai au on bai goluhkon hu surga baen uhurhu.

6. Padaoh Ham na jahat in, papansing Ham uhurhu.
Sihol unduk do au Bamu, sai hata-Mu do bangku.

7. Bai idop-Mu ma uhurhin, sai sasap Ham dousangku,
Hu lambung-Mu ma tonduyhin bai rotap ni hosahku.

1. Layak do Ham mambere au , O Jesus Tuhankin,
Ihutkon Ham daoh pe au, mambuat uhurhin.

2. Pardousa na banggal do au, pansing do anggo Ham ;
Sai bai na dorsa laho au bai na jahat naman .

3. O Tuhan, husopotkon ma ganupan dousangkin ;
Holong ma Ham, sai sasap ma, Bamu ma tonduyhin.

4. O, Jesus sai tangihon on, padaoh Ham jahatkin ;
Pansing ma baen Ham uhurhon, ase sai sonang in.

5. Ai domma pala matei Ham, mangkopkop tonduyhin;
Sihol ma au mangidah Ham, hu lambung-Mu ijin.

1. Ham Sipagoluh au parayak Ham au on.
Sai ulang Ham mandaoh humbagas uhurhon.
Roh Sipagoluh roh tongon, baen Ham au Anak-Mu tongon
Bani daroh-Mu usah au, putih songon bunga ma au
Putih tongon, putih tongon,
bani daroh-Mu usah au, putih songon bunga ma au.

2. Gogoh ni daroh in, patorang bangku on
Tonduy pargoluh in, manogu au tongtong
Roh Sipagoluh roh tongon, baen Ham au anak-Mu tongon
Bani daroh-Mu usah au, putih songon bunga ma au
Putih tongon, putih tongon
Bani daroh-Mu usah au, putih songon bunga ma au

3. Togu Ham uhurhon, Bamu ma tarik in
Ai langkah-Mu do tong, na sol usihankin
Roh Sipagoluh roh tongon, baen Ham au anak-Mu tongon
Bani daroh-Mu usah au, putih songon bunga ma au
Putih tongon, putih tongon
Bani daroh-Mu usah au, putih songon bunga ma au

1. O Hasoman na tarhurung, bani pardousaon in.
Hagoluhan na sumurung, siambilanonkonkin.
Ipatidak Naibatanta, holong ni atei-Ni in.
Ai isuruh do Anak-Ni baen hagoluhanta in.

2.Hatundalan do Anak-Ni, na roh hu dunia on,
paluahkon humbai dousa hita na madursat on.
Jesus Kristus in do goran ni hatundalanta in;
Ai Tuhanta do manaron utang ni pardousa in.

3. Jesus Kristus do manogu au hu hasonangan in;
Iarahkon do tonduyhu bai hasangapon-Ni in,
ase ulang be madorun au na pusok uhur on,
janah lang dong be mandorun na pajutkon uhurhon.

4. Ia roh pe hamateian, Jesus do mangapoh au.
Roh pe ari paruhuman, Jesus mangkahui au;
Aha be habiaranku? Jesus hatundalankin;
Ai ma ase pujionku holong ni atei-Ni in.

judul: Lauja do Ho na Loja in
lirik:
1. Lauja do ho, naloja in, binaen ni dousamin?
Seng jumpah ho na sonang in, i parlajanganmin
halani in, sai mulak ho!

2. Ompaskon pusok uhurmin bai Tuhan Jesus in.
Sai boban ganup dousamin bai Sipagoluh in.
Nai ma tongon, sai roh ma ho!

3. Ai Jesus do padamei ho na loja in tongtong;
Ai anggo lang hujin ho roh, manaron ma ho tong.
Halani in, sai roh ma ho.

judul: Dong do Bah Tubuh Dear in
lirik:
1. Dong do bah tubuh dear in, bai na mardousa in;
Jenges tumang bah tubuh in, pasonang uhurhin.

2. Bah tubuh na mapansing in, in ma Jesusta in;
Isasap do siningta in, ibuat horungkin.

3. Ai daroh ni Tuhanta in, in do bah tubuh in,
durus i Goigata do in, manghopkop hila on.

4. Ai ma tongon, ai dihut au gabe pansing homa,
ai holong-M u berean au, ampa na roh homa.

5. Parj ahat i siamun-Mu , i Dolog Golgata,
mintor i golom hata-Mu, ibaen porsaya da.

6. Jadi torus maluah in humbai pangagou in,
Halani tenger uhuniin, Bamu Rajani in.

7. Sai dihut au paluah Ham, padaoh na bursik in;
Bannami sai patongtong Ham, haporsayaon in.

8 Ai na margogoh do tongtong daroh-Mu na durus,
pansing ibaen in uhurhon, bulat janah torus.

9. Halani in pujionkin ma lalap goran-Mu ;
Sai in magira dodingkin, dob das hu lambung-Mu.

judul: Na Sonang Au Dob na Mar Tuhan Au
lirik:
1. Na sonang au dob na mar Tuhan au bai Tuhan Jesus in.
Ai lang be dong dob jabolon-Ni au sihoruonkonkin.
Ai Ia mado huirikkon, dunia on ma hutundalhon,
Sonang ma au! Sonang ma au!

2. Sonang ma au, ai mambur do hape pusokni uhurhin.
Megah ma au ronsi antigan pe iapoh Jesuskin.
Seng huhoruhon be goluhku, ganup do guru bai Bapangku.
Seng ma au! Sonang ma au!

3. Sonang ma au! Bujur do Bapangkin na mansarihon au.
janah layak; ganup na porlu ibere do tong au.
Parbegu do na mangkolsohkon goluhni pakon sipanganon.
Au sonang do! Au sonang do!

4. Na sonang au! Harajaon-Ni in ampa ruhut-Ni in,
ai ma tene na hudarami in; dapot ganup ijin.
Sai on gelah surang-surangku: Pasaudkon uhur ni Bapangku.
Sonang ma au! Sonang ma au!

5. Sonang ma au, anggo marsaran au, bai abingan-Ni in.
Na parngit in ‘tor itadingkon au, dob ondos au hujin.
Nuan na porlu bai uhurhu: Sai surga in ma bongkotanku.
Martuah au! Martuah au!

1. Ondoskon haganupan, horu ni uhurmin,
Bai Naibata Jahowa, sidear gabei in
Ai guru bai Tuhanta do tanoh pakon laut
Buei sintani jolma, uhurni do na saud.

2.Ningon tenger uhurmu mardingat Tuhan in.
ijin ma jaloonmu na pinarsintamin.
Ai lang adong gunani, age marhoru ho:
Tonggomu do dalanni ase jumpahan ho,

3. Ibotoh Naibatanta na porlu banta bei,
na dear roh hu banta rnambahen sirsir bei
na dear ipatudu tongtong hubanta on.
Na dorsa ipadaoh manjaga hita on .

4. Sai tong tenger uhurrnu mardingat Tuhan in;
Lupahon rna uhurmu bai pandoleian in ;
Ai anggo itahankon horu ni uhurmin.
Tarolos do Tuhanta mambuat horumin .

5. Paturut Naibantanta patorsa langkahmin ;
Na pandei do Tuhanta, ganup pasirsir in.
‘Tor sungkod pingkiran-Ni lao paluahkon ho ?
Gogoh-Ni ituduhkon, ase ididah ho.

6. Ai pe, 0 Tuhannami, taluhon hajojor
Pusok ni uhurnami sagala na sambor
Hu surga in sai bolas ma tonduynami rup
Hu tangan-Mu ma ondos hanami on ganup .

1. Ondoskon haganupan, horu ni uhurmin,
Bai Naibata Jahowa, sidear gabei in
Ai guru bai Tuhanta do tanoh pakon laut
Buei sintani jolma, uhurni do na saud.

2.Ningon tenger uhurmu mardingat Tuhan in.
ijin ma jaloonmu na pinarsintamin.
Ai lang adong gunani, age marhoru ho:
Tonggomu do dalanni ase jumpahan ho,

3. Ibotoh Naibatanta na porlu banta bei,
na dear roh hu banta rnarnbahen sirsir bei
na dear ipatud u tongtong hubanta on.
Na dorsa ipadaoh manjaga hita on .

4. Sai tong tenger uhurrnu mardingat Tuhan in;
Lupahon rna uhurmu bai pandoleian in ;
Ai anggo itahanko n horu ni uhurmin.
Tarolos do Tuhanta mambuat horumin .

5. Paturut Naibantanta patorsa langkahmin ;
Na pandei do Tuhanta, ganup pasirsir in.
‘Tor sungkod pingkiran-Ni lao paluahkon ho ?
Gogoh-Ni ituduhkon , ase ididah ho.

6. Ai pe, 0 Tuhannami, taluhon hajojor
Pusok ni uhurnarni sagala na sambor
Hu surga in sai bolas ma tonduynami rup
Hu tangan-Mu ma ondos hanami on ganup .

1. Marsipota pe idahon, hita songon tinadingkon
Ni Tuhanta Bapa in, sedo na tongon sonin

2. ‘Ge malambat pe sipota pangurupi ni Tuhanta,
anggo roh panorangnin, mintor tongoson-Ni in.

3. Songon pambere ni Bapa do pambere ni Tuhanta,
na marguna dansa tong iberehon banta on.

4. Tenger uhur bai Bapangku naha pe hasosakan ku,
sai holong atei-Ni in dompak au anak-Ni in.

5. Setan, jolma pe porini naha pe panunsahini,
mesek au mangidah in, ai manggoluh Bapangkin.

6. Ia roh pe hamateian, seng be pala au songgotan,
sai hujolom Jesuskin, in ma diha-dihangkin.

7. Asal ma tongtong rupeihu holong atei ni Tuhanku;
‘Ge pe hu tanoman au, sungkup ondos Bani au.

1. Ulang ma tangiskon parhoruonmin,
Bai Jesus aduhon gok ni borgokmin.
?Gepe sai maringgot lutu pe ganup,
Anggo na mardingat sonang haganup.

2. Ai ibotoh Jesus parhoruonmin;
Ingat ma lah Jesus, jorei langkahmin.
Soh ijin pe hita ?ge hu surga in,
Sai marolob hita ai sonang do in.

3. Dong do na marhoru halak songon ho,
Patugah bai Jesus na mangapoh ho.
Rap hanima sonang ampa halak in,
Asal ipatapang manonggohon in.

1. Inggot pe lutu ganupan sai na sonang do use
Jesus do sai pasonangkon aha na humutik be

2. Iluhmu do ibilangi, anggo horu uhurmin:
Lang lopason-Ni tarhilang, ho tenger ma uhurmin.

3. Tong itangihon Tuhanta hita na martonggo in .
Janah itatap Tuhanta ganup tinobus-Ni in.

4. Tenger uhurmu bai Jesus, na patorsa langkahmin;
Sai haholongi ma Jesus na pasonang uhurmin.

1. Ulang sai holsohan ho, Tuhanmu manggoluh do,
ganup do pinarentah-Ni, horumin sol buaton-Ni
asal ma porsaya ho, holsohmin maporus do.

2. Sai pahamot Naibata, dousamin pe imbang ma!
Ulang habiari talu, hamonangan do rupeimu;
Ipasaud Naibatamin na pinarbagah-Ni in.

3. Anggo roh arian in, sai maporus borngin in.
Nin homa lintun horumu, dob isondangi Tuhanmu,
asal sai mangarap ho, seng anjai marhoru ho.

4. Ge pe ganda borit ni ganup sitaronon in,
ulang be ho sai sangsian, sai tong ma ho ra mamorsan.
Golom haholongon in, mangarapkon Tuhan in.

1. Megah tumang uhurhu, roh ahu sogod on.
Mamuji Naibataku, sijaga goluhkon.
Ham do bai hotak in tong do sol pujionku,
Janah pasangaponku marhitei Jesus in.

2. Sagala habiaran na bajan haganup,
Daoh do in na borngin ibahen holong-Mu.
Mangindo au nuan: Sai sasap Ham dousangku,
ganupan parlahouhu, sogam ni uhur-Mu.

3. Parorot Ham ma ahu age sadari on,
Sibaen hasusahanku padaoh Ham tongtong.
Iankon Ham au on, patorsa Ham langkahku,
Padaoh Ham sosakku, Bamu ma hosahkon.

4. Tonduyhu, pamatangku rap ampa uhurhon,
Ampakon hasomanku na idunia on,
Sai ondos ma Bamu sagala na dong bangku;
Ganupam sinaringku, sibere-bere-Mu.

5. Hatahon Ham malekat, tongtong i lambungkon.
Ai ningon hupabulat Bamu pa tonduyhon.
Ai tong sibolis in roh manggompangi au,
Ase ihutkononku mambahen dousa in.

6. Marguru bai Tuhanku ma au bai haganup.
Itogu Naibatangku ma au bai na talup.
Sai pasu-masu Ham binahen ni tanganku,
Ganup hinorjahonku o Tuhan Naibata.

7. Sonari ningku: Amen, tenger ma uhurhin,
Tuhanku mamberehon, na hupindohon in.
Lao misir au nuan hubani lahoanku,
Sai Jesus hasomanku, sonang do au ijin.

1. Sai sol pujionku do Ham sodog on.
Jesus Naibatangku dob puho au on.
Sanggah sinok ahu iramotkon Ham,
Ampa hasomanku ipasonang Ham.

2. Gogoh ni dagingku ipasuang Ham.
Bai na lao marhorja au sadari on.
Rap ampa uhurhu iparotot Ham;
Lihar panonggorhu lao mangidah Ham.

3. O Jesus, pagogoh au sadari on.
Dousa pe padaoh humbai uhurhon.
Ase huihutkon Hata-Mu tongtong.
Janah hupasangap ham itanoh on.

1. Tangar ma ambilan in, nasiam na pusok uhur
Domma sasap utangmin, dousa pe ganupan mambur
Halani holong-Ni in, Anak ni Naibata in

2. In ma Tuhan Jesus in; Sipaluah manisia;
Itadingkon surga in, ase gabe jolma Ia .
Durus do daroh-Ni in, ase sasap dousa in.

3. Tangar nasiam ganup, ganupan na pusok uhur;
Seng anjai tarbuang be, halak na martenger uhur.
Bai Tuhanta Jesus in, na mangkopkop haganup.

1. Rapkon Tuhan Jesus in pungkah lahoanmu
Ningon bani Tuhan in tong pangguruanmu
Jesus baen hasomanmin, puho ampa modom,
Dogei ma bokas-Ni in, Tuhanmin panalom

2. Ganup sogod ningon do Jesus diloonmu
Ase itumpaki ho bai silahoanmu;
Ai arian borngin pe, sai hasomanan-Ni,
Dousamin ganupan pe, sai taluhonon-Ni.

3. Anggo rapkon Jesus in, seng dong hamagouan;
Pandei pe sibolis in, Jesus sigogohan;
Asal ipanalom ho Jesus in Tuhanmu,
Ningon sai maporus do na hinoruhon-Mu.

4. Huondoskon na tongon haganup langkahku,
Bai Tuhanku, na tongtong ibagas uhurhu.
Atap aha pe hubaen, Ham huunsagahkon.
Saud ma bahen Ham Tuhan haganupan, Amen!

1. Tuhanta ma napuji ibaen dear gabei-Ni,
Mambere panganonta, holong atei-Ni banta.

2. Dagingta ‘pa tonduyta ibere do hubanta;
Seng dong pingkir Tuhanta membere in hubanta.

3. Dagingta iparmudu, tonduyta ipagoluh;
Sonin ma lah uhurta, age tarsosak hita.

4. Ai sahit ni uhurta in ma ganup dousanta;
Na matei do tonduyta binahen ni sahitta.

5. Domma roh Siparbujur, pargoluh na tarsulur,
Tuhanta Jesus Kristus, tonduyta in itobus.

6. Domma sasap dousanta, sirsir hagoluhanta.
Sungkup holi rupeita i surga jaloonta.

7. O Jesus, Tuhannami, padas Ham bannami;
Dakdanak, na magodang, bobahon Ham, ‘se sonang.

judul: O Jolma, Puji ma Bona ni Hagoluhanmu
lirik:
1. O jolma, puji ma bonani hagoluhanmu.
Na marmuduhon tongtong tonduy pakon dagingmu.
Puji tongon, sai haholongi tongtong,Na pasirsirhon sonangmu.

2. Domma ibere ham Tuhan sipanganon nami.
Pasangap Ham ma in nuan ibahen hanami.
Angkula in, ampa ganup gogohniin, tanda malas uhur nami.

3. Ham Sipagoluh, sai tatap age tonduynami,
Janah pabosur Ham in i pardalanannami.
Hu surga in, Jesus pasihol Ham in, tongtong Bamu, Tuhannami.

4. Ham ma marmahan hanami na i halungunan,
Ase tarbaen hu lambung-Mu marpesta o Tuhan;
Togu ham tong, hanai na loja ijon, das ronsi bai parsaranan.

1. Salpu use ma sadari umurhin hun tanoh on.
Sai ipaingat Ham sonari atap na bujur au on
Janah tuduh Ham ganup na hubaen na so talup,
ase sasap ma dousangku, janah sonang ma uhurhu.

2. Ai buei do parlahouhu, seng harosuh-Mu hape.
Ai gok dousa do uhurhu, salah do hatangku pe.
Ganup tongkin au pandur lang mardingat be bujur,
Pasal Titah-Mu hubangku, ibaen banggal ni dousangku.

3. Sai holong ma Ham Tuhanku, sai palumbang uhur-Mu;
Ai borat tumang uhurhu ibaen dousangkin Bamu.
Sai patidak layak-Mu pakon holong atei-Mu,
Ase tambah ma ringgasku bai ganupan parentah-Mu.

4. Sai papansing ham uhurhu ampa sanggah modom au;
Layak-Mu baen Ham sabingku, suruh na manjaga au;
Ham pamiloh apuy in ‘pa manjaga rumah in,
Ulang tangis da hanami patar dob puho hanami.

5. Ham ma tong na manundati anggo roh parjahat in;
Ulang be pajalangonni akal ni uhurni in,
Hu bannami anak-Mu, na hinaholongan-Mu!
Ham manampar hun bannami na ra mangagou hanami.

6. Seng sinok hape Tuhan ‘ge ibagas borngin in.
Jesus, ham do Siparmahan na madear uhur in;
Borngin ‘ge arian pe iramoti Ham hape.
Tong iankon Ham hanami ase sinok matanami.

7. Sai jorgit puhoi hanami bani panorangni in,
Manjumpahkon horja nami ase saud ganupan in.
Anggo sol alopon-Mu borngin on au, o Tuhan,
Hubai tangan-Mu ma ahu ‘ge pamatang ‘pa tonduyhu.

1. Sol modom ma ganupan, na loja na ngayotan, i dunia on.
Ham da ale tonduyhu, pasangap ma Tuhanmu, na manarihon ham tongtong.

2. Ale mata ni ari, huja do ho sonari, iayak borngin ho?
Golap pe haganupan ididah mata nuan, bai Naibata lihar do.

3. Age pe golap ari, dong ope sada nari napasiangkon au;
In ma Jesus, Tuhanku, marian bai uhurhu; Lang be tadingkon-Ni au.

4. Ai salpu ma na siang, lihar do ganup bintang i awang-awang in.
Usih sonin ma ahu ilambungni Tuhanku, dob hutadingkon tanoh on.

5. Lao modom au sonari, hiouhu hugantihi, huingat ma ijin;
Lao salpu do goluhku, hiouhu jaloonku, pinasirsir ni Jesus in.

6. Ham ma paherbang tangan, Ham Jesus hamegahku, ondingi hanai on.
Roh setan lao mamorang, malekat-Mu manorgang, seng bulih dohoranni au.

1. Domma loja dagingkon sihol pitpit matangkon.
O Bapa panonggor-Mu na manjaga au.

2. Sasap Ham ma haganup na hubaen na so talup;
Haganupan simbeihin ipajorei Jesuskin.

3. Haganup hasomankin, ondos ma hutangan-Mu.
Isi ni dunia on jaga Ham saborngin on.

4. Halak na masombuh in ampa na boritan in,
Haganup na horu pe, Ham mangapoh in, ale!

1. Siparmahan bolon, na so ra tarpodom, tatap ham au on.
Layak-Mu o Tuhan, do na manramotkon, au sadari on.
Ham ma use borngin on, na manjaga liot biding, ase ahu sonang.

2. Ham ma manamparhon ganup hasosakan humbai anak-Mu.
Sasap Ham ganup dousa paruhuran, sai pasonang au.
Jesus na dob matei in, in do na padaoh dousangku, megah ma uhurhu.

3. Ampakon hasoman na hinaholongan, ondos ma bamu.
Mata-Mu manonggor, seng hanami bobor, paroroton-Mu.
Ham ma tong manjaga au, ase tong totap uhurhu, sadokah goluhku.

4. Ganup parmaraan pakon hasunsahan, ham padaoh ganup.
Ham, o Bapa nami, ham ma manlingodi, ‘se sonang ganup.
Sipangagou olat Ham, ulang dong na niharuan, janah isunsahi.

5. Atap roh ajalhu, bois ma bohalhu bani borngin on?
Anggo in, Tuhanku, uhur-Mu do bangku, alop Ham au on.
Asal ma hu surga au, itogu Jesus Tuhanku sonang do uhurhu.

6.Tenger ma uhurhu, papitpit matangku, mangajamhon Ham.
Hu bamu ma ahu, badan ‘pa tonduyhu, sai jagai Ham.
Ham do mangkatahon in, patar anggo puho au, Ham parayakonku.

1. Marujung ma nuan saminggu parlayak-Mu na dong sonin.
Songon binere-Mu hubangku, pasu-Mu in bai uhurhin.
Sonin ma ‘ge hu lobei on, sai Ham manongos in tongtong.

2. Hupuji Ham, o Naibatangku, tarima kasih ma Bamu,
Ibaen pambere-Mu ganupan hubangku, ai hubotoh do;
Megah do Ham bai dodingkin, marhitei-hitei Jesus in.

3. Tongon, sai dong pe na hutaron ilopas Ham saminggu on.
Itumpak Ham do au manaron, ase bai haderon on.
Ihorhon na hutaron in, sai Goran-Mu pujionkin.

4. Nuan adong pangiondoanku, na porlu sibereon-Mu;
Sai ulang dingat ham dousangku, holong ma Ham manguras au,
Marhitei-hitei daroh in na dob manggalar utangkin.

5. Seng mubah hata-Mu hubangku, totap do bagah-bagah-Mu;
Ai pagoluhon-Mu pardousa, anggo marhoru uhurnin.
Janah iboan dousa in bai Jesus, Sipaluah in.

6. In ma ginolom ni uhurhu bani haporsayaonkin.
Ase malas nuan uhurhu lao paujungkon minggu in;
Ai domma sonang uhurhin ibaen pangarapanni in.

7. Lambin martambah do umurhu lambin madohor ma homa,
Arini lao tadingkononku dunia on, marayak Ham.
Tagam hinan baen tonduyhin, marayak hasonangan in.

8. Anggo dob puho ahu sogod bai ari Minggu na roh in,
Megah uhurhu laho bongkot hubagas parmingguan in.
Ai jaloonku ma ijin Ambilan na mapansing in.

9. Dob-dob hinan ma lah hupuji na sihol bereon-Mu,
hubotoh do pangkaholongi ni Ham age hupudi on;
Hu surga au itogu Ham, sonin ipingkir Ham hinan.

1. Lao salpu ari Minggu, domma sombuh siholhu,
Bamu o Tuhankin.
Niajar-Mu do ahu, janah na bosur ahu, marhitei Hata-Mu.

2. Ham do na marianan bai uhurhon, o Tuhan,
Sonang ma au nuan marayak podomanku;
Ai sasap ma dousangku, sabingku layak-Mu hubaen.

3. Ai sahit ni tonduyhu do malum, o Tuhanku,
Ai rumah-Mu do au. Na sonang do uhurhu,
Dob misir ma hubangku ganup na pagolapkon au.

4. Ham manramotkon ahu, Ham manondangi ahu,
Ibagas na golap. Paima roh arian,
Na so marhaingganan sadokah ni dokahni in.

5. Na sonang do uhurhu, malekat-Mu manjaga
Na mangoromi au. Huidah bai uhurhu.
Parjenges ni Tuhanku, ambit podas ma ondos au!

1. Mardagang au i tanoh on, hasusuranku daoh hunjon,
In ma Jerusalem na jenges. Jahowa pajonamkon in,
bai daroh-Ni anak-Ni in; Hujin sol laho tonduy-hu
Pardagang au i tanoh on, hasusuranku daoh hunjon.

2. Pardalan diri sai hinsah, sonin homa ajalhu roh;
Na lopus in seng tarulaki. Siluk do bois bohalhon,
Urasi, Jesus uhurhon, janah palihar pangidahku!
Manrotap uhur tanoh in, mangayak na i surga in.

3. Mahol homa do dalan in, age na lao hu surga in,
buei jagaon uhurhu. Sompit do dalan, munsuh in,
mangambat au ulang hujin, hotop tartolsu do naheihu,
janah lungun do dalan in; Sai jut do tong pingkirankin.

4. Hotop hurangan uhurhin bai sondang ni Tuhanta in,
hubani holongni atei-Ni. Ai sanggah na tarsosak au,
‘ge saran pe seng jumpah au; Sonin pe lupa do sunsahni,
anggo mardingat tonduyhin bai surga siayakonnin.

5. O Jesus, Naibata hinan, na jadi jolma nahinan,
hape mardagang songon ahu; Nuan humbani Hata-Mu,
tuduhkon Ham bokas-Mu; Padonok Ham Bamu uhurhu,
Tongtong da hagang goluhkon, siluk parayak Ham ma au.

6. Gomgom daging, tonduyhin marhite-heitei Tonduy-Mu.
patongtong uhurhon manahan; Hotop do lao targompang au,
sai togu au, arahkon au, lingodi au bai hasosakan,
Sondangi bani holong-Mu, uhurhu bai na golap in.

7. Madatei narus tonduyhin ibaen sihol bai Jesuskin,
Bamu pasonang ma uhurhu; Pitpihonsi ma matangkon,
Bamu ma alop anak-Mu hu parontian ni horungku;
Ijin ma au i lambung-Mu, hasoman najah kawan-Mu.

8. Pardagang au i tanoh on, na marsik i dunia on;
I surga do diha-dihangku, Ijin ma rapkon huankin,
Tongtong hupuji Goran-Mu, patidak holong ni ateihu.
O Jesus, Sipaluah au, podas ham roh, masihol au.

1. Jesus roh hanai hujon, lao mangindo hagoluhan
Ai pe roh ma Ham hujon, janah baen ma pardomuan
Tonduy-Mu pa tonduy nami ulang merap uhur nami.

2. Golap uhurnami on, nin homa pambotoh nami.
Anggo seng Tonduy-Mu in, paliharhon uhurnami.
Ningon Ham do patureihon dalan sidogeionnami.

3. Sondang humbai Naibata, haliharon roh hun datas,
Baen torsa sondangi ma uhurnami ase megah
Lao manjalo hagoluhan, pinasirsir-Mu o Tuhan.

1. Sai nagori atas do situjuaon ni uhurta;
Ai na manginsolat do hita i nagori tongah.
Pardagangan tanoh on, surga hasusuranta in.

2. O tonduyhu, tatap ma, surga in, hasusuranmu.
Tanoh on tundalhon ma seng talup in iananmu.
Surga do tujuan ni na torang maruhur in.

3. Jesus mangkatahon au: “Sai tujui ma dompak babou”.
Ulang lambin sirang au humbai hasusuran, kahou;
Ia tong hudingat in, das ma au use hujin.

4. Sai hu babou do tongtong lao panatap ni uhurhu,
Ai rupeihu na dob gok do i lambung ni Bapangku.
‘Ge pe rondang bintang in, marsinalsalan do in.

5. Sai hu babou laho au, hamateian do hiteihu;
Ase lalab sirang au humbani pusok ni uhurhu.
Jesus do hunlobei lao, gabe megah lao ma au.

6. Surga in na mando tong na porlu bani tonduyhu;
Rotaponku ma tongtong rosuh-rosuh ni dagingku.
Surga do tujuankin, rosni ondos au hujin.

1. Haganupan jolma matei, ningon matei daging in;
Na manggoluh ningon matei, ‘se madear use in.
Badan on do gabe bangkei, ai maningon gabei danei,
Se magira bangkit in, bai hasangaponni in.

2. Ai pe lang be tahanonku uhur ni Naibatakin;
Huberehon pe hosahku, lang be pusok uhurhin.
Ai bai ugah ni Jesusku dapot au hagoluhanku;
Ibaen parmatei-Ni in do tarapoh uhurhin.

3. Jesus Kristus domma matei, halanin manggoluh au,
Tuah pe marbagei-bagei, ai pe misir ma lah au,
Manadingkon pardagangan, mangayaki hasonangan,
Mandapoti Jesuskin, ai siholan au hujin.

4. Sonang ma tongon uhurhu, anggo jognjong au ijin,
Ampa ganup hasomanku na marhasangapan in.
Serapim pe mamberehon sangap pakon hatunggungon,
Idodingkon ma ijin: Sangap ma bai Tuhan in.

5. Dihut do ijin homani na porsaya haganup:
Ompung pakon nabi-nabi, ‘ge Apostel haganup.
Ai marribu do tahunni lao marayak hasonangan,
Ganup na mapansing in, pasangapkon Tuhan in.

6. O Jerusalem na jenges, lihar ni sinalsalmin!
Sonang au anjaha mesek manangihon dodingmin.
Hamegahon do na poltak, hatuahon do na mulgap;
On ma ari in tene, na so ra maronti be.

7. Ai idahon ni matangku hasangapon in ganup,
Hapintoron do hiouhu, na pabangkit au talup.
Na marrudang hamonangan, jongjong au bai hasonangan.
Mandompakkon Naibata, sai tongtong Heleluya!

judul: Lao ma Au, Lao ma Au
lirik:
1. Lao ma au, lao ma au bai Jesusku na madaoh.
Ai masihol do uhurhu, mangayaki Naibatangku;
Ase ilambung-Ni au, ase ilambung-Ni au.

2. Jesuskin, sondang in, sitorusi hombun in!
O, antigan roh padanku, ase borhat ma tonduyhu.
Lao mangidah bohi-Mu, lao mangidah bohi-Mu.

3. Sulur nin, dear nin, doding ni malekat in!
Ambit na marhabong ahu tongkin on do laho au.
Hu nagori atas in, hu nagori atas in.

4. Naha in, tonduyhin, anggo das ma ho hujin?
O Tuhanku na tarsulur, seng tardadap bai uhurhu.
Hamegahon in ijin, hamegahon in ijin.

judul: Sonang ma Modom, Ho na Martuah In
lirik:
1. Sonang ma modom ho na martuah in.
Na dob marsaran humbani horja in.
Hinorjahonmu bai hajolmaon on.
Janah mangihut ma bam hu surga in.

2. Domma iapus ganupan iluhmin,
Humbai matamu ibaen Tuhanta in;
Tangis ijia mamboan bonih,
Malas uhurmu nuan manabi.

3. Anggo marhata Tuhanta Jesus in,
Na manorusi ganup tanoman in,
Lao mamuhoi ganup na matei,
Puho sidea marhasangapon.

4. Bamu, o Tuhan, hamuliaon in,
Ai Sipagoluh do ham bai jolma in;
Matei hanami halani dousa,
Manggoluh use ibahen Jesus.

1. Anggo sihol hu atas sai papodas mangayaki in hujin.
Tuhan Jesus do mangungkab ipatalag labah na iatas in.

2. Lao ma ahu marayakkon haliharon i nagori atas in,
rap ma au ‘pa malekat mandodingkon tunggung ni Tuhanta in.

3. Jesus, na parlobei laho, togu Ham ma au bai parsaranan ni
biri-biri tinobusan, na binobahon humbai hasombuhon in.

4. Seng be ahu ra jamaan ni ganupan arta na i tanoh in.
Soh au bani halimisan, seng ra ahu lao ma au hu surga in.

5. Bere Ham haporsayaon, hagogohon mamingkirhon pasal in.
Ai masihol do uhurhu bai Tuhanku pakon ianan-Ni in.

6. Ai podas do tarpatupa Ham Jahowa, hamegahonkin ijin.
Humbai babah ni tanoman tararahkon Ham do tonduynami in.

7. Jesus Ham do na mamorsan sitaronon, uhum bani dousakin;
Seng be pala habiaran pananoman, puho use au hunjin.

8. Bani surga, ‘ge bai tanoh Ham pargogoh pujionku sai tongtong.
Jesus Ham hagoluhanku, hu lambung-Mu, alop ma jabolon-Mu.

1. Idingat halak dagang do hasusuran ni in.
Ai hira marsinondang ijin bintangni in.

2. Tongtong siholan ia hubai hasomanniin;
Sihol homa ma ia lao mangayaki in.

3. Hape tubuhan poyon ganup tanoman in;
Mambahen parsahaitan do in bai uhurniin.

4. Ai ma mambaen uhurni mardingat langit in,
Mangkawah bai bintangni na marsinalsal in.

5. Dob ai nini uhurni: Ija hasomankai,
I lambungni Bapani i hasonangan ai.

6. Masihol do uhurni bai na iatas in,
Sihol ihutkononni hu hasonangan in.

7. Alo amang pardagang, ai sihol sonang ho?
Sai ulang bai na alang, sai hapataran ho.

8. Porsaya ma bai Jesus sibere tuah in;
Ai domma ho itobus igalar dousamin.

9. Ai sol arahkonon-Ni na dob porsaya in,
Ganup tinobus-Ni hu hasonangan in.

1. Girah do roh ajalhu, lao masuk hu rumahku, hu hasonangan in.
Ganup amang inang-ku, seng bulih tangisanmu,
Au na marayak surga in.

2. Pondok tongon umurhu, tarsulur do rupeihu ibere Naibata.
Seng roh be naboritku, seng tubuh be horungku,
malas ni uhur mando da!

3. Na dong ibere Tuhan madokah au marsaran ipartangisan on.
Ai anggo matei diri, bai haposoon diri,
malas ni uhur in tongtong.

4. Ai lang be kahuaon ni ganup hajahaton na i dunia on.
Tor ise ma manosak ganup na sonang mulak,
hu hasonangan na tongtong.

5. Ijia megah lobei ham manonggor parlahouni dakdanakmu on.
Nuan tongon marhoru do ham ibaen anakmu,
na masuk hu tanoman on.

6. Padirgakma ulumu, sai tatap ma Bapamu, sai tunduk nasiam.
Bai ganup pambahen-Ni; ai tong do in mararti.,
ase tarapoh nasiam.

7. Ibotoh Naibatanta na boi hagoluhanta, sitongoson-Ni in.
Sagala na dob masa ibotoh Naibatanta,
sai na madear ujungnin.

8. Ai roh do ham magira mangidah au i surga, marhiou na lopak,
marrudang hagoluhan mamahei hamonangan;
ijin ma use in talar.

9. Ijin ma pujionmu rap pakon au anakmu Tuhanta Jesus in.
Sai hadearhon ham ma ganupan pambahenan
ni Naibata Bapanta in.

1. Barah ma jumpah padan in, in ma panrohni Tuhan.
Hubani manisia in, mandabuh paruhuman.
Bai ganup na manggoluh in, age bai na dob matei in,
Sonai do ihatahon.

2. Nabogei ma gomos ijin tarompit ni malekat;
Ganupan puho ma ijin, na matei pinaingkat.
Sagala na manggoluh in mamintor mubah ma ijin,
Ibaen Tuhanta Jesus.

3. Basaon ma podas ijin pustaka partingkian,
Ni ganup na dob ongga in binaenni hajolmaon;
Ijin torang ibogei bei ganup hinorjahonni bei
Sadokah bai goluhni.

4. Mangarou ma ganup ijin na mengengkar Tuhannta,
Na longkot tong uhurni in bai arta na lao seda.
Ihutkononni ma ijin sibolis, sipangagou in
lao hu nagori toruh.

5. Urupi Ham ma au ijin, Ham parholongni atei,
Ase tarsurat gorankin tanda ni dousa sahei.
Tenger ma uhurhin ijin, ai domma talu munsuhkin,
Margalar ma utangku.

6. Halani ai jagai Ham au das bani paruhuman,
Sai Ham ma paluahkon au ampakon ni hasoman!
Ham ma pujionnami bei, dob das hujin hanami bei,
i surga hasonangan.

7. O Jesus, dokahnin hape ari-Mu paimaon;
Mabiar hanai on ope ibahen sitaronon.
Sar roh ma Ham, sai roh tongon, paluah Ham hanami on
Humbai ganup pangagou!

1. Puho ho idilo sora, ni ganup sipatugah mara,
Jerusalem sai poho ho.
Tongah borngin domma susur, ho anak boru na maruhur,
Sai ulang ma tarpodom ho.
Roh ma parunjuk in, pasirsir suluhmin, Haleluya,
Marugas bei, hanima ‘le hu parunjukan banggal in.

2. Dob itangar Sion hata ni haganup sijaga huta,
mintor malas ma uhurnin.
Ai barah ma roh Huanni, Pargogoh bani hasintongan-Ni.
ai poltak ma bintang-Ni in.
O Jesus na bujur, na roh ma Ham botul, Hosianna!
Hanami pe, mangihut bei, bai malas ni uhur-Mu in.

3. Sangap dodingkononnami rap ampakon uning-uningan,
Bamu, Jesus Tuhankin.
Ai mutiha sidearan bahal ni huta sijengesan,
mandoding ganup na ijin.
Na so ongga sonin, anggo i tanoh on, hamegahon
Pitah ijin do masa in i surga sadokah ni in.

1. Ise do ganup sidea i lambung ni Naibata;
Marsotali do hudidah marsinalsal do homa.
Ganup do mandoding bei sai riap mamuji bei.

2. In ma da, na dob maluah, halak na tongon bujur.
Hasomanta na martuah na porsaya in botul.
Bai Tuhanta Jesus in, na mangkopkop hita on.

3. Na maparngit, tinaronni, sanggah na i tanoh on;
Na sombuh na sain dokahni, gabe hasangapon do.
In do rupei nin nuan, malas uhurnin ibaen.

4. Na mandoding do sidea pasangapkon Jesus in;
Na tangkas ijin ididah sintong ni Hata-Ni in.
Na pinarbagah-Ni in, ondos do ganupan in.

5. Seng be hona bai sidea sambor ni dunia on;
Seng be dong ijin taridah sisunsahi hita on;
‘Ge ganup dousanta pe, seng dingaton be hape.

6. Horah, lohei, ampa loja, ‘ge borgoh ni ari in.
Porkas, longgur, haba-haba, udan, milas ari in;
Uhum bani dousa in, seng be hona in hujin.

7. Ai bai Naibata sidea, si pasabaou uhur in;
Jesus do tongtong ididah i nagori atas in;
Hatuahon do ijin sadokah-dokahni in.

8. Tuhan Jesus, Rajanami na marholong atei in.
Sasap Ham ma dousanami, jolom tangannami on!
Haganup na ijon, sai pamasuk use on.

1. Hata-Mu ale Tuhanku, arta siharganan ai
Sai palongkot bai uhurhu, ulang lang hujolom ai
Anggo seng be sijoloman Hata na madear ai
aha ma na baen onjolanni haporsayaonkin

2. Ale Jesus sai kawahkon, sai parorot Ham au on
‘Se totap haporsayaon mangiankon uhurhon
Sai paringgas Ham uhurhu, manangihon Hata ai
Sai horahan bai podah-Mu, songon si Maria ai

3. Sada horjaonkonnami, ipindo uhur-Mu in
Ningon holong ateinami, bai hasomannami in
Ase roh ma gogohnami, manghorjahon Hata-Mu
Manghahulhon diri nami, bai hasoman ‘pa Bamu

judul: Ija Parsaranan na Gok Sonang in
lirik:
1. Ija parsaranan na gok sonang in, harohan ni tonduy ija nani in.
Tor dong parsaranan ni tonduy ijon, bai tanoh ni jolma na mardousa on?
Seng dong, seng dong i tanoh on, Ai hasusuranta i surga tongon.
Seng dong, seng dong i tanoh on, Ai hasusuranta i surga tongon.

2. Tadingkon ma ruhut ni dunia on, ‘se sonang ho use hu surga tongon.
Ihutkon ma Jesus, pambobai in, bai ganup na sihol itogu hujin.
Nai ma, nai ma naima tongon, ihutkon ma Jesus, irikkon tongon.
Nai ma, nai ma naima tongon, ihutkon ma Jesus, irikkon tongon.

3. Ganup na porsaya bai Tuhanta in, dapotan ianan na dear ijin.
Tongtong do mandoding na ondos hujin, ibaen hamegahon na masa ijin.
Amen, amen, haleluya! Napuji ma Jesus ampa Naibata.
Amen, amen, haleluya! Napuji ma Jesus ampa Naibata.

1. Dong do openi parsaranan, uhurhu jolom hata in;
Ai mase ho tongtong holsohan binaen ni halojaonmin?
Sai tonggor ma hatuahonmu ai Jesus do hagoluhanmu doras
marlintun hu hujin.
Podas maronti parlawanan, podas do dapot hamonangan,
sai ayak ma hu surga in.

2. Ai iparisir Naibatanta, ianan sadokahni in;
Seng dong openi jolma sada, sirsir ma dong ianan nin.
lao matei bani pinarsilang do Jesus, ase hita sonang
lao masuk bai ianan in.
Ganupan hita on na loja, sai roh ma lah, nini Tuhanta,
parayak ma hu surga in.

3. Hanima na pusokan uhur manaron halojaon in.
Pahinsah bei ma ganup uhur, sai ulang be marhoru in!
Itaron ho marhasunsahan, sai roh ma ho bai hasonangan
idilo Jesus in.
Hanima bangsani Jahowa, sibolis in do hona hata,
ai domma talu musuh in.

4. Marsaran mando hape hita i lambung ni Tuhanta in;
Mardamei janah sonang hita tongtong bai ianan-Ni in.
Padoras hita ma langkahta, mangayak rumahni Tuhanta,
Lang bulih lolei hita on;
Sai eta hita ‘le, hasoman marlintun hu hamonangan,
dohor do hasonangan in.

1. Sai na marsididahan do na porsaya in
dob ondos pardalanan hu hasonangan in
hu hasonangan in hu hasonangan in.

2. Anting bujur ma hita manlawan dousa in
sai ulang tading hita, itongah dalan in
i tongah dalan in, i tongah dalan in

3. Sai na marsididahan do use hita on,
dob das i lambung Tuhan, dob monang hita on.
dob monang hita on, dob monang hita on.

1. Ari na so maringgan in sai songon longgur sorani
aloling nin hubangku.
Songon tiniham uhurhin bai podang na dob marot in
huja ma ahu laho?
Sai hitir-hitir uhurhin anggo hupingkir parrohmin.

2. Ai hadosaon tanoh on, sai salpu use tongon
bai ujung ni ganupan.
Anggo na roh magira in, na dong be salpu anggo in
sadokah ni dokahni.
Nadong maluah be hunjin, na lao hu hamagouan in.

3. Mabiar au mangidah ho, alo panorang na lao roh.
tor pag marlansei diri?
Mamingkir borngin na golap, ganup naborit pe totap,
lang jut ma uhur diri?
Ai seng be dong anjukni in, boritni i dunia in.

4. O Naibata, pintor do Ham, parjahat in idabuh Ham
Bai apuy na so miloh.
Pondok do pardousaon in, hapeni anggo uhum in,
Lanjar do in mangodoh;
O jolma, ingat in tongtong sadokah na manggoluh ho.

5. Sai puho ho, na modom in bai dousa hamagouan in,
Paubah ma uhurmu!
Dohor do paruhuman in, sai jaloonmu do ijin
Balos ni parlahoumu.
Sai ulang parlanseihon in, ai seng tarsibar hosah in.

6. Ari na so maringgan in, sai songon podang hape in
Maniham uhur diri.
Ari na so marpunsa in, sai pusok do tong uhurhin.
Huja ma laho diri?
O Jesus, holong atei-Mu, pamasuk au hu surga-Mu.

1. Manjaga ma hanima na bujur uhur in;
Nahiti suluh nima ai roh ma borngin in.
Na roh ma Siparunjuk bai tunangan-Ni in.
Na tong mangkasiholi Parunjukon-Ni in.

2. Pasirsir suluh nima, gok minak bahen in.
Managam Tuhannima siboba tuah in!
Ai na manjaga Sion do na mandilo ham;
Dohor ma hatuahon, roh ma Rajamu bam.

3. Hanima na maruhur, padurgak ma lah bam.
Dodingkon haleluya, marsurak nasiam!
Ungkap do tong horbangan, sirsir ma horja in.
Sai masuk ma ganupan rap pakon Raja in.

4. Barah ma roh Tuhanta marjaga nasiam;
Tangihon golpa-golpa, na dob ibogei ham!
Melele siang ari, lao ma na golap in;
Dohor ma panorangni, lihar ma ari in.

5. Nasiam na holong uhur bai huta Sion in.
Sai roh ma bai Rajamu, malas ma uhurmin!
Ai ari hamegahon na jumpah ma nuan.
Janah ganup tunangan, parrudangan-Ni ma.

6. Na tahan in manaron ganup na sahit in.
Silawan hajahaton ampakon dousa in.
Manggoluh ma hanima anjaha manrajai!
Rap ampa Tuhannima marsangap ma ijai.

7. Ijon do lambei gorsing hamonangan-Ni in.
Ijon hiou na pansing, hapintoron-Ni in.
Ijon do hadameion ni na maruntol in.
Ijon do hagoluhan ni na binunuh in.

8. Ijon do huta Sion ianan na dear.
Na gok hamuliaon na jenges, na talar;
Ijon alaman omas, ijon ma horja in.
Sirsir sortali omas bai tunangan-Ni in.

9. O Jesus, hamegakon, papodas Ham ma roh.
Seng tahan au manaron, seng sonang au ijon.
Bai tanoh paruntolon, na i dunia on;
Ham do ihasiholhon uhurhu sai tongtong.

1. I surga hasonangan in ianan sidearan in
Hujin sol laho misir au, ase rap pakon Jesus au.

2. Tongon buei ope na dong manrahut au i tanoh on,
Sai rotapkonku ma in tong, marayak surga do au on.

3. ”Daoh openi au hunjin” porini nini uhurhin,
Tor ise mangkatahon au na sirang humbai Jesus au.

4. Na parngit, na maniak pe, maronti ma ijin hape;
I surga seng be dousa le, maronti ma na jahat pe.

5. Na dong hasohan tanoh on, ai surga in do na tongtong;
Ai tanoh partangisan on, i surga sonang tonduyhin.

6. Halani ai, o tonduyhin pindahi na o surga in,
Podas ma roh mangalop ho Jesusmu, Sipagoluh ho.

7. Dear do rupeimin ijin, i lambungni Tuhanta in.
Hinsah ma tong baen langkahmin, ‘se sonang bai nagorimin.

1. Namadear tumang do mamuji Naibata;
Jahowa tinggian do malayak tong homa.
Dear do patugahkon sogod parholong-Mu
Bodari mandodingkon, bujur-Mu sintong-Mu.

2. Marhitei sigiuton na madear botul.
Maningon tong pujion ni ganup na bujur.
Ham Tuhan Naibatangku malas ma uhurhin.
Binahen-Mu hubangku bai pambahenan-Mu.

3. Tinompa-Mu tarlobih banggal tumang do in.
Pingkiran-Mu tarlobih bagas tumang do in.
Seng dapot in tandaon ni jolma na bodoh;
Ai sibar sibotohon ni na porsaya do.

4. Martunas pe parjahaat i atas tanoh on.
Age pe lambin rarat seng lalap in ijon.
Sompong iparontihon Ham haganupan in;
Ai ham do sitongtongan, Ham sitinggian in.

5. Ai munsuhmu Tuhanku, sibaen na jahat in.
In ma ripaskonon-Mu ‘se mambur merap in.
Ai mintor pagijangon ma au jabolon-Mu.
Anjaha pargogohon mamuji Ham tongtong.

6. Panonggor ni matangku sombuh bahenonMu,
Mangidah hamagouan ni imbangkin ganup.
Au sihol agouonni, hapeni sundat in.
Sininta ni uhurni iambat Tuhan in.

7. Martumbor do parpintor saporti hayu in.
Marranting do mamintor na songon ares in
Sidea na sinuan i parmingguan in
Marbuah do sidea i alaman-Ni in.

8. Sai tubuh ginomparni bai na ubanan in.
Margogoh do homani na dob matua in.
Ringgas iambilankon na pintor Tuhan in.
Na so marhagedukon ganup pambaen-Ni in.

1. O Tuhan na marholong atei na so tartimbang jolma in
Ai halak si pardousa bagei na rap mamuji goran-Mu.
Ibaen buei ni layak-Mu, marhitei-hitei Jesus in.

2. Ibahen Ham do pardearan, salosei dousa in ganup;
In do mangkorhon haluahon bani parjahat ganup.
Ai pe tarima kasih, au on Bamu, o Naibata

3. Ai domma roh Tonduy Napansing, hu tanoh on sinuruh-Mu
Papuho uhur na mapansing bai ganup pinilih-Mu.
Mamuji Ham do halanin, uhurhu na mabayu in.

4. Tarima kasih ma uhurhu ibahen bagah-bagah in;
Seng rotap holong-Mu hubangku age ronsi antigan in.
Toguh do padan-Mu ijin, age pe seda tanoh in.

5.’Ge hagoluhan, hamateian, na borit ‘ge na parngit in,
Seng boi be in baen parsirangan ni holong-Mu hubangku in.
Marhitei-hitei Jesus in, bujur do uhur-Mu ijin.

judul: Idop ni Uhur ni Tuhan Jesus Kristus
lirik:
Idop ni uhur ni Tuhan Jesus Kristus
Holong ni atei ni Naibata
pakon parsaoranni Tonduy Napansing
Mangkasomani hita haganupan.

1. Uhurhu hamegahkon ma, na roh humbani Naibata.
Ganup dear layak-Ni;
ai tonggor ma gan juma in, harangan pakon pohon in
majenges do rupani, majenges do rupani

2. Ganupan na ijuma in,sai pasangapkon Goran-Ni
Tuhanta Naibatanta;
Ai omei i jumanta in, ‘ge bulung na maratah in,
Ipuji do Tuhanta, ipuji do Tuhanta.

3. Ganupan bunga-bunga pe, na lobih dear in hape
humbani sidearan,
ni si Suleman, raja in, in ma patambah sangap ni
Tuhanta na iatas, Tuhanta na iatas.

4. Marhata manuk-manuk in, marsora na laingan in,
Tuhanta idodingkon;
Bonsala, roba-roba in ampakon ni na legan in,
Lurlur tumang tangaron, lurlur tumang tangaron.

5. Sonaha au mangar in, tor sip soh-soh ma au ijin?
Palis ma in, uhurhu!
Ibahen ai sai dihut au, mamuji ‘pa maniru au
Mamuji Naibatanku, mamuji Naibatangku.

6. Sonin pe na madear in, na jenges in i tanoh in,
sonaha ma magira
na dear in i surga in? In ma pingkiri, uhurhin,
hujin ma ho palongkot, hujin ma ho palongkot.

7. In ma tongon, sai sol hujin pintorhononku tonduyhin,
hu lobei ni Tuhanku.
Ijin mandoding-doding au, ijin marhasangapon au
mamuji Naibatangku, mamuji Naibatangku.

1. Damei do nimu bereon, Jesus bani bangsa-Mu,
Tonduy-Mu do pasaudkon, hata bai jabolon-Mu,
Na doyuk janah masombuh, au seng patut rongkon Ham
Tonduy Na Pansing ma suruh ‘se gogoh manombah Ham.

2. Ale Tonduy Sipardamei sai masuki hanai on.
Sai pasada uhurnami, ‘se marbuah ganup on.
Sai tangima pinggol nami lao manangar ojur-Mu;
Ase tambah ringgas nami pararatkon hata- Mu.

3. Sada horjaonkon nami, ipindo uhur-Mu in;
Ningon holong atei nami, bai hasomannami in
Ase roh ma gogohnami, mangkorjahon hata-Mu.
Mangkahulhon diri nami bai hasoman ‘pa Bamu.

1. Marhorja pe hapeni ganup partidah in
Hape anggo jadini bai Naibata do in
Ibahen milas ari marudan namur pe
Tongtong pasu-pasu-Ni marguru Bai hape
Ganup halayakon ibere Naibata
In pe tenger uhurmu da bai Tuhan Naibata!

2. Humbani Naibatanta sagala na dong in,
‘ge horsik sangkamata, ganupan tanoh in.
Tinompa ni Hata-Ni marbulung hayu in.
Sonai age buahni ‘pa bunga-bunga in.
Ganup halayakon ibere Naibata
In pe tenger uhurmu da bai Tuhan Naibata!

3. Tuhanta manjadihon ganup panondang in,
Tuhanta mangaturhon ‘ge hombun, logou pe;
Lao pamalas uhurta, jorgit angkula in,
Ganupan Naibatanta do manumpakkon in.
Ganup halayakon ibere Naibata
In pe tenger uhurmu da bai Tuhan Naibata!

1. Megah-megah hape langit ampa bunga-bunga pe,
nin homa do manuk-manuk, Naibata ipuji bei.

2.’Ge harangan pakon dolog sai marratah-ratah bei,
Ganup jolma pe marolob, Naibata ipuji bei.

3. Manuk-manuk na tarhurung bai borgoh ni ari in,
Gatian sonin tarhurung jolma i rumah ni in.

4. Laho hita rap mardalan hu jumanta, sabah pe,
Pardiatei na sinuan marmalas ni uhur bei.

1. Haholongi si Parmahan na dear maruhur in,
Tuhan Jesus do mamorsan, haganupan dousamin.

2. Anggo kahou biri-biri, na pinarmahan-Ni in,
ra matektek do iluh-Ni laho mangindahi in.

3. Tor lamlam do pangabing-Ni bai ganup na kahou in,
paulakkon hu harangni humbai halimisan in.

4. Sai jojor do isarihon ganup pinahan-Ni in,
ai daroh-Ni iduruskkon manggalari utangnin.

5. Tuhan Jesus do hasoman ni ganup dakdanak in,
Na tongtong marhulanhulan pasangapkon Goran-Nin.

1. Ise do angging-Ku atap botouhin
Nini Tuhan Jesus bai dakdanak in.

2. Ganup sihorjahon hatang-Kin torang,
aai pasu-pasuon ase sai sonang.

3. Sai ringgas ma hita mandalankon in.
ase dapot hita pasu-pasu in.

4. Jesus Tuhan nami torih hanai on!
Na danak hanami na marlajar on.

5. Sai padaoh dousa humbannami on,
ase sai dohor ma Ham bannami on.

1. Sai sihol usihanku ham Jesus Tuhankin
Bai toruh ni uhur-Mu lamlam ni Hata-Mu.
Sonaha bahenonku lao mandalankon in
Sai ham ma alo Tuhan manolong ai ijin.

2. Sai sihol usihanku Ham Jesus Tuhankin.
Ganupan ningon saud Titahni bapa in.
Sonaha bahenonku lao mandalankon in
Anggo lang Tuhanku manolong au ijin.

3. Sonaha bahenonku maniru Tuhankin
Gok dousa do uhurhu age angkulangkin.
Urupi au, o Jesus sai sasap dousangkin.
Suanhon bai uhurhu holong ni atei-Mu.

1. Sai hupasangap tongtong ari on, bai goluhkon, bai goluhkon
Ai sai martumpu hanami tongtong, irumah on, i rumah on
Sonang do uhur marlajar ijon, gok do ambilan tangaron ijon
Nin homa doding sai tambah tongtong,
megah au on, megah au on.

2. Seng dong ngolngolan uhurhu ijin, sonang ijin, sonang ijin.
Ai sai hurangan tongtong pinggolhin,
sanggah ijin, sanggah ijin
Megah hanami mandoding ijin, rapkon hasoman mabuei ijin
Sai tong hudingat Tuhanku ijin, parholong in, parholong in.

1. Malas ni uhurta tangar ma domma tubuh Kristus, jalo ma!
Tangar ma, tangar ma na binaen ni Naibata.
Haliharon domma roh, hu dunia on
Hasonangan domma dong bani uhurhon.

2. Malas ni uhurta, tangar ma, domma tubuh Kristus, jalo ma!
Tangar ma, tangar ma na binaen ni Naibata.
Ho pardousa rapat ma bai Parpintor in,
Ai sai toguon-Ni ma bai na lihar in.

1. I lambung ni parsilang do hasonangankin,
Na dong tarbaen be sirang uhurhu in hunjin.
Parsilang na i Golgata hu haholongi ho;
Ai rapat au bai Naibata na marhiteihon ho.

2. I lambung ni parsilang do pangarapankin,
Na lao hu bai na sonang nagori atas in.
Parsilang na i Golgata sitobus tonduyhin,
Sai sihol tong ma ho ratah idingat uhurhin.

1. Ale Tuhan Bapanami na marholong atei in;
Sai pasorap Ham bannami Tonduymu Napansing in.
Tonggor au, tonggor au Tonduy-Mu sai bere au.

2. Sai palongkot bai uhurhu Tonduymu Napansing in.
Sai pabayu ma uhurhu, saloseihon dousangkin.
Ingat au, ingat au, Tonduy-Mu sai bere au!

1. Piga bintang na i langit, domma ibilangi ho;
Piga hombun na mardalan, ongga do ihira ho.
Naibatanta do mamilang ganup bintang na marlinang
Ulang magou age sada, ai ganup do in harga.

2. Piga porkis na manggoloh na iatas tanoh on?
Piga ihan na manggoluh bai ganup dunia on?
Naibatanta manandasi haganupan bilanganni.
Naibata do manompa ronsi porkis hape da.

3. Piga anak pakon boru na iatas tanoh on,
Na hotop marguro-guro i alaman in tongtong?
Megah uhur ni bapanta bani haganup sidea,
Sai holong tumang atei-Ni na mangidah hita da.

1.Puji Jahowa ale tonduyhu, puji ma Ia Naibata min
Paima bois ope bohalhu, sai pujionku layak-Ni in
Sitompa daging tonduy pe, ningon ipuji do hape
Haleluya! Haleluya!

2.Ge pe sangap partubuh ni jolma, ningon do mulak hu tanoh in.
Hauhuron ni ningon marpunsa. anggo ibondut tanoman in.
Seng jolma hasonangankin. Naibata hatundalankin.
Haleluya! Haleluya!

3.Martuah halak na niondingan ni Naibatanta Jahowa in.
Na tong toguh marhaporsayaon,bai Jesus Kristus Tuhanta in.
Ai Naibata hasomanmin, seng anjai hurang tuahmin.
Haleluya! Haleluya!

1. Haleluya ari Minggu, ari sidearan in
Anggo diri lao martumpu, ‘pa hasoman Kristen in.
Ari na sumurung in, pamalaskon uhur in

2. Na marsaran do tonduyhu bani ari Minggu in.
Ganup pusok ni uhurhu huogapkon do ijin.
Das hubagas uhur ni Jesus Kristus Tuhankin.

3. Parhorjaan ari-ari hutadingkon do ijin ,
Ase hupasari-sari goluh partonduyon in.
Arta siharganan in jumpah au bai Minggu in.

4. Harosuh-Mu, 0 Tuhanku sihol bahenonku tong .
Hupadear parlahouhu pasangapkon Ham tongtong.
“Hiou hapintoron” in bere Ham bai tonduyhin.

5. Sai papuho Ham uhurhu, sai ajari Ham au on.
‘Ge pangapoh na tarsulur tongos Ham bai uhurhon.
Baen sombuh sadari on, ‘ge horah ni tonduyhon.

6. Pasu-pasu ma ambilan i kuria-Mu ganup.
Sai pasorap bai Pandita, ge parhorja pe ganup.
Tonduy-Mu Na Pansing in marhidorat baen ijin.

7. Sai pabayu Ham ma padan bai na porsaya Bamu .
Sai pagogoh Ham susian pasangap kon goran-Mu .
Tonggo pakon dodingnin, tangar Ham ganupan in.

8. Sai urupi au Tuhanku manipat sadari on .
Bogei Ham pangindoanku songon na pinungkahkon;
Sai huhasiholi ma minggu-Mu , o Naibata,

1. Aha ma dodingkononku ase pujionku Ham.
Ale Tuhan Naibatangku Ham ma mangurupi au.
Seng na tarpajojor ahu holong-Mu tongtong hu bangku.
Halaniin hupuji do ham marribu hali lo.

2. Sai puhoi Ham uhurhu, mandodingkong gogoh-Mu.
Ampa idop ni uhur-Mu, ronsi halayakon-Mu.
Ai sonai do isaksihon tonduy pakon pamatangku.
Halaniin hupuji do ham marribu hali lo.

3. Ai buei tumang dousaku ipingkiri uhurhin.
Tapi longang do uhurhu manimbangi holong-Mu.
Pasaloseihon dousangku, ale Tuhan Naibatangku.
Halaniin hupuji do ham marribu hali lo.

4. Haholongan, halayakon, Hata hagoluhan in.
Ampa ganup hadoyukon sai ipakei Ham do in.
Mangarahkon au na magou, masuk bai Harajaon-Mu.
Halaniin hupuji do Ham marribu hali lo.

5. Sai patoguh Ham uhurhu pasangapkon Goran-Mu.
Ampa haporsayaonku, lambin tambah ma Bamu.
Sai pamasuk Ham, o Tuhan tonduyhin bai hagoluhan.
Mandodingkon Ham ijin sadokah-dokahni in.

1. Puji tongtong Jahowa tongon
pardear gabei parholong atei sadokahni in;
pardear gabei in parholong atei in.

2. Ingat tongtong, ale tonduyhon.
Ganup na jenges, ibahen Tuhan Naibata hubam;
Dear layak-Ni do na pagoluhkon ho.

3. Seng dong tongon pargogoh tongtong.
Na songon Bapa, Tuhanta Naibata i surga in.
Gogoh tumang do in, tunggung tumang do in.

4. Jombut botul Jahowa bujur.
Na marmulia bai haganup na tinompa-Niin.
Hamuliaon ma bai Tuhan Naibata!

5. Sombah bujur Jahowa botul.
Marhahormaton ma hita bai Tuhanta Naibata.
Sai rap marsombah ma bai Tuhan Naibata.

6. Sai bujur bei mandoding ale.
Mamuji-muji Tuhan Naibata i surga in.
Pardear gabei in, na marmulia in.

1. Ungkab labah na majenges rumah ni Naibatakin;
Ai hujin do au maringgas bani ari Minggu in.
Hupindahi do ijin bohi ni Naibatangkin.

2. Domma roh au Ham Tuhanku, roh ma use Ham hujon.
Ai i rumah ianan-Mu hamegahon do tongtong.
Masuk ham bai uhurhon, rumah-Mu ma in tongtong.

3. Sai hormat ma parlahouhu dompak bohi-Mu ijin.
Suruh Ham ma bai uhurhu, Tonduymu Napansing in.
Ase sai tongtong torsa tonggo ’pa dodinghu da.

4. Doskon tanoh na lambutan ma au on Bamu tongtong
Sai sihatkon hadearon hubahas uhurhu tong.
Sai tumpaki Hata-Mu, ’se marbuah haganup.

5. Sai toguh haporsayaon bahen Ham bai uhurhon.
Ase ulang be rampason ni sibolis artangkon
Togu Ham ma au tongtong bani dalan na sintong.

6. Parsahapkon au Tuhanku, ase hutangihon Ham.
Patuduhkon Ham hubangku dalan pasangapkon Ham.
Sai pabosur Ham tongtong tonduyhon na loja on.

1. Domma roh hu parguruan hanai on na ijon
sol hu hagoluhan.
Jesus idingat hanami hata-Mu nidok-Mu
Ham hasomannami.
2. Ham patorsa uhur nami ulang lao bai na daoh.
Mampar uhur nami.
Ham patiur pinggol nami! Hata-Mu nidok-Mu.
Sol arusannami.

3. Suruh ham Tonduy Napansing ’se turei hani bei,
janah sai mapanasing.
Ase misir hakahouaon, dousa pe laho bei,
timbul hagoluhan.

4. Pabotohkon Ham bannami holong-Mu, idop-Mu,
pagoluh hanami.
Ase sai mardos ni uhur hanai on, sai tongtong
manlawan na sambor.

5. Jesus, seng ihagigihon uhur-Mu, haganup
partonggo na sintong;
In tenger ni uhurnami dompak Ham, o Tuhan
Sitobus hanami.

1. Tatap hanai on na humpul ijon
Sihol do pujion nami layak-Mu o Tuhannami.
Tatap hanai on na humpul ijon.

2. Togu hanai on, na mardousa on;
Ale Jesus Tuhannami, sai maidop ham bannami.
Togu ham tongtong na mardousa on.

3. Sai parorot Ham, ganup hanai on;
Humbai ganup munsuh nami, ulang magou be hanami;
Sai parorot Ham, ganup hanai on.

4. Sai urasi Ham ganup hanai on;
As mubah uhurnami, sai borsih ma tonduynami.
Sai urasi Ham ganup hanai on.

5. Sai ajari ham ganup hanai on;
’Se ganup botohonnami dalan sidalanannami.
Sai ajari ham ganup hanai on.

6. Sai pintori ham ganup hanai on;
Sai unduk ma uhurnami mansopotkon dousanami.
Sai pintori ham ganup hanai on.

7. Sai pamasuk Ham ganup hanai on;
Ulang modom be hanami bani pardousaon nami.
Sai puhoi Ham ganup hanai on.

8. Sai pamasuk ham ganup hanai on;
Bai na jumlah ajalnami anggo bois bohalnami.
Sai pamasuk Ham das hu surga in.

1. Hata ni Jahowa Sipadamei jolma, hagoluhan in
In malas ni uhur, na mangapoh uhur namarhoru in
Gogoh ni Naibatangkin, paluahkon na porsaya humbai ganup dousa

2. Ganup pinarsinta sanggah lang itompa tanoh on ope
‘Ge na tinujuan ni ganup galangan, jumpah do use
Uhur ni Bapa-Ni in ipasaud Jesus Kristus, jolma in itobus

3. Domma ipasirsir idopni uhur-Ni, ‘ge layak-Ni rup
Domma matei Kristus, domma dob itobus hita haganup
Sangap ma bai Naibata na porsaya bai Hata-Ni in pagoluhon-Ni

4. Hata hagoluhan do nuan iboan Parambilan in
Na lampot tangaron, in do iberehon bai uhurta in
Ipodahi hita on ihatahon bei do hita paubah uhurta

6. In nuan onjolan na totap manahan sadokahni in
In hajongjonganku, in pangajamanku hagoluhankin
Sai totap ma gogohkin mangirikkon bai hata-Ni lao pasaud rosuh-Ni

7. O Jesus tangihon na hupangindohon holong atei-Mu!
Bere Ham ma gogoh lao marayak surga das hu lambung-Mu
Ase hu Bamu au roh anggo rotap ma hosahku, sai lihar dalanku

1. On panorang hasonangan anggo Ham o Jesuskin.
na pahusor bai pingkiran idop ni uhur-Mu in.
Anggo Jesus pinindahan, pitah Jesus na surahon,
ari na jenges ma in na pasonangkon uhurhin.

2. Sai ibere Ham hu bangku Jesus, hinalayak-Mu;
Sai ringgas do ham manohu na sihol bai Hata-Mu.
Gok bah tubuh hagoluhan dapot do Bamu, o Tuhan.
Sai dapotan do bujur haganup na roh Bamu.

3. Halaniin, o Tuhannami, tohu Ham Kuria on.
Pasu-pasu ham hanami ‘se bosur bai podah-Mu.
Sai sonai hanami bei, ase sai marulih bei.

1. Bere ham ma hatorangan, hapentaran mangarusi Hata-Mu
ampa mata na mangidah pakon uhur na mambotoh dalan-Mu
Ase tongtong mandompakkon, bohi-Mu hanai mardalan
ase igomgomi tonduy-Mu hanami.

2. Sai ajari Ham hanami, na tongtong ibagas haotoon in.
Sai porsaya ma hanami, Ham tumang do hagoluhan nami in
Roh dokahni, roh dohorni, uhur-Mu bai uhurnami
Sai sadalan pakon Hata-Mu hanami

3. Sai martuah ganup hita, na mambahen Jesus arihanni in
Ambit sai tongtong ra hita, martenger ni uhur bai Tuhanta in
Ham, o Jesus, sai patoguh hanai na i parporangan
ase jumpah bai ujungni hamonangan

4. Sai tangihon Ham, O Tuhan, anggo roh martonggo hanai on Bamu
Pasu-pasu marlobihan, bereonkon-Mu bai naroh hu Bamu
Hasomani Ham hanami, ase hot bai parpadanan
Ase ondos hanai on bai hagoluhan.

1. Ari na marhasonangan in ma ari Minggu in
Ari in do parsaranan bai ganup parhorja in
Sai martuah halak in na ringgas marminggu in

2. Ai sonaha pakeianku marayakkon Naibata?
Unduk, toruh ni uhurhu, ai do hiou na tama.
Anggo domma dong sonin, boi ma au bai Tuhankin

3. Ham, o Tuhan sai pagoluh, sai ajari Ham au on;
Anggoa bumbang, sai patoguh janah apoh Ham au on
Hata-Mu patorang Ham, sai tongtong bai uhurhon

4. Pasaud Ham ma pangajaran na nidok ni Hata-Mu;
Ham patoguh parpadanan bai ganup na roh Bamu
Sai totap urupi Ham na martonggo dompak Ham

judul: Dob Salpu Taun na Buruk in
lirik:
1. Dob salpu taun na buruk in, Ham ma hupuji Tuhankin
Ai iparorot Ham tongtong tonduyhu pakon dagingkon
Ai iparorot Ham tongtong tonduyhu pakon dagingkon

2. Holong ma Ham, o Jesus, patorap Ham gabei-Mu in
Bani Kuria-Mu tongtong ibagas taun na baru on
Bani Kuria-Mu tongtong ibagas taun na baru on

3. Patotap Ham ma Hata-Mu, na mangapohi uhurhon
Tapi pangagou haganup, padaoh Ham ma in tongtong
Tapi pangagou haganup, padaoh Ham ma in tongtong

4. Sai sasap Ham ma dousangkin, dousangku taun na salpu in
Sai uras Ham ma in ganup, Tuhan holong ma atei-Mu
Sai uras Ham ma in ganup, Tuhan holong ma atei-Mu

5. Urupi, pargogohi Ham hanami mambalosi ham
Lao manundalhon dousa in, ampa ganup na jahat in
Lao manundalhon dousa in, ampa ganup na jahat in

6. Sai togu ham hanami on hu hagoluhan na tongtong
Totap bai Kuria-Mu, rupeini na tarsulur in
Totap bai Kuria-Mu, rupeini na tarsulur in

Laho luar masuk pe, Jesus Ham hasoman nami
Pasupasu hanai bei pakon pargoluhan nami
Togu Ham hanai o Tuhan
Das hubani hasonangan

1. Sai horahan Jesus gepe Ia
bona ni bah tubuh in hinan
horahNiin ganup ningon itahan
bai hayu parsilang na hinan

2. Haganupan gabei-Mu, o Jesus
ise ma na boi mangagak in?
Paruntolon-Mu do na manobus
Na magou halani dousa in

3. Mase sai horahan Ham, o Jesus
sanggah sonon masahit Ham?
Halani pangkopkop-Mu tumang do,
Bai jolma pardousa ganupan

4. Tor tarbaen au jongjong i lambung-Mu
hobal janah hengkeng uhurhin?
Lang sonai! Tong do parsiantaonku
Ham, o Jesus hatuahonkin

5. Dihut au horahan, ai dokah do
hupindahi hasonangan in
Loja au sadokah lang hubotoh
Jesus do tongon bah Tubuh in

6. Holong atei-Mu, ale Tuhanku
sai pasombuh Ham ma horahkin
Uras Ham ma au, ale Tuhanku
Ase saud manggoluh tonduyhin

1. Silang na mapansing in ham tongtong baen gantarhin
Lao manlawan dousa in pakon pandoleian in
Bani sitaronon in Ham tongtong baen gantarhin

2. Haganupan horjangkin, seng boi sonang aui ijin
’Ge porlu pe uhurhin, pala roh do iluhkin
Pitah holong-Mu tumang pangurupi, Ham Tuhan

3. Roh do au nuan Bamu, sai palumbang uhur-Mu!
Domma pala matei Ham ibaen holong-Mu tumang
Jalo Ham na sombuh on, parhioui tonduyhon.

4. Dousa patundukkon au, ham ma paluahkon au
Na butak tumang do au, daroh-Mu manguras au
Na sombuh, doyuk au on, ham ma artangkin tongtong

5. Silang na mapansing in, ham tongtong baen gantarhin
Anggo roh hadogaskin sanggah rotap hosahkin;
Bani sitaronon in, ham tongtong baen gantarhin

1. Ho tinobus ni Tuhanmu, ai dohor Naibatamin
Sai pasada pingkiranmu, ase sabou uhurmin
Sai patorus ma langkahmu bai Tuhanmu uhurmin

2. Sai pahusor bai uhurmu, pangkopkop ni Jesus in
Pitah halani dousamu do tarsilang Tuhanmin
’Se maluah, ’se martuah, hita na mardousa in.

3. Tarkawahkon ho Tuhanmu sanggah na tarsilang in?
Lang taruhir bai uhurmu, borit ni tinaronNiin?
Sai gogoi mambalosi holong ni uhur-Ni in

4. Sihol ma horuhononmu haganupan dousamin
Age hagoluhanmu tinaron ni Tuhanmin
Sai porluhon mansopotkon haganupan dousamin

5. Ingatonku tinaron-Mu, hutadingkon dousakin
Sai totap ma pangkopkop-Mu mangiankon uhurhin
Tonduy pakon angkulangku, upah ni tinaron-Mu

6. Na so bulih nunutonku mangkorjahon dousa in
Na so bulih horuonku Ham, o Jesus Tuhankin
Sai rosuh ma Ham, Tuhanku, dompak au hinopkop-Mu

7. ’Ge borat pe sitarono, tong do au i lambung-Mu
Halamlamon, hapormanon, isuankon silang-Mu
Ham Rajangku, o Tuhanku, das bani na matei au

8. Pangkopkopon ni Tuhanku, in do sijolomankin
Pitah in pasaud langkahku, marayakkon surga in
Lao mardomu, lao manggoluh ampa Jesus Tuhankin.

1. Jesusku na manobus ahu sai sihol haholonganku Ham
Hu dolog Golgata Ham laho iojur holong atei-Mu
Hupuji idop uhur-Mu tarlobih holong atei-Mu

2. Sai tong manosal do uhurhu, mangiadh marsik-Mu ijin
Mardingat haganup dousangku, ai do tinaron-Mu in
Hupuji idop uhur-Mu tarlobih holong atei-Mu

3. Gati huparnalang, o Tuhan, Ham na pagoluhkon tonduyhon
Mabir au lao manaksihon Ham na mangkopkop au tongon
Hupuji idop uhur-Mu tarlobih holong atei-Mu

4. Uhirhon Ham ma bai uhurhu, tinaron-Mu mangkopkop au
Hujin sati togu Ham uhurhu,s ai tong guru Bamu ma au
Hupuji idop uhur-Mu tarlobih holong atei-Mu

1. Ale Jahowa Naibata, sai tatap hanai on,
ai dousa nami nabahat,
iboan hanai on. Holong ma Ham bannami on,
sai sasap dousa nami on,
Marhitei Jesus Anak in, matei bani silang In,
i Golgata i dolog golgata.

2. O Jesus,haholongan in, sai tatap hanai on,
Ai ham do hatundalan in, jagai Ham hanai on.
Sai ulang magou on ganup, tinobus-Mu do haganup.
Taluhon Ham sibolis in, ai nabajan do akal nin;
Pagoluh Ham, hanami on romban.

3. Ale Tonduy Napansing in, sai tatap hanai on,
Sai suan Ham holong-Mu in, bai uhur nami on;
Pasada uhur nami bei, ampakon tonduy nami pe,
Lao mangirikkon ojur-Mu, mangkasiholi sondang-Mu
Parholong in, pardear layak in.

1. Martuah hataonkon, sisada Bapa in
Na tong marparuhurhon, manggolom damei in
Na tong marparuhurhon, manggolom damei in

2. Manorap anggo hombun, padear juma in
Sai sogop hatuahon, hubai hasoman in
Sai sogop hatuahon, hubai hasoman in

3. Pajumpah ma na patut, bai hasonangan in
Maluah na tarsangkut, borsih pardousa in
Maluah na tarsangkut, borsih pardousa in

4. Ganupan na porsaya, na masuk do hujin
Na gabe sakuria, sisada Tuhan in
Na gabe sakuria, sisada Tuhan in

1. Tonggor ma jenges ni in, ganup na sauhur in.
Parpambaenan na bujur, ’ge hataNi pe botul

2. Misbou do uap ni in, songon bunga-bunga in.
Ganup na tinompa in, pajagarhon tanoh in

3. Ai usih bai namur do, mangarbahi hajojor.
Jenges ni parsaoraniin, ganup na sauhur in.

4. Iparbagah Naibata, bani na sauhur da
Pasu-pasu na bahat, uhur na sonang totap.

5. Ai ija ma jumpah be, haholongan in tene?
Seng na jumpah in ijon, pitah bani Jesus do.

6. Pitah bai dirini bei, do mansari jolma in;
Kawan seng itatap be, ulang ma sonai ale.

7. Ale Jesus, Anak ni Naibata Jahowa in,
Tatap Ham ma jolma on, bani sab dunia on.

8. Sai pasorap Ham hujin, holong-Mu na pansing in.
Ajar Ham ma jolma in, marsihaholongan in.

9. Sai padomu Ham use, na so ra saor ope;
Ge pe uhurnami on, sal pasada Ham tongtong.

10. O Tuhan, sai togu ma, hanai on bai Naibata.
Na marho1ong atei in, sadokah-dokahni in.

1. Haganupan na sauhur mangindahi damei in.
Dompak Jesus na pabulus holong ni uhurta in.
Ai Tuhanta do ulunta, hita pagori-Ni in.
Tuhan Jesus do gurunta, hita susian-Ni in.

2. Tonggor idop ni uhur-Ni, na bagas, na gijang in.
Sai tandai ma holong-Ni, seng tarsibar ganup in.
Iparorot Naibatanta, bapa na tarsulur in.
Pakon Jesus pe, Tuhanta, hita na porsaya in.

3. Sai pasada Ham, o Tuhan, ganup na porsaya in.
Ase marsihaholongan, domu bai titah-Mu in.
Marhiteihon hasintongan, in do tong ipindo Ham.
Sai padomu Ham hasoman, na dob isondangi Ham.

4. Sai pasada Ham hanami, doskon Ham bai Bapa in.
Ase ulang hun bannami lao bai hakahouon in.
Ham do tong usihannami, bani horja in ganup.
In do tandani hanami, susian-Mu do ganup.

1. Bai borngin na parpudi in, paima matei Ham
Sai marsihaholongan in, iambilankon Ham.

2. Paingat Ham kuria-Mu, na maringori in.
Totap holong ni uhur-Mu, igolom ganup in.

3. Padamei Ham kuria-Mu, patoguh Ham ma in.
Maniru haholongan-Mu, pinatidak-Mu.

1. Marmegah-megah hita on mamuji Naibata.
Ai idop ni uhur-Ni do na masuk bai uhurta in.
Ibaen nuan mardomu in,
ijon sadari on, ijon sadarion

2. Halani ai sai gogoh bei, ganupan hita on.
Mamuji Tuhan Jesus in, parholong atei banggal in.
Sibahen hamegahon in
Ronsi magira pe, ronsi magira pe.

3. Sai dingat hita on tongon, mambaen sangap tongtong.
Barita ni Tuhanta in, marhitei parlahouta in.
I lobei ni hasoman in,
iatas tanoh on, iatas tanoh on.

4. O Jesus, tatap hanai on, Ham ma margogohi on.
Marhitei-hitei tondu-Mu, lao pasaudkon titah-Mu.
Mambaen rarat ambilan-Mu,
Bai jolma haganup, bai jolma haganup.

Sai Amen huhatahon, pabulus Ham uhurhu manjalo hata-Mu
Uhurhu pe tongtong, o Jesus Tuhan nami, marhitei-hitei Tonduy-Mu

1. Nasiam ganup hasoman, ringgas bei martangkap tangan,
lao mardingat Tuhan in .
Nini Jesus do ijia, ondo titah ibannima
Marsihaholongan in

2. Rap ma hita manadingkon, uhur subil na mabajan,
Mambaen parsirangan in;
Kristus in do pardomuan, na patotap parkawanon,
sadokah-dokahni in

3. Hasangap on, pamujion bai Tuhanta, pardomuan,
ni ganup Kuria in;
I utara, i dangsina, i pastima pakon purba,
ipadomu Tonduy in.

4 . Halanin sai na horjahon, uhur marsihaholongan,
bai ganup hasoman in.
Hapintoran, hasintongan, haliharon, hadameion ,
in ma tong padanta in.

1. Sai buei ope na kahou, na ihagolapan in
Sai podas Ham roh o Jesus, lao mangojur ganup in
Roh hu Harajaon-Mu, ase sonang baenon-Mu
togu Ham ganupan jolma, bai na sonang na i surga

2. Ham pabuei partonahan, suruhan-Mu na bujur.
Na mamboan haluahon, humbai dousa in botul.
Sai pasorap Tonduy-Mu, bai ganup jabolon-Mu;
Sai marrohan ma na kahou, bai na lihar in itogu .

3. Hanai on pinarmahan-Mu, Ham, O Jesus tatap ma!
Sai paringgas Ham manogu, jolma in bai Naibata;
Uhur holong tambah ma, i bannami on homa .
Mangarahkon ganup jolma, ase roh ganup hu surga.

1. Martumpu do hanami on, sauhur do ganupan on
O Jesus Tuhan nami;
Ham Raja na tarsilang in, ai ma napinagijang in,
sai roh ma Ham bannami.
On do jalo tonggo nami lao mamuji
Ham o Tuhan ibaen holong-Mu parmonang.

2. Etek do ba i mungkahni in, sai ipararat Ham do in,
in ma harajaon-Mu .
Sai iambah do bilangan ni na ga be parambilan in,
baen sangap bai goran-Mu.
Jesus, torus ma uhur-Mu, ojuron-Mu hajolmaon ,
ase saud paluahon .

3. Ham do simada hana i on ronsi ganup dunia on ,
sai Ham ningon sombahon;
Age buei na modom in hinorhon ni dou sani in,
sai Ham sitangionkon.
Ningon monang do hanami mandompakkon hagolapan.
Ham do Raja sibalosan.

1. Domma das bai hita on hata hagoluhan;
Na pasonang sai tongtong uhur pardousa on.
Anggo jinaloni in gabe na porsaya
Bai Tuhanta Jesus in na mangusir dousa

2. Halanin napuji ma goran ni Tuhanta,
Sai pasangap Naibata, pamalas uhurta
Mamestahon ari on, ari pardingatan
Bai layak-Ni na tongtong lang marparsaranan.

3. Ham, o Tuhan Naibata, Ham pujionnami;
On pe harosuhkon ma ganup dodingnami.
Sangap ma bai goran-Mu ampa Tuhan Jesus,
Sipanogu -nogu in bai harajaon- Mu.

4. Ham Bapa sai tatap Ham ganup hajolmaon !
Sai pararat Ham tongtong Hata haluahon.
Ba i na lape roh Bamu ampa Tuhan Jesus.
Ase haganupan roh marayakkon Kristus,

1. Sada do hatundalanta, na matei in mangkopkop hita,
Tobusta do daroh-Ni in,
Jesus Ham do Tuhan nami, sai Ham ompungan ni hanamai,
maharga bai uhur-Mu in.
Patorsa hanai on, Baen sangap-Mu tongtong,
sai sondangkon bohi-Mu in na basar in, bannami hasoman-Mu in.

2. Raja na marhasangapon, bolag tumang do sisabion,
otik do jabolon-Mu in.
Suruh Ham buei Pandita, na ringgas laho marambilan,
bai bangsa na i tanoh on.
Arahkon Ham ma in, ganup hu surga in,
ai martuah do haganup pinilih-Mu, bai pesta harajaon-Mu.

1. Sada Siparmahan in, pinahanni sahulanan.
Bai na jumpah ari in, haganupan hita longang.
Hatengerhon Jesus in, ningon saud Hatani in.

2. Ai dao h do ari in? Tatap ma, ai domma mulgap.
Sangap ni Tuhanta in, bani bangsa in sol sogop;
Loja do na kahou in , mambalosi setan in.

3. Jesus roh ma Ham podas , mantaluhon hagolapan;
Sai marlintun ma doras, hata-Mu bai hajolmaon.
Ase jumpah haganup, na nidok ni hata-Mu.

1. Jerusalem, Jerusalem, na timbul na hinan
Na ipagijang Naibata Ham das hu langitan.
Nuan merap pangisimin, janah maseda Ham.
Jerusalem, Jerusalem, sai hutangisi Ham.

2. Jenges ijia dodingmu mamuji Tuhan in;
Hape nuan marhoru do, ganupan anakmin.
Na hundul Ham bai orbuk in, tangistangis tong Ham.
Jerusalem, Jerusalem. sai hutangisi Ham.

3. Jerusalem, Jerusalem, ronsi na mulak Ham.
Pasangap Biribiri in, na iambungkon Ham.
Ronsi tangkas panandaionmin, bai na pinantommin.
Jerusalem, Jerusalem, sai hutangisi Ham.

4. O Jesus, tatap bangsaMu, na mambur merap in;
Uhurni pe sai golap do, sondangi Ham ma in.
Puhoi jolma haganup na manundalhon Ham.
Jerusalem, Jerusalem, sai hutonggohon Ham.

1. Jesus parmahan in isuruh Naibantantaa.
Manogu jolma in marhitei humbai hata.
Na sintong na bujur bai hagoluhan in.
Tapuji Goran-MU ibahen Kuria-Mu

2. Ondos do hata-Mu bai ganup susian-Mu,
Ase sidea rup gabe parhiteian-Mu .
Lao pararatkon in hu sab dunia on;
Harajaon-Mu in. Tambin bolag tongtong.

3. Barang ija homa jonam harajaon-Mu,
Sihol tongtong torsa ganup nirajaan-Mu.
Ai ipabangkit Ham, Panditanami pe;
Parmahanonni ma Kuria-Mu use .

4. Sai tatap Ham ma on, O Jesus, susian-Mu,
Na jongjong do ijon mangindo bai Tonduy-Mu .
Sai sorap ma tongtong, ‘ge kuasani pe,
Manogu jolma on ‘ge mangajari pe.

5. Holong ma aatei-MU pagogoh ham sidea.
Pasaud hata-Mu, sai hasomani Ham ma.
Lao mangkorjahon in Hapanditaon in,
Bannami on ganup pasorap damei-Mu.

1. O Jesus na marsangap in, Ham Raja ni Kuria-Mu
Parmahan na madear
Tongtong itatap Ham do in, ganup na pinaluah-Mu,
Ganup nirajaan-Mu.
Tatap Ham na martumpu i rumah-Mu on ganupan,
Ileobei-Mu o Tuhan.

2. Martuah do Kuria-Mu, ai na holong do uhur-Mu,
mambaen hagoluhanni;
Sai dong do pambobai in, na mangajari ganup in,
patorsa parlahou ni.
Ulang hurang bai Kur ia-Mu na susi pandita ni,
na sai tong bujur uhurni.

3. Sai tatap Ham ganupan on, i lobei-Mu do jongjong on,
manjalo jabatanni.
Na manampeihon tangan in, parhiteian-Mu mando in,
mambaen hatuahonni.
Suruh, sorap Tonduy-Mu Napansing in lao pagogohkon,
ase marhapanditaon.

1.Tangihon Ham pandoruhkon, holong ma Ham Jahowa!
Ai jut tumang do uhurhon, iben buei ni dousa
Ai ambit ibalaskon Ham, ganup salahku dompak Ham,
Ai ise boi manahan?

2. Ai idop ni uhur-Mu in, pasirsir parulihan;
Ai sedo pambaennami in, ‘ge pe marhasurungan;
Sipuji diri talu do, ningon mabiar dompak Ham,
tunduk do haganupan.

3. Sai Ham do pangajamankin, sedo pambahenanku.
Ai layak-Mu na bujur in, arihan ni uhurhu.
Sai na totap do hata-Mu, na mangapohi uhurhin,
in do huunsagahkon.

4. Ge salpu ari bomgin in, seng roh ope layak-Ni;
Lang ra be ganggu uhurhin, bani hagogohon-Ni;
Sai tong sonai do uhur ni na dob tubuh hun babou in,
sai Naibata ijolom.

5. Age buei pe dousangkin, ampakon hajahaton,
Sai bueinan holong-Mu in, na gogoh paluahkon;
Jahowa, holong atei-Mu, paluah Ham Kuria-Mu,
humbai ganup dousani.

Jesus do haholonganta, na manobus hita humbai dousa
Marhitei daroh-Niin
Daging ampakon tonduyta, hu Bani ma ondoskon hita
‘se sonang ilambung-Ni in
Sai jalo hanai on, Kuria-Mu do on, hu Bamu ma!
Ganupan on, tumpaki Ham, holong ni atei-Mu do in.

1.Sai ijalo Jesus in do pardousa na tariluh.
Ambilankon hata in bai ganup halak na kahou
Ase haganup na roh ipagoluh Jesus do.

2. Idop ni uhur-Ni in pinarbagah ni hata-Ni,
Ampa hagoluhan in sadokahni i lambung-Ni.
Haganupan na roh in ipagoluh Jesus in.

3. Pinahan na kahou in ipindahi si parmahan;
Bujuran do Jesus in mangindahi si pardousa;
Ase ulang magou in ipagoluh Jesus in.

4. Roh ganupan nasiam na pusokan uhur lalap;
Jesus do mardilo ham, ase mulak bai Jahowa;
Ulang lang porsaya da! Ipagoluh Jesus ham.

1. Ham Tuhan Jesus ham Rajangku tangihon Ham ma au tongtong
Dousangku sihol solsolanku Bamu Sigomgom tanoh on
Ai sihol do manggoluh au marhitei-hitei daroh-Mu

2. Buei do dousa ni tanganku, uhurhu pe gok dousa do
Matangku ampa angkulangku, ganupan in gok dousa do
Sai sasap Ham ma dousangkin, marhitei-hitei daroh-Mu

3. O Jesus, Paruhur na bonar, bai ganup na mardousa in
Apiti Ham hanai, na jora, na mangkorjahon dousa in
Sai sasap Ham ma dousangkin, marhitei-hitei daroh-Mu

4. Sai bere ham bai tonduynami, in ma Tonduy Napansing in
Sai Ia mangajar hanami, lao mangkorjahon Titah in
Papansing Ham hanami bei, marhitei-hitei daroh-Mu

5. Pasaor Ham hanai bai humpulan, ni halak na mapansing in
Na sonang i nagori atas, mauji-muji Goran-Mu
Pamasuk Ham hanami bei, marhitei-hitei daroh-Mu

1. Mase Ham sohsoh idarat, Ham na pagoluhkon au?
Ulang Ham marnamangadi, roh ma Ham marayak au
Jesus hagoluhankin, on do pangindoankin
Sai pamalum Ham uhurhu, humbai borit ni ugahku

2 . Anggo ugah , ai ma dousa, in do mamusoki au
Na sai tong manosak hosah , ampa damei ipadaoh
Iburai titah au binahen ni dousangkin ;
Lang dong jumpah haluahon, anggo seng Ham pasirsirhon.

3. Huayaki pe hasoman padaohkon horungkin .
Lambin tambah hadabuhan, hotopan baenon ni in.
Ham do harorohan ni ganup hasonangan in;
In pe roh ma Ham , 0 Jesus, holong atei-Mu hu bangku.

4. Tenger uhurhon bai Jesus, itangihon tonggongkin;
Uhurhon do tong itohu, gabe ianan-Ni in ;
Jumpah hasonangan in, ampa hatuahon in;
Puho ho, ale uhurhu, halupahon ma horumu .

5. Aha be habiaranku, au hinaholongan-Mu?
Seng ihira Naibatangku, haganupan dousangkin ;
Ai pintor do au ibaen, mintor anak au iain.
Siparrupei bai goran-Ni , sipanean bai arta-Ni.

1. Ia bah santektek, na otik do in,
Anggo sai manektek, sai sirnip do in.

2. Tanoh, laut, ‘ge hosah, na buei do in;
anggo gok ma dousa na bajan do in.

3. Ise do mamorsan dousamin hape?
ise paluahkon tonduymin use.

4. In ma Tuhan Jesus Siparholong in;
domma ham itobus humbai dousamin .

5. Sombah ma lah Ia Sipagoluh in,
Ia do manasap ganup dousamin.

6. Haholongi Jesus, lawan dousamin ,
ase ipatorus ganup langkahmin .

7. Dihut ipabongkot ham hu surga in,
sonang ham marolob sadokah ni in.

1. Tandai Ham ma au, pareksa Ham pakon uhurhu,
Uji Ham au, papangkei ham pakon dalanku!
Itandai Ham do au on, O Tuhan.

2. Holong atei-Mu , mangidah ganup parlahouhu,
Ai ma tongon, hotop do sai kahou langkahku.
Sai sasap Ham dousangkin , O Tuhan.

3. Sai tatap Ham au, ‘se tambah haporsayaonku;
Togu Ham au, hu surga papintor langkahku.
Halani Anak-Mu in, Naibata.

1. Na mungkab do surga, iben aha do
Ibaen na roh Jesus mengungkap bamu
Ibaen na roh Jesus mengungkap bamu

2. ltaron dousamu, i Golgata in;
Ijin do salosei ganup utangmin
Ijin do salosei ganup utangmin
