Nahiti bei suluhta barah ma Ia roh.

1. Sai kawahkon partandaan na ibabou in
Idahonmu hamonangan ni Tuhanta in
Naibata do hasomanta in ma dilo bei
Gotong hagoluhan in do jaloonta bei

2. Tonggor ma ganup suruhan ni sibolis roh
Ai buei do italuhon sai puho ma ho
Naibata do hasomanta! In ma dilo bei
Gotong hagoluhan in do jaloonta bei

3. Tatap hayu pinarsilang ni Tuhanta in
Ai maningon Ham do monang, mangajamhon in
Naibata do hasomanta! In ma dilo bei
Gotong hagoluhan in do jaloonta bei

4. Bujur bei ma nini Jesus, “Barah ma Au roh”
Uhurnami ale Jesus, gok Bamu ma tong!
Naibata do hasomanta! In ma dilo bei
Gotong hagoluhan in do jaloonta bei

judul: Jesus Sai Ham ma Pamonang Hanami
lirik:
1. Jesus sai Ham ma pamonang hanami,
tatap ma gogoh ni na golap in
Na so marsaran mangonggop hanami,
sol bondutonni ganup hanai on
Sai ipingkiri sibolis dalanni,
ase marhoru tongtong au baeonni

2. Pamonang Ham ma ai, Ham Sipartobus
janah simada au on do tongtong
Pitah Bamu mando ahu maporus
ibaen pangagou ni dunia on
Anggo maruntol parah bai uhurhu
Ulang tadingkon ham au, o Tuhanku!

3. Pamonang ham ma au, ai huahapkon
borat ni dousa ganup na hubaen
Sai tong mardingat au bai panlanggaron
sanggah bai haposoonku hubaen
Baen Ham ma in patoruhkon uhurhu
daroh-Mu in ma paingatkon ahu

4. Pamonang Ham ma au, intopi Ham ma
apuy ni hisap ni angkulangkon
Ambati Ham ma au laho mardalan
Anggo husura na jahat tongtong
Ham ma, o Jesus manggoki uhurhu
ase malum au humbai dousangku

5. Pamonang Ham ma au, anggo marujung
Ari-ariku humbai tanoh on
Ham patalupkon au, ase iusung
Suruhan-Mu hu lobei-Mu au on
Jesus, urupi ham au ase monang
ase tongtong i lambung-Mu au sonang

1. Puho ho o tonduyhin, puho lao martonggo
Ase ulang munsuhmin, roh na so binotoh
Akal ni setan in do manipu jolma
paruhur na bonar

2. Puho ho na modom in, na ibagas dousa
Ase ulang halaniin ho marutang hosah
Ai sompong, tor julnong, roh ma parlajouan
bai na so marjaga

3. Puho, ai na so tarbaen Tonduyni Jahowa
mamorangi ho, mambaen sirang humbai dousa?
Ningon do puho ho, ase bereon-Ni
dear ni layak-Ni

4. Puho, jaga uhurmin, ulang ikahouhon
Hisap ni uhurmu in, janah italuhon
Gijang ni uhur in gatian marhala
pangalopan salah

5. Sai martonggo ho gogoh, ase saud maluah
Humbai dousa haganup, ase ho martuah
Jesus do na gogoh, na boi manaluhon
haganup pangagou

6. Halaniin sai dilo ma Goranni Tuhanta
Na binaenni Naibata parsigantunganta
Teleng do dompak ho pinggol ni Jesusmu
saud na pinindomu

7. Halanin, totap ma da sai martonggo hita
bai Bapanta Naibata na i nagori atas
Lambin do sai dohor parroh ni Tuhanta
manguhumi jolma

1. Ham o Naibatangkin, dohor ma uhurhin, dohor Bamu
Ia ma na sai tongtong sihol ni uhurhon, dohor Bamu
Atap sonaha pe, pambahen-Mu use, asal dohor Bamu
Dohor Bamu, dohor Bamu

2. Ham, o Naibatangkin, dohor ma uhurhin, dohor Bamu
Rayoh pe dagingkon, borat pe uhurhon lao hu Bamu
Tong do siholan au Bamu tangihon au!
Lambin dohor Bamu, togu ma au, togu ma au

3. Ham o, Naibatangkin, dohor ma uhurhin, tarik gomos!
Ase sonang ma au ibahen layak-Mu, tarik gomos!
Ai songon pulut in dousa ni uhurhin
sai tarik Ham ma in, tarik gomos, tarik gomos

4. Ham, o Naibatakin, jaga ma tonduyhin, tangihon au
Anggo ilopas Ham sibolis pe sai roh mandorab au
Maningon Ham do in manogu uhurhin
Hu hasonangan in, tangihon au, tangihon au

5. Ham, o Naibatakin, padohor uhurhin dohor Bamu!
In do na sai tongtong sihol ni uhurhon, dohor Bamu!
‘Ge sadihari pe uhur-Mu in use,
Au roh hu lambung-Mu, dohor Bamu, dohor Bamu!

1. Sada do naporlu bangku, Jesus bere Ham ma au
Atap aha do nadong bangku, seng na boi pasonang ahu
Ge arta ge sangap, ganup habayakon,
seng boi in mamboban au bai hasonangan
Ai anggo madapot nasasada in,
sai malas uhur hu hinorhon ni in

2. Sihol bam ale tonduyhu, arta na sasada in?
Seng tarbaen in pindahanmu, anggo lang i babou in;
Ijin isiamun ni Tuhan Jahowa
do hundul Anak-Ni, na dob gabe jolma
Ai Ia do rupei na gok jenges-Nin
sai in ma pindahi da, o tonduyhin!

3. Si Maria usihanku manangihon hata-Mu
Sihol ma, ale Tuhanku, hundul au ilambung-Mu
O Jesus Tuhanku, pasada uhurhu
Paluah ma au humbai ganup dousangku
Sai Ham ma ompungan ni ahu tongtong
Sai Ham ma manggoki uhurhu tongtong

1. Ai dohor Tuhanta, unduk bei ma hita lao manombah Naibatanta
Turun Naibatanta, hutongah-tongahta ningon sip ma ganup hita
Sombah ma Naibata na tang sitimbulan na so halompouan

2. Ai dohor Tuhanta, suruh-suruhan-Ni sai marsombah i lobei-Ni
Ai hapansingon-Ni ipapuji-puji marhiteihon ni doding-Ni
Hita pe, hajojor, sai ringgas uhurta pasangap Tuhanta

3. Ham Naibatanami! Tadingkononnami haganupan dousanami
Tonduy pakon daging, ondoskononnami hu Bamu, o Tuhannami
Pitah Ham, o Tuhan sibalosannami, pasangaponnami

4. Naibata na jombut na sangap na bujur sai papansing Ham ma ahu
Bere Ham gogohku ase balosanku ham saporti suruhan-Mu
Rosuh ni uhur-Mu sihol pasaudonku, Ham haholonganku

5. Baen pansing uhurhu sirang humbai dousa, sai mardamei janah sonang
Ham pabontor ahu ase idahonku bohi-Mu use Tuhanku
Togu Ham o Tuhan hu Bamu uhurhu, Ham do balosanku

6. Sai iankon ahu rumah-Mu uhurhu, pinapansing-Mu ma ahu
Masuk Ham hubangku, ‘se holong uhurhu hu Bamu o Naibatangku!
Soh pe au, barang lao Ham ma sai hutatap janah hupasangap

1. Sai hutuju hagoluhan, na pasonang au
Hugogohi lao hu surga ronsi ondos au
Abat husimbili do, hata on hudingat do:
Sai nunuti mangidahi, hasonangan in

2. Ai tarontang au hu surga ibaen Jesuskin
Anggo sonto au mardalan na bajan ma in
Anggo na tarabat in magou do sortalinin
Hutadingkon, hutundalhon na ipudingkin

3. Ale Jesus, sai patorus langkahkin tongtong!
Togu Ham ma au na loja na ngayotan tong
Apoh Ham ma uhurhon manundalhon tanoh on
Baen maluah, baen martuah au pardousa on

4. Seng margogoh au manlawan ganup dousakin
Togu Ham ma au hu surga bai na sonang in
Sai paingat ham tongtong Hata-Mu bai uhurhon!
Pujionku ma Goran-Mu sadokahni in

1. Sai eta ma tonduyhu, marayak surga in
Sadokah ho i toruh, seng sonang uhurmin
Ijai partuahanmu, ijai do iananmu
Ijai ma sonang ho, in pe hu surga do.

2. Panrahut ni sibolis rotapkon ganup in.
Ai domma ho itobus Tuhanta Jesus in.
Ai domma italuhon ’ge dousa, hamateian.
Lao paluahkon ho in pe hu surga do!

3. I babou do Bapanta paridop uhur in.
Itatap do goluhta ai sihol sonang in.
Ibere do hiou-Ni tinonun ni Anak-Ni.
Hapintoranta in ayaki surga in!

4. Masihol do uhurhu Bamu, o Jesuskin!
Ambit marhabong ahu marayak surga in.
Pajumpah ‘pa hasoman, tor rup marhasonangan.
Mamuji goran-Mu tongtong i lambung-Mu.

5. Bamu do au marguru bai pangindoankin;
Sai Ham haholonganku, sai Ham balosankin;
Sai Ham paimaonku mardilo roh hu bangku:
“Masuki surga in bai hasonangan in!”

1. Jahowa Tuhankin, bah tubuh sijengesan
Sitompa ganup in, sibere hagoluhan
Hupindo hu Bamu, angkula na jorgit
Age uhurhu pe, ase tongtong borsih

2. Ham mangajari au, bai sihatahononku
Dear marsahap au na sambor horomonku
Sai bahen Ham au on, parhata na mantin
Margogoh ma tongon ganupan hatangkin

3. Sanggah tarsosak au, daoh ma pandoleian
Naborit in ganup sai boi ma in huporsan
Pamonang Ham au on, palamlam uhurhin
Paruhur na holong, baen Ham hasomankin

4. Padamei Ham ma au, marsaor bai hasoman
Ai in do na talup bai Hata-Mu o Tuhan
Anggo mararta au, ibaen Holong-Mu in
Ulang be saor au bai na masambor in.

5. Parorot Ham au on sadokah au manggoluh
Matua pe au on palamlam Ham uhurhu
Ulang tarrikkad au halani gabeihin
Ronsi ubanan au sai hot ma sangapkin

6. Bai na lao matei au bai ujung ni goluhku
Paingat Ham ma au, ijin, ale Tuhanku
Bai hasonangan in sai togu tonduyhin
‘Ge orbuk dagingkin, sai jaga Ham ma in

7. Bani parroh-Mu in bai ari parpuhoon
Papuho au ijin, na lao marhasangapon
Padomu Ham ma au hu bai hasomankin
Ganup tinobus-Mu, hun bani dousa in.

8. Sai pujionku Ham o Naibata, Bapangku!
Hupuji ampa Ham o Jesuskin, Tuhanku
Tonduy Na Pansing in, pujion pakon in
Sitolu sada in, Bamu ma dodingkin

1. Usih bai gilumbang in, sanggah haba-haba
Roh ni parlajouan in, lao mandorap hita
Haporusan sada do, hatundalan sada do
Kristus Tuhan na paluahkon au

2. Anggo lang taridah be bintang pakon bulan
Pangahapta golap pe, ise haporusan?
Seng do tinandaan be sobalikkon Jesus in
Kristus Tuhan na paluahkon au

3. Bai na laho matei au, sai holong atei-Mu!
Ulang sompat harom au hu nagori toruh
Sai surdukkon tangan-Mu dompak au tinobus-Mu
Kristus Tuhan na paluahkon au

4. Salpu hamateakin, roh ma hagoluhan
Pujionku ma ijin layak-Mu, o Tuhan
Sadokah-dokahni in, Ham ma sai pujionkin
Kristus Tuhan na paluahkon au

1. Patahar ma horbangan in, ai domma roh Rajanta in,
Sigomgom raja hahanup, sitobus jolma haganup.
Siboan haluahon in, palulak hasonangan in,
Inpe napuji ma, Tuhanta Naibata

2. Pintor tumang do uhur-Ni na roh hu bani jolma in;
Ai Raja parhidorat do, janah parholong atei do.
Usiron-Nin do hajojor, na manunsahi hita on.
In pe na puji rna Tuhanta Naibata.

3. Martuah do nagori in, dob ijalohon Raja in;
Uhurta pe sai sonang do dob masuk Raja in na roh.
Lihar tumang uhurta in, dob roh Panondang in hujin.
In pe na puji ma Tuhanta Naibata.

4. O Jesus, roh ma Ham hujon , domma huungkab uhurhon.
Patuduh hinaholong-Mu, ondoskon hinalayak-Mu.
Marhitei-hitei Tonduy-Mu, bobai ma au hu surga in.
Ase tongtong ijin hupuj i goran-Mu.

1. Sai togu Ham hu hasonangan au on o Jesus Tuhankin
Humbai ganup horja larangan, sai sairang Ham au on hunjin
Ija ma jumpah hagoluhan na so ibere Ham o Tuhan
Marhitei-hitei daroh-Mu?
Sai tong paunduk Ham uhurhu,
Ulang dong be sura-surangku, na so talup bai uhur-Mu.

2. Ham o Rajangku, ulang lopas lao ganggang hun Bamu au on
Patogus Ham janah pahoras bai parhuanon-Mu au on
Ija ma jumlah hatuahon i darat ni na pinindahan
ni holong-Mu hubangku on?
Hubotoh halani Hata-Mu, sai hot igolom in uhurhu
Sai hasonangankin do Ham

3. Sai sol bujur paruhuronku sadokah na manggoluh au
Ai ham tumang haholonganku, Bamu marhatundalan au
Sai tong ma jaga Ham uhurhu, pingkiran ampa parlahouhu
Tongon do anak-Mu do au
Pamasuk Ham ma au on, o Tuhan hubai ianan-Mu na sonang
Sai songon Ham i surga in

4. Ai domma pag au on manaron ganupan na maborit in
Na ra ma au arian borngin lao mangirikkon Jesuskin
Ringis ni jolma pe hutaron, ge iapasi pe hutaron
Sai huusihi Jesuskin
Ai bani ujungni langkahku, ijai ma hamalaskononku
Ganup na dong bai Tuhankin

1. Naibatangku hasomanku bai arian borngin pe
Ipatorsa do langkahku ase tahan au hape
Sai tenger do uhurhin Naibata hasomankin
Sadokah-dokahni in

2. Naibatangku hasomanku ‘ge marsitaronon au
Ia do tongtong Bapaku hinaholongan-Ni au
Sai tenger do uhurhin Naibata hasomankin
Sadokah-dokahni in

3. Naibatangku hasomanku seng na bumbang au ijin
Sai tongtong hagoluhanku idop ni uhur-Ni in
Sai tenger do uhurhin Naibata hasomankin
Sadokah-dokahni in

4. Naibatangku hasomanku na manogu au tongtong
Joloman-Ni do tanganku sanggah rotap hosahkon
Sai tenger do uhurhin Naibata hasomankin
Sadokah-dokahni in

1. Mardalan au sonari, hu hasonangan in.
Sai lambin roh dohorni, au on bai ari in.
Humbai na daoh huidah, lihar ianan in.
Sai sonang do sidea, na dob ondos hujin.

2. Buei do halilian i tongah dalan in;
Podas do au mardalan hu hasonangan in.
Buei do hasunsahan na manlioti au;
Hubontas parmaraan, mardingat Jesus au.

3. Itompas milas ari ijomba udan au;
Hotop huhabiari na mangonggopi au;
Matangku sai manatap bai situjuankin;
Ganup na huparsinta, sirsir i surga in.

4. Malas tumang uhurhu, ’ge hanar imbangkin;
Sai Jesus hasomanku, baen hatundalankin.
Sai Ia do manogu arian, borngin pe;
Tenger tumang uhurhu, hu surga au use.

5. Hugolom bai uhurhu silang ni Tuhankin;
Sai in sijolomanku, sai in haposankin;
Ai domma saud itobus Tuhanku tonduyhin;
Ai Ia do paondos hu surga langkahkin.

6. Tenger tumang uhurhu bai pardalanankin;
’Ge bois pe hosahku, sai ondos au hujin;
’Ge loja ari-ari bai pardagangan on,
Hape santongkin nari sai sonang au tongtong.

1. Puho, siang ma ari, salpu ma borngin in
Sai surut ari-ari, pardalananmin
Porluhon mansarihon, na pagoluhkon ham
Ai rohkonsi ma borngin, sai marsaran ham

2. Puho siang ni ari, tanggali dousamin
Haporsayai ma Hata ni Tuhanta in!
Dousamu in ganupan isasap Jesus in
Das ham hu hagoluhan bai na sonang in

3. Eta, sai saud ma puho ganupan hita bei!
Tahankon hata-hata, ‘ge na parngit pe!
Haganup gogohta, sai pakei ganup in
Marayak iananta na i surga in

1. Lang bulih ham mardalan sahalak ham tongon
Sai dilo ma Tuhanta, hasomanmu tongtong!
Tor boi ma ham hu surga, bai pardousaonmin?
Sai jolom Tuhan Jesus, siporsan dousamin

2. Lang bulih ham holsohan bai sitarononmin
Bai Tuhanmin ompaskon na hinoruhonmin!
Ai Ia pambobai, sijolom tanganmin
Jenges pangarahkon-Ni bai na porsaya in

3. Lang bulih ham mangkawah, lao dompak pudi in
Mardamei ma uuhrmu marhitei Jesus in!
Ai Jesus na pasirsir parsarananta in
I lambung ni Bapa-Ni ibaen holong-Ni in

4. Lang bulih be ham sangsi bai parmateimu in
Ai seng agouhonon-Ni na hinopkop-Ni in
Asal totap Tuhanta, hasomanmin tongtong
Sai ondos ham hu surga, bai ujungnin tongon

1. Martuah do na marhaposan, bai Naibata Bapanta in,
Ai in do dapot pangapohon, bai ganup sitaronon in,
Seng horsik be onjolanni, na mangkaposi Tuhan in.

2. Ai anggo sai holoshan hita, ai aha ma gunani in?
Anggo borat tongtong uhurta, mardingat sitaronon in,
‘Tor in ma mangkurangi in? Sai tambah do pangkorhonnin.

3. Halani ai, pasoh ma lobei janah palamlam uhurmin;
Manonggor atap ra ham holi mangunduk bai Naibatamin;
Ai Ia do mamilih ham, ibotoh do na porlu bam.

4. Ibotoh Jesus adanganni, mamben hamegahonta in;
Asal ganup hita haposan, ulang marladung be ijin.
Itongos do na jenges in, na so agak ni uhur in.

5. Ulang uhurmu mangagakkon, ham itadingkon Naibata.
Janah na so marsitaronon, in do iabing Naibata.
Barang sintong pingkiranmin, ujungni patandahon in.

6. Urah do anggo bai Tuhanta, marguru bai rosuh-Ni in.
Na bayak boi pasombuhon-Ni, janah bayak na sombuh in.
Longang magira uhurmin, mangidah pambaenan-Ni in.

7. In pe haposayai ma Tuhan, bujur horjahon rupeimin,
Sai Ia ma tongtong irikkon, ajamkon panumpak-Ni in,
Na mangajamkon Tuhan in, seng anjai boi tartading in.

1. Sonang do uhurhu bani Naibataku Sipagoluh in
Sai huhamegahkon, ganup binerehkon ni Naibatakin
Asal lao hu surga au, janah Jesus ilambungku, sonang ma au

2. Longkot do tonduyhu hu Bamu Tuhanku, sai totap Bamu
Sai huhagigihon na boi manirang ahu hum Bamu
Arta ni dunia on bani halak marsilongkot, in seng huhaporluhon

3. Pitah sada hansa na boi hasudungan, nini tonduyhin
In ma Jesus Tuhan na tongtong haposan, in ma rupeihin
In tumang tujuankin: bai Tuhanku ma uhurhu, ‘ge ganup artangku

4. Timbang ma layakni-Ni, idop ni uhur-Ni, hagoluhanmin
In hatundalanmu, ase tandaonmu hasonangan in
Tonduy ni na unduk in mandompakkon Naibata, na binalosan-Ni

5. Ondos bai Tuhanku pusok ni uhurhu, na sai tong hubaen
Ai pangarapanku do hagogohonku sanggah sosak au
Lamlam ni uhur-Ni in sai dingaton ni uhurhu, ase lao holsohku

6. Ganup na maporus bai Tuhanta Jesus iahapkon ma
Surut sitaronon ibaen Tuhan Jesus, layak ganda tong
Dear ni rupei-Ni in asal ma lamlam uhurni paima tingkini

1. Sai itongos Naibatamu ganup na marguna in
‘Ge borat sitarononmu, hot ma ham bai Jesus in

2. Na holsohon, mangagakkon na tarpodom Jesus in
sai inunut morong-orong, dob ni sai maila in

3. Sai tongtong maruhur Bapa Tuhan Naibatanta in
iahapkon do ganupan pusok ni uhurmu in

4. Sai porsaya: Na madear itumpakkon Naibata!
Mintor ganggang sitaronon, ‘sal unduk uhurmu da

5. Ia songon na lao bumbang, sai pasabar uhurmin
Ai ganup do isarihon Tuhan Naibatanta in

6. Hagogohon ni Tuhanta seng marparbalogan in
Seng jut uhur ni Tuhanta, barang sungkod uhur-Nin

7. Bai na jumpah adanganni, roh pangurupi-Ni in
Ai sompong do haroroh-Ni pamelahon holsohmin

8. Sai martuah do ganupan na lamlam maruhur in
Asal ma bujur uhurta, sai urah baenon-Ni in

9. Goran-Mu ma haposanku, Jesus ra do au unduk
Sai pasaud Ham, o Jesus, barang aha rosuh-Mu

1. Na marguru do ganupan
bai Jahowanta ampa panumpak-Ni in
Ganup na marhatengeran,
na mangarap bai Jahowa
in do na martuah in

2. Anggo na pagoluh ahu
ase bangku hatuahon
Naibataangku do tongtong
Na tongtong manogu ahu
Sai totap do in ibangku
ronsi hulobeian on

3. Jolma in sai tong mansari
Na so boi hasonanganni
janah na lao salpu in
Ondo do tong sura-surangku
Naibata sol haposanku
aa manompa ganup in

4. Pangarapan do pasonang
uhur ni na marhapaposan
bai Jahowa Naibata
Tuhankin do parondosan
ni goluhku haganupan
sai ibaen do na tama

5. Naibatanta do mambotoh
na madear in ibangku
panorangni lape roh
Mintor Ia ajaranku?
Paganan akuhononku
Na binaen-Ni bangku on

6. Tingki ni ari-aringku
Guru bani Naibataku
Sai uhur-Ni ma na saud
Asal ondos au hu surga
Hugogohi do mardalan
Songon bah na lao hu laut

1. Sai tenger uhurmu bai Naibata
Boan ma horumu bai Tuhanta da
Ulang lomos, jolom ma gomos
Haporsayaonmu ulang ho bobor
Jesus paluah hita tongtong
Humbai hamagouan i tanoh on

2. Sai tenger uhurmu bai Naibata
Boan ma horumu bai Tuhanta da
Lao magou pe na ijon use
Sonang bahenonon-Ni hita on use
Ham, o Tuhanku, haposankin
Boan Ham ma ahu hu surga in

1. Naha ma panjalongku, Bamu o Tuhankin?
Naha panjumpahkonku, Bamu o Rajangkin?
Sondangi Ham uhurhu, na golap na bodoh
Ai sihol bahenonku do hamegahon-Mu

2. Ganupan par-Sion-Mu do mangolobkon Ham
Sonin homa uhurhu lao mangayaki Ham
Na megah do uhurhu mamuji goran-Mu
Bujur sura-surangku pasaudkon rosuh-Mu

3. Ai seng be dong na hurang pinasirsir-Mu on
Mambaen hubangku suang damei ni uhurhon
Marhoru pe uhurhu halani dousangkin
Roh do Ham Sipagoluh pamalum uhurhin

4. Ai marhalani aha ‘se porlu uhur-Mu
Roh bani manisia, anggo lang holong-Mu?
Ham parholong ni uhur bai na tarsosak in
Ase ulang tarambur ganup na magou in

5. Ai na tarsangkut ahu, Ham mananggali ahu
Bai na tartutup ahu, Ham paluahkon au
Ham do na pasangapkon na madorun hinan
Ham do na pabayakkon na masombuh hinan

6. Ganup na pusok uhur halani dousa in
Tangihon hata mungmung na roh hun surga in
Ai roh ma Sipagoluh isuruh Bapa in
Pasonang uhurnima mamboan damei in

7. Seng be habiaranmu, pangagou in ganup
Ai domma roh Rajamu, manlawan in ganup
Maporus do ganup, i baen Rajanta in
Rendep ma haganupan, ilobei-lobei-Nin

8. Tuhanta roh magira, bai paruhuman in
Ijin ningon maila, na teos uhur in
Na marholong no atei, malas ma uhurnin
Ijin hataonkonni, “Napuji na roh in”

1. Mase ham sai tong holsohan, janah sai mabiar ham?
Hasabaron sitaronon, na dob sogop in hubam

2. Sai pindahi ma artamu, na so bolas buruk be
Sai tundali na masambor, ase sonang ham use

3. Sai porluhon manrotapkon, hauhuran tanoh on
Surga in sai tong uhurhon, sanggah ham i tanoh on

4. Sai nunuti paulakkon, uhurmin bai Naibata
Sai gomosi ma manjolom, Jesus Kristus, Naibata

5. Guru bani Naibatanta, bahen ham panlangkahmin
Amen, amen, sai pasangap, Goran ni Tuhanta in

1. Dob roh Jesus in talar ma use kuasa-Ni in
Ge holong-Ni pe
Ai Ia haposan, haporusan in
‘tor matei pe ahu sonang uhurhin

2. Dob roh Jesus in, martuah ganup
na porsaya in, sonang do ganup
Na so ra be magou na mangarap in
Ganupan manggoluh itogu hujin

3. Naborit pe roh sai manosak au
iluhku pe roh, marhoru do au
Dob roh Jesus ibangku seng bumbang be au
Ai ia gogohku, maluah ma au

4. Talar horungkin i lobei-Mu in
Hupindo Bamu, gogoh-Mu ijin
Seng tolap be jolma haporusankin
Horungku sai tambah bahenon ni in

5. Bamu, o Tuhan manombah au on
Bamu ganupan na dong bangku on
Seng bulih be sirang na rapat Bamu
Martuah sai sonang na roh hu Bamu

1. Lungun uhurmin, borit goluhmin
Adong do pangapoh Tuhanta do in
Sai Ia pahamot, mangurupi ham
Sai ulang ham sangsi sai monang do ham

2. Sadokah ijon borat uhurmu
Borit angkulamu, tariluh do ham
Sai tonggor hu babou, ai Jesussol roh
Tahankon santongkin, manggoluh ma ho

3. Ondos tonduymu bai Tuhanta in
Tarapoh uhurmu i lambung-Ni in
horumu marsaran, sai sonang ma ham
Sai ulang ham sangsi, martuah ma ham

1. Naibata do manggomgomi langit pakon tanoh on
Hagolapan igomgomi ampa haliharon on
Irajai tangan-Ni in ganup na tinompa in

2. Goran-Mu sai pujionku Ham na manramotkon in
Tonduy ampa angkulangku sonang au saborngin in
Seng na saud akal ni munsuhkin, sibolis in

3. Sai padaoh Ham humbangku haganupan dousakin
Ai marhaporusan au bai ugah-Mu, Jesuskin
In do mangondingi au, mandompakkon ringis-Mu

4. Sai puhoi Ham tonduyhu, ase puho ampa in
Janah haporluhononku goluh na i surga in
Ulang parroh-Mu use mangonggoti au hape

5. Togu Ham au, o Tuhan, mangirikkon Hata-Mu
Sai patorsa ham langkahku, ase sai marguna au
Sai parorot Ham au on, ase sonang uhurhon

6. Tonduy ampa angkulangku, uhur pakon gogohkin
Huondoskon bai tangan-Mu Naibata na sangap in
Jalo Ham ma au tongtong, ai tinobus-Mu au on

7. Suruh Ham ma suruhan-Mu, mangolati musuhkin
Ia ma mangogu ahu, ase sonang langkahkin
Boannonni do hape, au hulambung-Mu use

1. Poltak ma sogod on, Ham Panondang ni Jahowa
Sai sondangi Ham au on, ase sirang humbai dousa
Na golap bai uhurhin, usir in.

2. Doskon namur layak-Mu manorapi uhurnami;
Ai holong ni uhur-Mu padaohkon horunami;
Apoh Ham hanami on, na ijon.

3. Ai holong ni uhur-Mu mamuhoi tonduynami.
Mangirikkon hata-Mu, lambin tambah holongnami.
Hu Bamu sonai age, jolma pe.

4. Daroh parpadanan in, in ma hapintorannami;
Ganup uhur dousa in, sai daoh ma humbannami;
Haganup naborit in, daoh ma in.

5. Sondang na hun surga in, poltak bai tanomannami;
Anggo jumpah an in, puho ma angkulanami,
Masuk bai ianan in, surga in.

6. Jesus, Ham Panondang in, Ham palihar langkahnami.
Humbai partangisan in gabe hamegahonnami,
Rupei na manongtong in, surga in.

Sai parmudu Ham hanami, apoh Ham ma uhurnami,
Pasu Ham ma sipanganon, ase gabe hatoguhon.
Janah gabe hagoluhan, bai angkula hagalekon.
Ronsi ondos ‘ge hanami, das hu surga, Bapa nami.

1. Na salpu do arian in hupuji Ham o Tuhankin.
Ai das hubai bodari on, layak-Mu in bannami on.

2. O Tuhan, holong atei-Mu tambahi Ham ma layak-Mu;
Sai sasap Ham ma dousangkin o Jesus, bai daroh-Mu in.

3. Ramoti Ham au borngin on, pasonang Ham ma uhurhon;
Sai suruh Ham suruhan-Mu na sai tongtong manjaga au.

4. Dobkonsi puho au use paingat Ham uhurhu pe.
Mamuji-muji goran-Mu, ‘ge pararatkon sangap-Mu.

1. Tor sonang modom ahu saborngin on.
Anggo lang Ham, Tuhanku hudingat tong.
Na mampar do uhurhu narian in;
Baru ma pindahanku, na sonang in.

2. Sai sasap Ham dousangku. alo Bapa!
Ham paridop ni uhur, holong ma Ham!
Paborsih Ham uhurhu na butak in,
Sai tong do pujionku Ham, Tuhanku.

3. Au sihol mangusihi panasap-Mu,
Sonai pangkaholongi ni uhur-Mu;
Na sonang ma au modom saborngin on,
Ai damei marianan bai uhurhon.

1. O Jesus na pagoluh au
bai podomanku au sol lao.
Sihol marsaran dagingkin
Ham ma mangoruk labah in.
Sihol marsaran dagingkin
Ham ma mangoruk labah in.

2. Sai sasap Ham ma dousangkin,
sai jaga Ham podomankin;
Parorot Ham au borngin on,
sai jaga Ham ma au tongon.
Parorot Ham au borngin on,
sai jaga Ham ma au tongon.

3. Ganup na lao mangagou au,
bah, apuy pe, padaoh Ham;
‘Ge hamateian na sompong,
Padaoh Ham ma in tongtong.
’Ge hamateian na sompong,
Padaoh Ham ma in tongtong.

4. Sonai homa hasomankin,
parorot Ham ganupan in;
Ibagas na jorgit tumang,
puhoi Ham hanai, Tuhan.
Ibagas na jorgit tumang,
puhoi Ham hanai, Tuhan.

1. Ia loja au ibahen horja,
sai na megah au bodari nin.
Ai ijin tarbahen au marsaran,
sonang do iahap uhurhin.
Ai sonaha use nani in
anggo masuk hita use lao hu surga in.

2. Ai dong do hapeni parsaranan,
bani siirikkon Jesus in.
Dob maluah humbai paruntolon,
ampa dousa nai ‘ge setan in.
Pasonangon ni Tuhanta in.
Susian-Ni manjalohon ganup upahnin.

3. Surga in tongtong gok hasonangan,
parsaranan ni na loja in;
Sol Bamu au use marianan
ase sai tarapoh uhurhin;
Sai holong ma Ham o Jesuskin,
sai pamasuk Ham ma ahu das hu surga in.

1. Hanima na porsaya in, sai alo-alo Jesus in,
pahinsah uhur nima
Dohor ma ari pesta ni ganupan Kuria-Ni in,
bai ari partubuh-Ni
In pe laho ma hanima baen adatni manjalohon,
na marayak hajolmaon

2. Marmegah-megah uhur ma, sagala na bujur homa,
lao mangirikkon Jesus
In pe rombang patidak ma, megahmu bani Naibata
Pasaud ma harosuh-Ni
Puji, puji Jesus Kristus na manobus tonduy nima
Humbai hamagouan nima

3. Lungkari uhurnima bei, ingati dousanima bei,
porluhon uhurnima.
Tarima Sipagoluh in, ai turun do hun surga in,
manggalar utangnima.
Tanda hata hagoluhan na binoan ni Tuhanta,
pasaloseihon dousanta.

4. Ai anggo lang iboban ho, dousamu bani Jesus roh,
seng saud be ho maluah.
Tongtong ma sogop ringis ni Jahowa, Naibatanta in,
hu bam na pag manahan.
Patut, ganup dousa pakon hinasambor ni uhurmu,
pasasapkon bai Tuhanmu.

5. Jahowa, holong atei-Mu, kawahkon ma Kuria-Mu,
sai togu uhurnami.
Bai Jesus Kristus, Anak in, na roh hu manisia in,
mambahen tuahnami.
Lanjar, bujur baen hanami mandalani bai na sonang,
das bani inagori atas.

1. Sai Kristus do goluhku, lao matei untung do.
Hujai do lao uhurhu, hujai siholan do.

2. Megah tumang uhurhu marayak Jesuskin.
I lambung ni Tuhanku totap ma tonduyhin.

3. Ai Jesus mantaluhon ganup pangagou in;
Daroh-Ni padomuhon au on bai Bapa in.

4. Bai na gombur matangku sai sonak tontonkin;
Seng luar be hatangku sal roh ma Ham ijin.

5. Dob mampar pingkiranku usih bai lampu in;
Songon na mirlop-irlop na so marminak in.

6. Ijin, alo Tuhanku padomu Ham au on;
Hu surga ianan-Mu sai togu Ham au on.

7. Sai ulang be au sirang hun lambung-Mu, Tuhan!
Totap ma au magira i surga in sonang.

8. Ijin ma sal hupuji Ham pakon Bapa in,
ampa Tonduy Na Pansing bai hasonangan in.

1. Na botoh dohor ni ajalhu? Aringku lao bodari roh.
Ai ambit roh sompongtingkingku parpudi in, na botoh do?
Jesus Jesus ibahen daroh-Mu in pasonang Ham parmateihin.

2. Gati legan bai bod ni an marimbang bai sogod ni in;
Ai sanggah au ijon mansari sai tong jagaon ajalhin
Jesus, Jesus, ibaen daroh-Mu in, pasonang Ham parmateihin.

3. Ajari Ham au, o Tuhanku lao mamingkiri ajalhin;
Singatkon Ham ma bai uhurhu parmatei-Mu o Jesuskin.
Jesus Jesus ibahen daroh-Mu in pasonang Ham parmateihin.

4. Urupi Ham au pasirsirhon langkahku na i tanoh on;
Paingat Ham au mamberehon Bamu, Tuhanku, uhurhon.
Jesus Jesus ibahen daroh-Mu in pasonang Ham parmateihin.

5. Lambin masihol au hu surga tundalhononku tanoh on.
Sai huparayak dompak surga sadokah au i tanoh on;
Jesus Jesus ibahen daroh-Mu in pasonang Ham parmateihin.

6. Sai sasap Ham ganup dousangku marhitei-hitei daroh-Mu.
In ma hubaen gabe hiouhu marayak hasonangan in.
Jesus Jesus ibahen daroh-Mu in pasonang Ham parmateihin.

7. Padihut au Bamu, o Jesus, uhurhu tong bai uhur-Mu;
Huja pe Ham sai tong au dihut ijon age i surga-Mu;
Jesus Jesus ibahen daroh-Mu in pasonang Ham parmateihin.

8. Age sompong roh hamateian sadarion ge patar pe;
Seng habiaran be tanoman dob Jesus rupeihin hape;
Jesus Jesus ibahen daroh-Mu in pasonang Ham parmateihin.

9. On pe sonang ma au manggoluh, matei pe au sonang do in;
Hubotoh ipagoluh Jesus au humbai hamateiankin;
Jesus Jesus ibahen daroh-Mu in pasonang Ham parmateihin.

1. Puho do use angkulangkon, humbai tanoman on.
Mulak manggoluh bahenonni Tuhanku.
Haleluya, Haleluya.

2. Natidahkon songon omei in ganup na matei in;
Na roh ma use pangubung bai na matei,
Tuhanta in, Tuhanta in.

3. Paliharhon panonggorta in do parpuho-Ni in;
Dob sonang modom au on ibagas tanoh,
sai puho au, sai puho au.

4. Naha pe ari na gok jenges! Tapi lobih jenges
sijaloonta i lambung ni Tuhanta;
Haleluya, Hale luya.

5. Na itogu Jesus do au on hu surga na tongtong,
sonang tumang do janah marolob-olob
sadokah ni dokahni in.

1. Jerusalem! Ham huta na gijang. Sai sol bamu au on!
Malungun au, janah siholam au. Sihol marayak Ham
Daoh hun bani tanoh ‘ge laut hombun in.
Hu babou ni ganupan, mardalan uhurhin.

2. O ari in, na lihar in botul, antigan tingkimin?
Ase ijin marolob-olob au, dob ondos tonduyhin.
Bai tangan ni Tuhanku simada in hinan;
Ondos tuah hu bangku i surga na sonang.

3. Lang be dokah na lao ma tonduyhin, marayak surga in.
Tading ganup na dong i tanoh in, torang ma langkahkin;
Ai suruh-suruhan-Ni isuruh Jesus in.
Iabing bai tangan-Ni au tinobus-Ni in.

4. Jerusalem, masihol au bamu, sai ungkab labah-Mu
Dokah tumang siholhu hu Bamu, sanggah bai goluhkon.
Na gok bai hamarsikon janah doyuk homa;
Sanggah nape hujalo rupeihu na tongtong.

5. Ai ise do ganup na das hujai marhasangapon in?
In ma tongon na monang in hinan, na roh hun tanoh in.
Sai sonang do sidea na marsortali in;
Humbai na daoh huidah na lao jaloonkin.

6. Kristen buei sonai ‘ge nabi pe, ampa apostel in;
Ijia do sai iporsani bei hayu parsilang in;
Nuan marhaluahon marhasangapon rup;
Ai bani haliharon huidah haganup.

7. Doh ai use, dub ondos au hujin, masuk hu surga in.
Naibatangkin rap pakon Jesuskin, huidah ma ijin.
Ijai pe timbul tuah, malas ma uhurhin;
Mandoding : Haleluya! Bai na mapansing in.

8. Eta ganup! Ai rap mandoding do ganup i surga in.
Sarunei pe ampakon gonrang in, marhata do ijin;
Ai Naibata ipuji ‘ge Tuhan Jesus in,
ampa Tonduy Na Pansing mambaen sangap-Ni in.

9. Ham ma tongon ituju uhurhon, han huta na gijang;
Sobalan au nuan i tanoh on, sai huparsinta Ham;
Ganup tadingkononku na laho magou in.
Ase parayakonku hutangku, surga in.

judul: Naha ma Hita Ia dob Marujung
lirik:
1. Naha ma hita ia dob marujung, paruntolonta i dunia on.
Dobkonsi lang be hita on mangusung, na borat in i atas tanoh on.
Lao misir huta hu nagori atas, dob na tadangkin orbuk tanoh in;
Bai na dohor na tatap hasonangan, na pinarsinta ni uhurta in.

2. Naha ma hita anggo isondangi, panondang na so ra maseda in?
Tuhanta in paliharhon dalanta, ampa dousanta itanggali in.
Seng igomgomi tikas in be hita, seng manolsoli be uhurta
Bai na pajumpah hita ‘pa hasoman, na dob sonang tumang i sursga in.

3. Naha ma hita anggo na irikkon, panogu-nogu ni Tuhanta in?
Ai seng be dong na boi mangambat hita, humbai rupeita na i surga in.
Bai na lihar pangkawah ni matanta, mangidah Jesus, Sipagoluh in,
Na sangap in, na mangkunduli hotak, manggomgom haganup ianan in.

4. Naha ma hita anggo tangaronta, sora ni Jesus Sipagoluh in,
Mandilo hita on na dob maluah, bai pesta banggal na sirsir ijin?
Bokas ni ugah-Nin torang taridah, habaoran ni daroh-Ni tingki in.
Na paluahkon hita hunbai dousa, ‘ge hamateian sadokah ni in.

5. Naha ma hita? Seng ongga ididah, atap itangar barang ise pe.
In ma rupeita anggo masuk hita, hu surga in na dob sirsir hape.
Halani ai sai gogoh bei ma hita, ‘ge loja atap hadogason pe.
Lao marayakkon rumah niTuhanta na jenges, na gok sonangnin hape.

1. Sai na paima-ima do parrohni Tuhan Jesus
Ai Ia haluahon do bai ganup na tinobus
Roh do use Tuhanta in, ibagas hasangapon in
Sai roh ma Ham o Jesus, sai ro ma Ham o Jesus.

2. Marolob-olob ma ijin ganup na dob tinobus;
Siholan do ganupan in bai Jesus in Partobus.
Roh do use Tuhanta in ibagas hasangapon in,
sal roh ma Ham, o Jesus, sai roh ma Ham, o Jesus.

3. Santongkin nari tangkog rup marhitei-hitei hombun,
rap pakon Jesus lao ganup hu surga in ituju;
Sai longang bei do in hape, bai hasonangan in use;
I surga bai na sonang, i surga bai na sonang.

1. Songon ursa na binuru sai horahan bai bah in
Sai sonai do au mangindo sol darngos bai Tuhankin.
Sal horahan tonduyhin Bamu ale Tuhankin.
Ai antigan idahonku bohi-Mu ale Tuhanku

2. Iluh-ihuh ni matangku, sai hupangan do tongtong;
Ai sal tong nini munsuhku; “Ai ija Naibatamu?”
Sai marhoru uhurhin ai hudingat parrohkin.
Ronsi lurlur ni dodingku lao hu rumah ni Tuhanku

3. Undukmin, ale tonduyhu mase pala rusak ho?
Hatengerhon Naibatamu, ai paluahon-Ni do
Ho na marhoru nuan, malas uhurmin ibaen;
Ase tong pasangaponmu Goran ni partuahonmu.

4. Sai manrogop do uhurhu sanggah bai na tangis au;
Jordan do habuanganku ampa Hermon in, na daoh;
Songon bah sampuran in mompas bai tondolannin.
Sai sonai do mangkamompas parlajouan in hu bangku.

5. Iparbagah Naibatangku idop ni uhur-Ni in;
Jadi malas ma uhurhu anggo sai hudingat in;
Borngin, ge arian in hudodingkon do ijin;
Dear layak ni Jahowa mangurupi kuria-Ni.

6. Ham, alo Batar-batarhu, seng ingaton-Mu be au?
Ai sai tambah do honingku, iapasi munsuh au;
Ai holi-holingku pe, sal maropuk do hape;
Ai sai tong nini munsuhku;”Ai ija ma Naibatamu?”

7. Undukmin ale tonduyhu, mase ma sai rusak ho?
Hatengerhon ma Tuhanmu seng tadingkonon-Ni ho;
Pujionku do tongtong Naibata bai goluhkon.
Hatuahon ni bohingku, sai tongtong do haposanku.

1. Sai hukawahkon dolog in, huagan do hunjin
roh haluahonkin;
Hape hunbani Tuhan in.
Sitompa haganupan, roh do pangurupion.

2. Seng ra landit naheimu in ibere Tuhanmin
na songga modom in;
Sai hatengerhon Tuhanmin
seng sinok panonggor-Ni, sai ho do jinaga-Ni.

3. Ai Ia parlinggomanmin, na mangondingi ho;
ai seng ilopas roh
Na mamusoki uhurmin;
borgoh, ‘ge milas an, sai tong do ijagai.

4. Sai iparorot Naibata, daging ‘ge tonduymin
bai parmaraan in.
Bai na kaluar masuk in
sadokah ni dokahni, sai tong do jagaon-Ni.

1. Ai na marsanina hita on hape, Lang be marnamubah barang ise pe
Legan bei hatanta ge tanohta pe, sada do Bapanta dingat hita bei

2. Sada do Bapanta Sipagoluh in, mansarihon hita sadokahni in
Haganup goluhta ge bohalta pe, sada do Bapanta pasirsirhon in

3. Tong do ipareksa hita on hape, sanggah marsikolah, i alaman pe;
Seng na tarhorjahon haganup hape, anggo lang Bapanta i lambungta bei.

1. Domma i hopkop Tuhanku tonduyhu ase maluah tonduyhu tongtong
Domma isasap Tuhanku dousangku ase manggoluh tonduyhu tongtong
Malas uhurhu megah uhurhu lao pasangapkon Tuhan bai goluhkon.
Nai ma hapeni holongni ateiNi hita pe patut marholong tongtong

2. Domma ipilih Tuhanta ge hita, lao manaksihon holongni tongtong.
Domma isuruh Tuhanta ge hita, lao mangkatahon Hata-Ni tongtong.
Laho ma hita misir ma hita, mangambilankon Tuhan parholong in.
Ase maluah homa hasomanta, gabe manggoluh bai Tuhanta in.

3. Jolom Hata-Ni, sai jalo Tonduy-Ni, ulang be ganggang humbai Tuhan in.
Ulang be holang martonggo hu Bani! Ai do gogohta bai horja-Ni in.
Ulang mabiar, ulang be gobir, lao mantaluhon gogoh ni setan in!
Tenger uhurta hubani Tuhanta; ihasomani do hita tongtong.

1.Sai Puji Naibata ai holong tong atei-Ni
Malayak tong homa bai ganup tinompa-Ni.
Megah ma hita on, mamuji Naibata.
Ai sasap dousa on, ibahen Naibata

2.Tuhanta Naibata marsuruh Jesus Kristus.
Jadi harga tumang do hita on itobus.
Iporsan Jesus in dousanta in ganup
Ase daroh-Ni in papansing haganup.

3.Halani ai talup na bere ma uhurta
Bai Naibata unduk ampa Jesus Tuhanta
Sonai ‘ge Tonduy in na roh hubanta on
Gantih ni Jesus in, pujion do tongtong.

1. Hosianna, Anak ni Raja David roh hubanta
Parandang ma dalan-Niin, ase masuk bai uhurta
Baen ma gaba-gaba in, bai Tuhanta na roh in

2. Hosianna, Roh ma Ham, das hubagas uhurnami
Na mangalo-alo Ham, alo Jesus Tuhannami
Malas uhurnami in, anggo masuk Ham hujin

3. Hosianna! Raja ni na mardamei, Jagoraha!
Ganup binoban-Mu in, damei, sonang na maharga.
Hanai hinopkop-Mu in do simada ganup in.

4. Hosianna! Torih ma hanai na nirajaan-Mu.
Togu ma bai Naibata, hang ganup susian-Mu;
Sai papuho hanai on, mangiahon hata-Mu.

5. Hosianna! Saud tarbaen bagah-bagah ni Jahowa.
‘Ge ponop ope nuan, hasangapon-Mu bai jolma.
Ganup na porsaya in, manandai gogoh-Mu in.

6. Hosianna! Tatap ma hanai on ganup, o Tuhan.
‘Se pangia tong homa, hanai na i hasombuhan.
Bai Hata na dear in, ase na pasaud in.

7. Hosianna! Anak ni Naibata na jadi jolma.
Tohu ma Kuria in, ase sai tongtong martuah.
Sangap bai goran-Mu in, sadokah-dokahni in.

1. Paubah ham uhurmu bapa, porsaya sirahanan
Porsaya bani Jesus bapa ‘se dapot hasonangan
Banggal do, banggal holong ni Tuhanta bapa, mambere hasonangan

2. Paubah ham uhurmu inang, ‘se dihut ham maluah!
Porsaya bani Jesus, inang ‘se dihut ham martuah
Banggal do, banggal ringis ni Tuhanta inang, bai nas so ra marubah

3. Paubah hita uhurta, ale, na sombah ma Tuhanta
Harga hita itobus ale, sai ulang namin soya
Abakkon, abakkon na mapansing, ale, galangan bai Tuhanta

4. Hanami haganupan, Tuhan, sai boban ma hu surga
Aha pe lang na suang, Tuhan, i lambung-Mu magira
Holong ma, tongon holong ma atei-Mu Tuhan, sai togu Ham ganupan

1. Tangkap nasiam ambilan banta, ambilan malas ni uhur banggal
Ambilan ni ‘se ai ibanta, anggo lang humbai Tuhanta?
Anggo sonai rombangma hita, manangkap ambilan maharga
Binoban ni suruhan banta, tinongos humbani Naibatanta
Anggo sonai rombangma hita, manangkap ambilan maharga
Binoban ni suruhan banta, tinongos humbani Naibataanta
Ai ma tongon, na, nai ma tongon!

2. Ambilan pasal Tuhan Jesus isuruh Naibata manobus
Maluah ma hape pardousa manggalar utang ni dousanta
Anggo sonai rombangma hita, manangkap ambilan maharga
Binoban ni suruhan banta, tinongos humbani Naibatanta
Anggo sonai rombangma hita, manangkap ambilan maharga
Binoban ni suruhan banta, tinongos humbani Naibataanta
Ai ma tongon, na, nai ma tongon!

1. Puji hita Naibatanta, puji hita Anak-Niin,
Puji hita ge Tonduy-Ni Sitolu Sada do in
Haleluya, haleluya, Sitolu Sada do in

2. Puji hita Raja surga, Tuhan ni manisia
Puji hita Raja ‘Greja, bai ganup dunia on
Haleluya, haleluya, bai ganup dunia on

3. Haleluya isombahkon, na porsaya hu Bamu
Bai arian pakon borngin, idodingkon hu Bamu

mangagou daging tonduy ‘pe, gopas marjaga rup

3. Solukkon hapintoran in, baen partahananmin
Age haporsayaon in, baen gantar-gantarmin
Naheita sai ringgas, uhurta pe gopas
mangambilankon damei in, hata ni Tuhan in

4. Antong sai hamonangkon ma, haporsayaonmin
Ipargogohi Naibata do sipartonggo in
Marot podangta in, in ma hata-Ni in
‘se marsortali hita rup, i surga in ganup

1. O Jesus Tuhankin, Ham Siparmonang in Raja tongtong
Ai seng margogoh au anggo lang rapkon Ham
Sai hasomani au i tanoh on

2. Ai roh sibolis in manarik uhurhin, daoh hun Bamu
Iankon Ham ma au ase sai sonang au
mintor maporus ma sibolis in

3. Anggo bujur au on, manjolom Ham tongtong bai goluhkon
Talu ma munsuhkin, seng be margogoh in
sai monang au tongtong tinobus-Mu

4. Ai seng margogoh be dousa bai tonduyhin, maluah au
Ham ihutkononkin, surga tujuankin
Ham ma tong rupeihin, sai sonang au

1. Ham Tonduy Na Pansing in, sai patoguh uhurhin
Sadokah bai goluhkon jolom Ham ma tangankon
Sai sonang do uhurhon manangihon Ham tongtong
Ai ni-Mu hu togu pe ho hu surga in use

2. Ham tongtong hasomankin, seng be ganggu uhurhin
Sanggah bai na golap in, tong ijaga Ham do au
Sai hutangar sora-Mu, sanggah na tarsosak au
Ai ni-Mu hu togu pe ho hu surga in use

3. Sunsah pardalanankin, ai buei do imbangkin
Sai totap do uhurhin, mangarapkon Ham ijin
Anggo bois bohalhin, tong hubogei sora-Mu
Ai ni-Mu hu togu pe ho hu surga in use

1. Hu surga do tujuankin sai tong masihol uhurhin
Bai na roh au hu lobei-Mu, patenger Ham ma uhurhin
O Tuhan togu tonduyhin, bai na sonang i lambung-Mu
ai sai masihol uhurhin hu surga bai ianan-Mu

2. Seng sonang au bagi goluhkon, bai tanoh partangisan on
sai dompak Ham do uhurhon, ase boi sonang au tongtong
O Tuhan togu tonduyhin, bai na sonang i lambung-Mu
ai sai masihol uhurhin hu surga bai ianan-Mu

3. Ai haganupan dousakin tadingkononku ma ijin
sai tong mangarap uhurhin, hu lambung-Mu na sonang in
O Tuhan togu tonduyhin, bai na sonang i lambung-Mu
ai sai masihol uhurhin hu surga bai ianan-Mu

4. Bai huta sigijangan in, talar hapansingon-Mu in
Marolob-olob do ijin, ganupan na dob monang in
O Tuhan togu tonduyhin, bai na sonang i lambung-Mu
ai sai masihol uhurhin hu surga bai ianan-Mu

1. Anggo sai holosohon ham bai goluh on
Pala ham mandolei lang tuk gogohmu
Ingat pasu-pasuni Tuhanta in,
janah paruhurhon pambaenan-Ni in
Ref. Ulang lupa bai layak-Ni in,
ganup ari sai bilangi in
Sai bilangi pambaenan-Ni in,
in ma pasu-pasu ni Tuhanta in.

2. Mase sai tongtong marpusok uhur ham
bai borat ni silang na iporsan ham?
Sabar ma ham bai pusok ni uhur in,
roh ma pasu-pasu dob salosei in
Ulang lupa bai layak-Ni in,
ganup ari sai bilangi in
Sai bilangi pambaenan-Ni in,
in ma pasu-pasu ni Tuhanta

3. Anggo ikawahkon ham na bayak in
na gok arta duit pakon omas in
Ingat ham ma arta sijengesan in,
sijaloonmu use i surga in
Ref. Ulang lupa bai layak-Ni in,
ganup ari sai bilangi in
Sai bilangi pambaenan-Ni in,
in ma pasu-pasu ni Tuhanta in.

4. ‘Ge bai parlajouan hasunsahan pe
roh do Tuhan paluahkon hita bei
Dingat ma ganup dear layak-Ni in
na mangkasomani ham bai goluhmin
Ref. Ulang lupa bai layak-Ni in,
ganup ari sai bilangi in
Sai bilangi pambaenan-Ni in,
in ma pasu-pasu ni Tuhanta in.

1.Pusok uhurmin, dilo Tuhanmin, na bujur gogoh mangurupi

2. Marhoru pe ham, na i tanoh on, sai dilo Tuhanmu pangapoh

3. Borat pe ganup, hampung do use, bahenon ni Jesus parlayak

4. Ai tuk gogoh-Niin, mangurupi ham, sitarononmin ipamalum

5. Manaron pe ham, sai tahan ma ham, na sonang ma ham ibaen Jesus

6. Basar Tuhanmin, lamlam hata-Niin, mambere hu bam hasonangan

7. Parrupei do ham, bai ujung ni in, hu hasonangan na i surga

1. I lambung-Mu o Jesuskin, sai na damei do uhurhin
maporus ganup holsohkin, lambin torangma uhurhin
Sai ganda ma ‘ge gogohkin, dob hutandai Ham Jesuskin

2. I lambung-Mu o Je suskin, sai lintun do na jahat in.
Guru Bamu ganup hape, gilumbang pakon logou pe,
Sonang tumang ma uhurhin dob hutandai Ham Jesuskin.

3. I lambung-Mu 0 Jesuskin , seng be margogoh munsuhkin.
Sai talu do na jahat in, sai monang do napintor in.
Martuah ma na domu in hu bani Jesus Rajangkin.

4. Bai ajalhin o Jesuskin, gomos ma jolom tangankin.
Padas Ham au hu surga in, ondos bai hasangapon-Mu.
Dodingkononku ma ijin holong ‘ge dear layak-Mu .

1. Husombah Ham Tuhan tangihon au!
Sai uhur-Mu Tuhan pasaud Ham
Sai lambin tambah ma holongku hu Bamu
Sai tambah ma holongBamu

2. Sanggah na kahou au, daoh hun Bamu.
Sai ipindahi Ham, jumpah Ham au.
Halani in holong do, uhurhon Bamu.
Sai tambahma holong Bamu.

3. Sanggah tarsosak au, parngit tumang,
Iapoh Ham do a, sonang tumang .
Haposankin do Ham, Ham Sipagoluh au.
Sai tambah ma holong Bamu.

4 . Anggo roh ajalhin, holong ma Ham.
lalo Ham tonduyh in, hu lambung-Mu.
Malas ma uhurhon, mangidah bohi -Mu.
I lambung-Mu i surga in.

1.Togu Ham ma au o Tuhan bai goluh dunia on
Na gogoh do Ham parholong, togu au na galek on
Roti surga, roti surga, in ma sipanganonkin
in ma hagoluhankin

2. Bere Ham bah hagoluhan na pamalum uhurhon
Ham mardalan i lobeihu rapkon tiang hombun in
Ham Jesusku, Ham Tuhanku, Ham na gabe gantarhin
Ham ma haluahonkin

3. Na mamolus bai bah Jordan, padaoh Ham ma biarhin
Togu Ham ma au o Tuhan, das hu tanoh Kanaan
Ham hupuji, Ham husombah, bani ganup goluhkin
Sadokah-dokahni in

1. Jesus haposanku, Ham ma hasomanku
Ulang au tarpunjung, seng dong hasomanku
Jesus haposanku, hasomani ahu
Ham ma hasomanku, bai pardalananku

2. Ham tumang Rajangku, Ham do balosanku
Jalo Ham ma ahu gabe jabolon-Mu
Sai sonang ma ahu ai tangkas ma bangku
Ham tumang Rajangku janah balosanku

3. Ai pintor uhum-Mu bai harajaon-Mu
In ihutkononku, baen hagoluhanku
Dob tangkas hubotoh sonang i lambung-Mu
ai pintor uhum-Mu bai harajaon-Mu

4. Ham paridop uhur bai ganup pardousa
daroh-Mu madurus, baen tobus ni dousa
In do na margogoh mamintori jolma
Ham paridop uhur bai ganup pardousa

5. Jesus do Tuhanku baen batar-batarhu
na gabe onjolan ni haporsayaon
Lang be au mabiar ‘ge bai parmaraan
Jesus do Tuhanku baen pangajamanku

1. Sai roh ma bai harang i Betlehon on
Ganup na porsaya podas ma hujon
Manonggor hamegahni uhurta in ijin
Tinongos ni Bapa na isurga in

2. Sai tonggor hanima ma bai harang on,
ai tubuh Dakdanak ijon borngin on.
Jenges do rupa-Ni, mata-Ni torang,
sai torih ma Ia, ho jadi siang.

3. Megah si maria ‘pa si Josep in,
mangidah Dakdanak, na dob tubuh in,
Manombah hu Bani do parmahan in,
ibabou mandoding do parsurga in.

4. Manrogop hanima ganupan ale
Maniru parmahan manombah use
Mandoding hanima megahkon ijin
Usihi Malekat na hun babou in.

5. Hatahon: Ham Anak ni Naibata in,
roh Ham roh hun datas ibaen idopNIn.
Bannami ganup na mardousa on,
mambaen haluahon bannami tongtong.

6. Tor aha ma nani baen molos-Mu,
bereonkonnami hamegahon-Mu?
Ai omas ‘ge pirak seng sihol Bamu,
ai uhur na pansing do harosuh-Mu.

7. Antong uhurnami berean-Mu in,
o Jesus Tuhanku sai jalo Ham in.
Pansing janah sonang baen Ham uhurhin,
tongtong ma mardomu ba uhur-Mu in.

1. Huondoskon bani Jesus haganupan diringkon
Ia do pasangaponku sadokah bai goluhkon
Huondoskon ma, huondoskon ma.
Bani Jesus Sipaluah, huondoskon ma

2. Huondoskon bani Jesus haganupan goluhkon.
Hutadingkon ganup dousa, huihutkon Tuhan in.
Huondoskon ma, huondoskon ma.
Bani Jesus Sipaluah, huondoskon ma

3. Huondoskon bani Jesus horja ampa uhurhon.
Roh ma Ham Tonduy Napansing, sai urasi uhurhon.
Huondoskon ma, huondoskon ma.
Bani Jesus Sipaluah, huondoskon ma

4. Huondoskon bani Jesus haganupan diringkon
Holong pakon kuasa-Ni, in ma manramotkon au
Huondoskon ma, huondoskon ma
Bani Jesus sipaluah, huondoskon ma.

5. Huondoskon bani Jesus daging pakon tonduyhon.
Domma ipaluah ahu, pujionku Goran-Mu.
Huondoskon ma, huondoskon ma.
Bani Jesus Sipaluah, huondoskon ma

1. Ari na madear tumang lao marayakkon Tuhan in
Hubaritahon Ham Tuhan bujur au mandalankon in
Tuahkin ari in sanggah isasap dousangkin
Ai ipatalar dalankin, janah iungkap uhurhin
Tuahkin ari in sanggah isasap dousangkin

2. Sai huondoskon ma nuan ‘ge diringkon Bamu Tuhan
PandiloMu hubangku on, sai hubalosi do tongtong
Tuahkin ari in sanggah isasap dousangkin
Ai ipatalar dalankin, janah iungkap uhurhin
Tuahkin ari in sanggah isasap dousangkin

3. Sai sonang do pangahapkon, anggo hujolom Hata-Niin.
Sai na totap do uhurhin, ai huhaposi Tuhankin.
Tuahkin ari in sanggah isasap dousangkin.
Ai ipatalar dalankin janah iuangkap uhurhin.
Tuahkin ari in sanggah isasap dousangkin.

4. Ibogei na i surga in, do haganupan padankin.
Seng anjai engkar au hunjin, sadokah-dokahni in.
Tuahkin ari in sanggah isasap dousangkin.
Ai ipatalar dalankin janah iuangkap uhurhin.
Tuahkin ari in sanggah isasap dousangkin.

1. Sorani Jesus bangku on: “Sai roh na loja in,
Huporsan ganup dousamin, ‘ge sitarononmin”
Na roh do au na loja in, na pusok uhur in,
ai jumpah au bai Jesus in, inanan na sonang

2. Sora ni Jesus bangku on: “Sai roh ma inum ma,
sirsir bah hagoluhan in, sai jalo inum ma”
Roh do au na horahan in, huinum ma bah in,
Uhurhu pakon tonduyhin jorgit malum do in

3. Sorani Jesus bangku on: “Au do panondang in,
kawahkon lao do hombun in, ibahen sondang-Kin”
Domma huidah o Tuhan, sondang-Mu na lihar,
langkahku pe totap torang, das bai ujungni in.

1. Banggal tumang do holong-Mu, pabayu goluhkon
Nadoyuk kahou magou ahu, hape maluah do

2. Dob hutandai diringkin, megah ma uhurhin
Salosei hape utangkin, ibahen layak ni in

3. Bani lombang hamagouan in, tarsangkut au ijin
Ai idop ni uhur-Ni in, manogu au hunjin

4. Hujolom padan na toguh, in ma Hata-Ni in,
Ai Tuhan in do gogohkin, na hot sadokah niin.

5. Agepe soh angkulangkin, bai panimbunan in,
Tuhanku do hasomankin, seng lanjar au ijin.

6. Marlaksa tahun salpu pe, totap sangap-Ni in,
Pangahapkin tongkin ope, mamuji Goran-Niin.

1. Jesus Tuhanku rajai Ham au on
Ase mangihut Bamu au tongtong
Sai iankon Ham tongtong uhurhon
Ulang be masuk na legan hujon
Jesus pasonang uhurhu tongtong
totap marguru hu Bamu au on

2. Sai parngit tumang sidageonkin
anggo lang Jesus tong bai uhurhin
Ge pe hasunsahan mandorab au,
holong ni Jesus do mangapoh au
Sai tong isasap dousangku ganup,
ase sai sonang pakon-Si au rup

3. Sai ionggopi sibolis do au,
janah magigi munsuh hu bangku.
Seng au mabiar, tenger uhurhin
parlingodanku sai Jesus do in.
Asal ididah Immanuel in,
maningon surut ganup munsuhkin.

4. Na marhaposan bai Jesus ale,
sai na martuah do use hape.
Na marsigantung bai Jesus tongtong,
janah paruhur na bonar tongtong.
Sonang do ia i dunia on,
sonang homa i surga in tongtong.

1. Dong sada bah tubuh na jenges tumang,
sombuh do horahmu ijin
Age pe tomos tumang nabaoritmin,
sai malum do ganup ijin.
Balosi dilo-dilo Nin,
pindahi bah na jenges in,
seng bolionmu be in,
porsaya tumang ham ijin

2. Ai barang huja pe mabaor bah in,
dear do pangkorhonni in.
Tarsulur sortali sijaloonmin,
na roh manahui hunjin.
Balosi dilo-dilo Nin,
pindahi bah na jenges in,
seng bolionmu be in,
porsaya tumang ham ijin

3. Ai bah hagoluhan do goran-Ni in,
na dapot humbani Jesus in.
Madurus daroh-Ni na maharga in,
mangkopkop paardousa do in.
Balosi dilo-dilo Nin,
pindahi bah na jenges in,
seng bolionmu be in,
porsaya tumang ham ijin

4. Masihol ho, roh matahui bah in,
idilo Tonduy in do ho.
Ai gabe pansing na maridi ijin,
tarbahen das hu surga in.
Balosi dilo-dilo Nin,
pindahi bah na jenges in,
seng bolionmu be in,
porsaya tumang ham ijin

1. Roh Panambari na gogoh, in ma Tuhanta Jesus.
Bai Tuhan in ma hita roh, sai malum ibaen Jesus.
Dear ni in barita in, malas ni uhur banggal in.
Sai ipuji uhurhin Jesus, Jesus, Jesus.

2. Ai domma sasap dousa in ibaen na matei Jesus.
Ai seng be jujuronni in, ibaen holong ni Jesus
Dear ni in barita in, malas ni uhur banggal in.
Sai ipuji uhurhin Jesus, Jesus, Jesus.

3. Na parngit bani goluhkon, ibuat Tuhan Jesus
Antong ganup hasomankin, podas ma roh bai Jesus
Dear ni in barita in, malas ni uhur banggal in.
Sai ipuji uhurhin Jesus, Jesus, Jesus.

4. Bani parroh ni Tuhan in, boi idahonku Jesus
Malas tumang ma uhurhin, dob domu au bai Jesus
Dear ni in barita in, malas ni uhur banggal in.
Sai ipuji uhurhin Jesus, Jesus, Jesus.

1. Batu gingging na toguh, Ham do batar-batarhin
Na gogoh toguh do Ham, bai gilumbang tahan Ham
Sai hudilo Jesus in, tolong au anakMu on

2. Huparbois pe gogohkin, ronsi tangis au ijin,
Naha pe hubaen ijin, seng boi tanggal dousangkin.
Pitah bai ugah-Mu in, boi maluah au ijin.

3. Seng adong haposankin, pitah bai silangMu in
Bani hahurangan kin, Ham ma patorsahon in
Anggo lang marhitei Ham, seng maluah au Tuhan

4. Anggo roh panorangnin, hutundalhon tanoh on
Ham do na mandilo au, mangayaki hotak-Mu
Batu gingging na gogoh sihol do Bamu au roh

1. Sauhur sapanriah ma, ganup kuria in.
Marhasadaon na dear, ibagas Tuhan in.
Riap ma hita haganup, mamuji Tuhan rup.
Mardamei marsiurupan, marsihaholongan.

2. Hasadaon totap toguh bani onjolan in,
ai ma haporsayaonni si sada Tuhan in.
Sada bai pandidion in na hunbai Bapa in,
ai ganup na porsaya da, mamuji Ham Tuhan.

3. Ipasu-pasu Tuhan in ganupan hita on,
ase pongkut ma uhurmu marhorja pe ringgas.
Patoruh uhurmu homa bai Tuhan Naibata,
totap bani hata-Ni da, ibagas holong in.

1. Goran Jesus sai marsora, bai ganup dunia on.
Goran Jesus pasonangkon, ganup na marhoru in.
Goran in marpasu-pasu, bai ganup pardousa in
Haganupan do idilo, bani gomgoman-Ni in
Goran Jesus sijengesan, lao paborsih uhurhin.
Martarima kasih ahu ibaen na itobus au.

2. Goran Jesus marsinondang bani laut ‘ge tanoh in.
Marmalas ni uhur hita pasangapkon goran-Nin.
Magou ma pusok ni uhur, halani goran-Ni in.
Anggo porsaya bai Jesus talu do na jahat in.
Goran Jesus sijengesan, lao paborsih uhurhin.
Martarima kasih ahu ibaen na itobus au.

3. Goran Jesus marsinondang seng boi horlom sondang-Nin.
Goran Jesus paliharhon na i hagolapan in.
Golap pe mataniari, hassur pe dunia on.
Goran Jesus marsinondang sadokah-dokahni in.
Goran Jesus sijengesan, lao paborsih uhurhin.
Martarima kasih ahu ibaen na itobus au.

1. Mandoding nasiam! On ma hatahon ham
Sihaholonganta do Anak-anakon
parayakon hita hu atas tanoh on
Tuhankin do Ham, Tuhankin do Ham

2. Masihol au Bamu, o Jesus na dob roh!
Apoh Ham uhurhu sadokah au ijpn,
holong atei-Mu bangku mangidah sombuhkon!
Togu au bamu, togu au Bamu!

3. Layak do Bapa in, isuruh Anak-Nin,
ase galaron-Ni ganup utangta in,
janah pasirsiron-Ni hasonanganta in.
Ambit das ma au, ambit das ma au.

4. Tongtong i surga in, hasonanganta in,
sai marmegah-megah ganup malekat in,
ampakon na mapansing na dob osdos ijin.
Sol hujin ma au, sol hujin ma au.

1. Holong na hunbani Tuhan, na roh humbai Jesus in.
Sai totap do marsinondang holongni Tuhanta in
Sai sondangkon ma holong-Ni das bai hagolapan in
Ase haganup pardousa ipaluah Naibata

2. Dousa pakon kuasani, ampa sipangagou in.
Sai marhoih do ganupan, bani paruntolon in.
Sai sondangkon ma holong-Ni, das bai hagolapan in.
Ase haganup pardousa, ipaluah Naibata.

3. Sai saksihon ma hata-Ni, bai na laho magou in.
Patuduhkon ma rosuh-Ni, ‘se maluah ganup in.
Sai sondangkon ma holong-Ni, das bai hagolapan in.
Ase haganup pardousa, ipaluah Naibata.

1. Iatas ni Onjolan na gogoh na totap,
Na jongjong do Kuria i atas tanoh on
Tuhanta Jesus Kristus, na pajonamkon in
Marhitei pandidion, ampa Hata-Ni in.

2. Ai domma susur Jesus manopot hita on,
tunangan na pinilih na idunia on .
In ma ganup kuria na dob tinobus-Niin,
marhitei kuasa-Ni, daroh na pansing in.

3. Ipilih humbai bangsa bai sab dunia on,
Kuria gabe sada ibagas Tuhan in.
Sada haporsayaon, sada panginuman,
aima anggur na pansing, ampakon ruti in.

4. Bai ganup parlajouan ‘ge sitaronon in,
tongtong ma mangarapkon damei ni Tuhan in.
Se boi ma ham mangidah torang janah sonang,
na monang do kuria bai haganupan in.

5. Kuria sipartonggo na i dunia on,
sada ampakon Tuhan Sitolu sada in.
Ampa halak na pansing janah na monang in,
papuho Ham hanami bai haliharon in.

1.Ai halonganan do hape, holong ni Tuhan in.
Itobus Kristus au hape pardousa na doyuk.
Tapi hubotoh janah porsaya, bani gogoh-Ni pakon kuasa-Ni,
ai iparorot do tong goluhku, das bai parujungan in.

2. Marhitei idop uhur in, porsaya au tongon,
janah gogoh ni Hata-Nin pasonang uhurhon
Tapi hubotoh janah porsaya, bani gogoh-Ni pakon kuasa-Ni,
ai iparorot do tong goluhku, das bai parujungan in.

3. Marhitei Tonduy Napansing, hubotoh dousangkin,
hutanda do Sitobus au, marhitei hata-Nin.
Tapi hubotoh janah porsaya, bani gogoh-Ni pakon kuasa-Ni,
ai iparorot do tong goluhku, das bai parujungan in.

4. Ganupan pardalankin, rusia do tongtong,
paima jumpah ajalhin, mangidah bohi-Mu.
Tapi hubotoh janah porsaya, bani gogoh-Ni pakon kuasa-Ni,
ai iparorot do tong goluhku, das bai parujungan in.

5. Seng na hubotoh ari ni parroh-Mu in use,
na dob marujung au ijin atap manggoluh pe
Tapi hubotoh janah porsaya, bani gogoh-Ni pakon kuasa-Ni,
ai iparorot do tong goluhku, das bai parujungan in.

judul: Marsora do Tonduy ni Tuhanta in
lirik:
1. Marsora do Tonduy ni Tuhanta in.
Gati lang itangar, itulak ham in.
Sai tanda dousamu sopotkon homa.
Holong do atei-Ni isasap do in.

2. Marunduk ni uhur sopotkon ma in,
pambaen mu na jahat ampa jungkatmin.
Ondoskon bai Jesus bulat dirimin,
tongtong ma sai dingat pangkopkop-Ni in.

3. Tangihon hata-Ni ihutkon ma in,
ondoskon dirimu bai gomgoman-Nin.
Pangindo bai Tuhan tongtong tonduy-Nin,
pargogoh mangkorjahon hata-Ni in.

4. Tarsor ho mardousa ibahen uhurmin,
sai ulang nunuti, tuldalhon ma in.
Dompakhon Tuhanmu, margogoh do in,
manasap dousamu, pamalumhon in.

5. Sai jolom tangan-Ni pangindo ma on:
Ramoti puhoi au susianmon.
Pabulat uhurhu patoguh au on,
manggolom hata-Mu bani goluhkon.

1. Humbai hurungan ni dousakin,
roh au Bamu, roh au Bamu.
Hu haluahon bai daroh-Mu
Jesus, au roh Bamu
Ganup uhurhu malum hape,
gabe bayak ‘ge masombuh pe.
Humbai dousangku, roh au Bamu,
Jesus au roh Bamu.

2. Maila au butak uhurhin
roh au Bamu, roh au Bamu.
Gabe borsih ma ‘ge uhurhin,
Jesus, au roh Bamu.
Humbai holsohku bai sonang-Mu,
humbai doyukku bai damei-Mu
Humbai horungku bai holong-Mu,
Jesus, au roh Bamu .

3. Ganggu ni uhur tading ma in,
Jesus , au roh, roh hu Bamu,
Sai haposanku ma hata-Mu,
Jesus , au roh Bamu.
‘Ge pandoleian ni uhurhin ,
sai huayubkon bai holong-Mu .
Gabe martuah megah ma au,
Jesus, au roh Bamu

1. Ilobei-Mu o Jesus, talar do hagoluhankin
Mangarap holong atei-Mu, ilobei-Mu o Jesus

2. Hu lobei-Mu o Jesus roh au na sombuh na doyuk

judul: Roh bai Jesus Ham na Loja
lirik:
1. Roh bai Jesus ham na loja na ngayotan in.
Ai lumbang do i lambung-Ni roh ma ham,

2. Malum ganup naboritmu ibaen silang-Nin ,
Tuhan in na hona uhum gantihmin.

3. Sai pingkiri ma holong-Ni na banggal do in,
iberehon do hosah-Ni tobusmin.

4. Sahei dousa, apoh-apoh bani goluhmu,
haganup ibere Jesus tuahmu.

5. Iarusi do siholmu ‘ge tinaronmu,
ai gogohmu pe ibere Tuhan in.

judul: Ingat ma Jesus na Palihar Ham
lirik:
1. Ingat ma Jesus na palihar ham, jolom gomos in tongtong
Sai tiru Jesus pos ma uhurmu, sai hatahon ma sonon:
Jesus pagoluh au on, Jesus pagoluh au on.

Jesus pagoluh au on, Jesus pagoluh au on.
Sai gomos ma tong hujolom hata on, Jesus pagoluh au on.

Ambilan siharganan, Hata ni Tuhan in,
pasonang paruhuran ampakon Tonduy in.
Tongtong do marmulia barita ni Tuhanta,
sai lambin tarambilan Goranni Tuhan in.

2. Ringgas au mangkatahon Hata ni Tuhan in,
buei do halonganan humbani na hinan
Dihut ma au marulih bai hasonangan in,
janah huhaporluhon mangambilankon in.
Tongtong do marmulia barita ni Tuhanta,
sai lambin tarambilan Goranni Tuhan in.

3. Tongtong huhamegahkon mangambilankon in
ai tambah huan-huan, dob huparata in.
O Nasiam hasoman sai tangar Hata in,
sai ra ma manjalohon Hata ni Tuhan in
Tongtong do marmulia barita ni Tuhanta,
sai lambin tarambilan Goranni Tuhan in.

4. Sai tong marhagogohon, Hata ni Tuhan in,
totap do in manggoluh humbani na hinan
Ai in manogu ahu hubani Bapa in,
ijin ma da igoki malas ni uhurhin
Tongtong do marmulia barita ni Tuhanta,
sai lambin tarambilan Goranni Tuhan in.

1. Na martidah gok iluh, mangarapkon Tuhan in.
Megah do use manabi, goluh na sonang totap.
Hombun pakon mataniari na mambaen gabe toras.
Ronsi rundut ganup buyur buah na ramos toras.

2. Ai pe ulang hita lolei, manaburhon bonih in.
Ase sanggah na manabi, megah uhurta ijin.
Hombun pakon mataniari na mambaen gabe toras.
Ronsi rundut ganup buyur buah na ramos toras.

3. Tonggor omei na i juma, mombur janah sai tabun
Tiap buyur gok saratus, age roh sibolis in
Hombun pakon mataniari na mambaen gabe toras.
Ronsi rundut ganup buyur buah na ramos toras.

judul: Ai Bibel do Pustaha na Harga
lirik:
1. Ai Bibel do pustaha na harga, panotap bai goluhta.
Namarisihon ganup rusia, humbai nabasaia.
Totap do ronsi sadokah-nidokahni, margantih pe panorang.
Baen bohal goluh ni ra mangarusi, sonari ge magira.

2. Ai Bibel do ambilan na harga, marisi buei arta,
humbani Naibata na i surga, simada ganup kuasa.
Baen goluh ni hita ganup manisia, ase malas uhurta.
Gok damei ronsi sadokah goluhta, sonari ‘ge magira.

1. Ham O Naibatangku na manompa au, ai na loja dagingkon.

Pitah Ham do haposankin, togu Ham au na loja on.

2. Ham O Tuhan Jesus na manobus au, ai na pusok uhurhon
Ibaen dousangkon, sai holsohan au
Seng dong i tanoh on haporusanku
Pitah Ham do haposankin, togu au na marhoru on
Pitah Ham do haposankin, togu au na marhoru on

3. Ham Tonduy Napansing, sai ajari au sai pagolpa Ham au on
Bani goluh on ulang magou au
Seng dong i tanoh on haporusanku

2. Eli, Eli, Lama Sabachtani,

in ma bani silang-Mu, batar-batarhu,

marhitei holong sintong, megah ma ahu.

judul: Domma jumpah use ari pesta in

Tinongoskon ni Parholong atei in, Naibata, Bapa in,
Hasangapon bai Naibata, damei damei bani jolma
Megah uhur ni Naibata, hajolmaon use

3. Sombah nami hu Bamu na dob roh on,
Ham siboan damei hu dunia on
Sai pasorap Ham bai uhur namion, dameiMu o Jesus
Hasangapon bai Naibata, damei damei bani jolma
Megah uhur ni Naibata, hajolmaon use

1. O Tuhan tangihon hanai on, balosi pangindouan nami
Sai paluah Ham hanami on, humbani dousani dunia on

2. Jalo ma pamujinami on, halani Ham gok holong do tongtong.
Sai patoguh uhurnami on, lao mandompakhon dalan na mahol.

3. Pasu-pasu hanai on ganup, na ra pongkut ibagas horja-Mu.
In ma na mangarap hu Bamu, parholong janah porsaya Bamu.

judul: Diatei Tupa ma Bamu Ham Naibata
lirik:
1. Diatei tupa ma bamu Ham Naibata, mambaen tupa humpulannami on
Igomgom Ham do horja nami on torsa, gok malas uhur do hanai ijon
Ibere Ham do damei na tarsulur, sanggah manranggi horja haganup
Nuan hanami rap marmalas uhur, mardingat haganup pambaenan-Mu

2. Ipardimata Ham do tong hanai on Tuhan, ai sorap do Tonduy-Mu in tongtong
Ase torsa mardalan horja ganupan, Kuasa-Mu do in mambaen sintong
Porini dong rundut ni paruhuran, sirsir do Ham manohu hanai on
Ai hata-Mu do tong na pagolpahon, mambaen tapang nuan ganup ijon

1. Marodor na porsaya ganupan,
na laho misir huparmingguan, damei tongtong,
Tunggung jagiah doi idahon,
minar bohini ganupan, damei do tongtong.

2. Talup janah pantun marpahean,
songon na laho hu parpestaan, damei do tongtong.
Rosuh tumang uhur maniru,
halani dear ni parlahou, damei do tongtong.

3. Porini pe adong lobih hurang,
pongkut do manangihon ambilan, damei do tongtong.
Tanda do ganup na dob monang,
tinobus ni Jesus parholong, damei do tongtong.

1. On ma hape panorang, in ma panorang parjumpahan
Na laho manangar ambilan, lao pasonangkon paruhuran, ibanta on

2. Dear ma naundukkon, haganupan hata ni Tuhan,
in ma na baen gabe onjolan, laho partorsahon pargoluhon, in banta on.

3. Bani horja ni Tuhan, sai ringgas bei hita ganupan
ase totap malas uhurta, janah baru paruhuranta, bai goluh on.

4. Totap marhasadaon, janah totap marpangarapan,
in do harosuh ni Tuhanta, na laho sihorjahononta, bai goluh on.

5. Gok damei paruhuran, ampakon marsihaholongan,
janah basar dompak hasoman, in ma buah haporsayaon, bai goluh on.

1. Eta nasiam! Eta nasiam!
Misir hita hu gareja laho marminggu
Sihol manangar ambilan hatani Tuhan. Eta nasiam!

2. Roh ma nasiam! Roh ma nasiam!
Halilian mambahen kahou ulang tangihon.
Dearan ma na marminggu sai na porluhon, roh ma nasiam!

3. Tangihon ma! Tangihon ma!
Hagolapan na dob salpu ulang be mulgap.
Jalo ma Tuhanta Jesus gabe panotap, tangihon ma!

4. Akuhon ma! Akuhon ma!
Sai sopotkon ganup dousa ‘ge panlanggaron.
Ase dihut parsimada bai hasonangan, akuhon ma!

5. Jolom poltik! Jolom poltik!
Dilo-dilo ni Tuhanta ulang lanseihon.
Ulang ganggang hun tanganta be haluahon, jolom poltik!

1. Masihol anjaha ayak do tumang uhurhu,
Pajumpah ampakon Ham Tuhan Naibatangku bani rumah-Mu on.
Ai mambur do haganup pusok ni uhur
Marhitei isasap Ham haganup dousangku, bani rumah-Mu on

2. Marmegah marolob-olob ijon uhurhu,
bosuran manjalo tadah bani tonduyhu, in ma ambilan-Mu.
Ungkap do hubahen uhurhu lao mangakuhon,
tahar do hubaen pinggolhu lao manangihon, in ma ambilan-Mu.

3. Lurlur do hubaen sorakku lao mandodingkon,
gombas do hubaen gogohku lao pararatkon, ganup ambilan-Mu.
Naheihu pe huparinggas do manlakkahkon,
dilahku pe hupatalup do manaksihon, ganup ambilan-Mu.

1. Humpul nuan hanami Tuhan, i rumah-Mu sonari
Manjalo hata-Mu o Tuhan, ase dong bohal nami.

2. Buhai ma uhurnami Tuhan, manangihon ambilan.
Ai in do gogohnami nuan, pamalas paruhuran.

3. Ai pitah hata-Mu do nuan, na boi baen sijoloman.
Na gabe tukkotnami Tuhan, bai ganup sidalanan.

4. Ondos Bamu hanami Tuhan, sai Ham ma na marorot.
Ase ulang mandolei Tuhan, anggo roh songgot-songgot.

1. Marhata giring-giring bapa, mandilo roh marminggu.
Sai ulang hita tading bapa, bai ontangan ni Jesus
Ai in do arta sijengesan, na gok malas ni uhur
Naima tongon eta mada tapang hita marminggu

2. Dear ma ham marhobas Inang ase borhat sonari
Ria pakon niombah inang on mada panorangni
Odor lao hu Gareja inang tapang hita sonari
Naima tongon eta mada tapang hita marminggu

3. Sai ulang homa lupa tong-tong arahkon ma hasoman
Ai do tandani hita tongon na dob gabe susian
Ra mandalankon holong sintong songon tonahni Tuhan
Naima tongon eta mada tapang hita marminggu

4. Sirsir ma hita on haganup, tangihon ma ambilan.
Manjalo malas uhurta rup, pasu-pasu ni Tuhan.
Manopa paruhuran talup, lao mangirikhon Tuhan.
Naima tongon! Eta ma da! Tapang hita marminggu.

1. Panorang na dear tama, hita martumpu.
Mamudji Tuhan Naibata, bai ari Minggu
Eta ma misir hita rup, lao hu gareja.
Mamuji Naibata unduk, odor ma hita.
Horas horas hita ganup, ulang mahua
Daoh ma in na lang talup, i baen Tuhanta.

2. Sadari on ma da tongon, ari ni Tuhan.
Ulang das lolei hita on, hupartumpuan.
Eta ma misir hita rup, lao hu gareja.
Mamuji Naibata unduk, odor ma hita.
Horas horas hita ganup, ulang mahua
Daoh ma in na lang talup, i baen Tuhanta.

3. Ari na madear tumang, bai na mar Tuhan.
Langkah ni pe tongtong torang, hu parmingguan.
Eta ma misir hita rup, lao hu gareja.
Mamuji Naibata unduk, odor ma hita.
Horas horas hita ganup, ulang mahua
Daoh ma in na lang talup, i baen Tuhanta.

4. Marsiarahan hita on, pakon hasoman.
Ase jumpahan hita tong, layak ni Tuhan.
Eta ma misir hita rup, lao hu gareja.
Mamuji Naibata unduk, odor ma hita.
Horas horas hita ganup, ulang mahua
Daoh ma in na lang talup, i baen Tuhanta.

1. Domma roh Jesus na pamalas uhur, Alpa, Omega Tuhanta na totap
Naibata na sintong hun surga susur, na ra marsaor doskon jolma rap
Surga pakon dunia baen ma mungmung, domma roh Jesus na pamalas uhur

2. Domma roh Jesus manrotapkon tali, kuasa ni dousa salpu ma ijin.
Ai haluahon roh gantih ni gari, humbai gomgoman ni na golap in.
Pusok ni uhur, holsoh pe maronti, domma roh Jesus manrotapkon tali.

3. Domma roh Jesus simada kuasa, iruntas do ganup hurungan in.
Sorod ni dousa domma iparseda, dalan maluah tarbuka ijin.
Magou ma ho bolis taronkon mara, domma roh Jesus simada kuasa.

4. Domma roh Jesus pambobai na sangap, ganup tinompa rap mamuji ma.
Ai pitah Ia hansa haluahon, ungkab uhurmu jalo ma torsa.
Sortalimin pe domma isarihon, domma roh Jesus pambobai na sangap.

1. Tutuho na martunas do bai si Jese in.
Tubuh na etek-etek na binagahkon in.
In am Tuhanta in, sinuruh ni Bapa-Ni, roh banta jolma on.

2. Tunas na hinatahon ni si Jesaya in.
In do tinubuhkon ni si maria in.
Na jumpah ma ijin na binagah-bahakon ni Naibatanta in.

3. Jenges tumang rupa-Ni na masrsinalsal in.
‘ge masombuh Ia, na gabe jolma in.
Lihar baenon-Nin uhu ni hita jolma na bai na golap in.

4. Napuji ma homani, ‘par holong atei in;
Ibere do Anak-Ni hagoluhanta in.
Megah ma hita on mamuji Naibatanta ibaen layak-Ni in

5. O Jesus, Tuhannami na roh hu tanoh on,
Bai hasombuhannami i hasiangan on.
Holong na atei-Mu sai togu tonduynami bai hasangapon-Mu.

1. Bai borngin ni in sanggah tubuh Jesus ijin.
sinok do par Betlehem in, seng dong na mambotoh,
Talar ma ijin Anak bagah-bagah do in,
Na dob ibagahkon hinan, laho manobus jolma
Saud ma tongon ganup na tarsurat in,
na sinuratni ganup Nabi.
Jalo ma in hagoluhanmu do in,
ase das ham hu hasonangan.

2. Megah do tumang hai uhurni si Josep in,
ampa si Maria ijin na mangabing Jesus.
Ijin ma torang Anak na hun surga do in,
sinuruh ni Bapa do in, pardousa itobus.
Saud ma tongon ganup na tarsurat in,
na sinuratni ganup Nabi.
Jalo ma in hagoluhanmu do in,
ase das ham hu hasonangan.

3. Ganup hita on ase hamegahkon ma in,
puji ma goran-Ni tongtong ronsi sadokahni.
Ai seng dong ijon na marhagogohon sonin,
boi manogu jolma tongon gabe hulanan-Ni.
Saud ma tongon ganup na tarsurat in,
na sinuratni ganup Nabi.
Jalo ma in hagoluhanmu do in,
ase das ham hu hasonangan.

1. Girah sogod golap ijin, misir do lao parmahan in.
Mangidah Kristus, songon tonah ni malekat in.
Ididah do ijin, ididah do ijin, ididah na dob tubuh Sipaluah

2. Seng pala sangsi hita on, na marianan i na daoh.
‘Ge bangsa na i tanoh on, bogei ma hata on.
Sai eta ma tongon, sai eta ma tongon.
Ai domma tubuh Kristus banta borngin on.

3. Ulang sai soh hita ganup, eta ma misir hita rup.
Malekat padosdoskon in, bai dalan turun naik.
Marsurak ma ganup, marsurak ma ganup.
Patugah na dob tubuh Sipaluah in.

1. Tongah borngin sanggah bintang torang,
irandu logou marombus.
Sinok do parmahan i Efrata,
dob loja mansari goluh.
Na so panagaman tarbogei ma ijin,
sorani malekat patugahkon ijin!
Domma tubuh Sipaluah, in ma Kristus Tuhan”.

2. Gok habiar do parmahan tokkin,
dob inggot ijin sinalsal.
Tapi roh nini malekat ijin,
“Ulang hanima mabiar!
Ai ambilan malas uhur banggal do on,
na hu boban bannima ijon borngin on.
Domma tubuh Sipaluah, in ma Kristus Tuhan”.

3. Misir ma ganup parmahan ale,
songon tonah ni malekat.
Dob pajumpah mintor manrogop bei,
marsombah bani Tuhanta.
Sangap ma bai Naibata ibabou tongtong,
Damei ma bai ganup jolma i tanoh on.
Domma tubuh Sipaluah, in ma Kristus Tuhan.

1. Sai puji ma goran ni Tuhanta,
Na sai sirsir marmudu goluhta
Sai horas ma hita ibagas tahun on.
Dear marjabat tangan ma hita,
Selamat Tahun Baru ma banta.
Sai horas ma hita ibagas tahun on.

2. Sabou ma ganup na lobih hurang,
marhitei uhur marsidungdungan.
Sai horas ma hita ibagas tahun on.
Ai do tandani na saodoran,
na mangirikhon Jesus parmonang.
Sai horas ma hita ibagas tahun on.

3. Jumpahan tuah ganjang ni umur,
janah tongtong marmalas ni uhur.
Sai horas ma luta ibagas tahun on.
Bai na margantih soluk pe tahun,
Tuhanta do tongtong marmuduhon.
Sai horas ma hita ibagas tahun on.

4. Age boi das goluhta sonari,
sedo halani gogoh sandiri.
Sai horas ma hita ibagas tahun on.
Tuhanta ma tongtong sai na puji,
ai Ia do na mangkasomani.
Sai horas ma hita ibagas tahun on.

1. Tuhanta do na marrnahani hita,
marhorja age marsaran pe hita
ibagas tahun on
Ai Ia do na margogoh tongon,
mambere na porlu banta.
Marhorja, marhorja ma hita,
martonggo ulang homa lupa.
Marhorja bagas hasintonganni,
seng soya gogohmu.

2. Aha ma sibahenonku sonari,
halani na iparmudu goluhku,
ondos bai tingki on.
Pangabak, parsahap na salpu in,
seng dong na tarpangajamkon.
Tuhanku, Tuhanku, Rajangku,
holong ma atei -Mu hu bangku.
Ulang ma mintor manringis Ham bangku,
sai anju Ham ma au.

3. Tangan-Mu na gogoh in Naibatangku,
tampeihon Ham ma bai simanjujungku,
mamasu-masu au.
Buei do, buei tumang munsuhkin,
na sihol mandorap ahu.
Gogohku seng tarpangajamkon
manlawan ganupan munsuhku.
Maningon Ham do na mangkasomani,
ase margogoh au.

Eloi, Eloi, Lama sabachtani!
Ale Ham Naibatangku, Naibatangku
mase ma itadingkon Ham Au?

1.Bai panorang tongah ari, sanggah reteng mataniari in ijin.
Bai dalan na gok trurun naik, sai marhoih do Jesus in ijin.
Ipaunduk pangkawah-Ni, sai iporsan do hayu pinarsilang in.
Seng ibuha pamangan-Ni, lao manulak sitaronon in.
Nini do: “Ningon porsanon-Ku”
Ai dousanta do pinorsan-Nin.

2. Sanggah na tarsilang Ia, nini do bai tonggoNi bai Bapa-Niin.
“Sai sasap dousa ni sidea, seng ibotoh nabinahen ni in”
Dob dohor ma panorangNi, makkip-akkip do parhosah-Ni in ijin.
Ai nini do: “Domma salosei”
Lanjar ondos bai Bapa Tonduy-Nin
Hita patut manaronkon, hamarsikon tinaron-Ni in.
Aha do balos bahenonta, mangkargahon pangkophop-Ni in.

1. Na gattung bani parsilang, Jesus in i Golgata.
Padomuhon ganup jolma pakon Tuhan Naibata.
Ai hunjin do roh bah tubuh, hagoluhan banta in.
O ale ganup par dousa, tonggor haluahonmin.

2. In ma holong ni Tuhanta, bai ganup dunia on.
Anak-Nin isuruh banta, paluahkon hita on.
Jesus dalan hasintongan, goluh na totap ijin.
Ra manaron parsahitan, bai hayu parsilang in.

3. Sai sombahkon ma pujian, halani holong-Ni in.
Ai isasap do dousanta, marhiteihon daroh-Nin.
Ronsi na marutang hosah, bani parsilang-Ni in.
‘Se manggoluh hita jolma, ronsi sadokahni in.

judul: Jangin do Uhum Bani Jesus in
lirik:
1. Jangin do uhum bani Jesus in, na manaron parsilang in
Ahu do talup manaronkon in, au hinan do gantung ijin.
Siparholong Ham Tuhanku, seng dong jumpah songon Ham.
Ra do Ham lao hu hamateian in, lao manobus pardousa in.

2. Dihut do tangis hayu jetun in, mangkoruhon na masa in.
Nai homa ‘ge Jerusalem ijin, tangis do rapkon dolognin.
Siparholong Ham Tuhanku, seng dong jumpah songon Ham.
Ra do Ham lao hu hamateian in, lao manobus pardousa in.

3. Seng dong doding na boi mangapoh in, ai parah sitaronon in.
Rapkon hasoman na porsaya in, dihut do marhoru ijin.
Siparholong, Ham Tuhanku, seng dong jumpah songon Ham.
Ra do Ham lao hu hamateian in, lao manobus pardousa in.

4. Ai gati lupa au mardingat Ham, ‘ge mandalankon hata-Mu.
Age pe huhorjahon in hinan, seng anjai sungkup in Bamu.
Siparholong, Ham Tuhanku, seng dong jumpah songon Ham.
Ra do Ham lao hu hamateian in, lao manobus pardousa in.

1. O, hamateian ija do sorodmin, talu do ho ibaen Tuhanku.
Mulak manggoluh do Tuhanku hunjin, mamboban hatuahon bangku.
Ai domma puho hape Tuhan, maluah ganup na tartaban.
Ai seng margogoh be sibolis nuan, sonai ampakon hamateian.

2. Halani ai seng habiaran be in, porini aha pe na masa.
‘Ge hamarsikon hamateian pe in, Tuhanta do tong hasomanta.
Ai ningon puho use hita, manjalo upah hagoluhan.
Asal ma ulang hita engkar ijin, bai haganup Hata ni Tuhan.

3. Ai seng tarsibar be megahku ijin, ai domma ipaluah ahu.
Ganup panorang ganup tingki ijin, malas ni uhur do rupeihu.
Mandoding rap pakon hasoman, manjalo ulih hasonangan.
Ai seng adong be partangisan ijin, ‘ge holsoh pakon parmaraan.

1. O Jesuskin hupuji Ham, halani jadi jolma Ham
Roh Ham marayak hanai on, na sombuh i dunia on

2.Tibal bai panggagatan in, do Anakni Jahowa in;
Parrupei bai daagingta on, do na pagoluh hita on.

3. Sigomgom haganupan in, do na tibal bai harang in;
Mandagei na masahit do, na marmuduhon hita on.

4. Tuhanta na torang hinan, na sangap humbani na hinan,
do paliharhon tanoh on, lao manondangi hita on

5. Diri-Ni ipalumei do, sangap-Ni itadingkon do,
manogu hajolmaon in, bai Naibata Bapa-Ni in.

6. Masombuh do Tuhanta in, manaron na masahit in
bayak ma hita baenon-Nin, sadokah ni dokahni in.

7. In ma binaen ni Jesus in, na patidakkon holong ni
atei-Ni na tongtong layak, puji ma Naibata bayak.

1. Marmalas uhur, na mangirikkon Jesus Tuhanta,
ai puho Jesus, mulak manggoluh humbai na matei,
ai domma mungkab ijin tanoman.
O, hamateian, ija do nuan sorodmu in?
Puho do Jesus, humbai na matei.
Nagori toruh, ija do hamonanganmu in?
Maluah do Jesus, hun bani gari.

2. Marbois gogoh, do sipangagou manangkut Jesus,
hape tongtong do, seng dong ksani mambahen talu,
ai gogohan do Jesus Tuhanku.
O, hamateian, ija do nuan sorodmu in?
Puho do Jesus, humbai na matei.
Nagori toruh, ija do hamonanganmu in?
Maluah do Jesus, hun bani gari.

3. Usih sonin do, goluh ni na mangirikkon Jesus,
ningon puho do, bani panorang sadokah goluh,
marhamonangan, rap pakon Jesus.
O, hamateian, ija do nuan sorodmu in?
Puho do Jesus, humbai na matei.
Nagori toruh, ija do hamonanganmu in?
Maluah do Jesus, hun bani gari.

1. Sangap ma bai Naibatanta, sangap ma bai Anak-Nin.
Nai homa Tonduy Na Pansing, puji ma, puji ma tongtong goran-Ni,
Sitolu sada do in.

2. Sombah Naibata i surga, ampa Jesus Anak-Nin,
Tonduy Na Pansing na sorap, puji ma, puji ronsi sadokahni,
Sitolu sada do in.

1. Bani borngin na parpudi sanggah hona partahian.
Bai Horja Banggal Na Pansing nini Jesus bai susian.
“Daging-Ku do in pangan ham ma, daroh-Ku do in inum ham ma”

2. Hita na humpul ganup, na mardingat tonah ni Tuhan.
Boan ham ma dousamu, janah sopotkon haganupan.
Bai Horja Banggal Na Mapansing, in ma parpadanan na susi.

3. Ipartopik ruti in, parhiteian daging ni Jesus.
Anggur na mapansing in, parhiteian daroh ni Jesus.
Sai jalo ma in pangan ham ma, ampa anggur in inum ham ma.

4. Dob ijalo ham ijin, mintor hampung ma paruhuran.
Bohi pe minar do in, janah basar dompak hasoman.
Damei uhurmin janah sonang, jorei langkahmin lao mardalan.

1. Tonah ni Jesus do ijia in, Horja Banggal Na Mapansing.
Ai dob sirsir i baen i meja in, nini do, ‘Tarima kasih!
Jalo ma ruti na pansing in! Parhiteian ni daging-Ni.
Nai homa anggur na pansing in! Parhiteian ni daroh-Ni.

2. Harga do hita on ganup ijin, na hinopkop ni Tuhanta.
Itaron do ganup na parngit in, na sombuh ronsi marmara.
Jalo ma ruti na pansing in! Parhiteian ni daging-Ni.
Nai homa anggur na pansing in! Parhiteian ni daroh-Ni.

3. Madurus do daroh ni Jesus in, bahen tobus ni dousanta.
Manobus hita sipardousa in, ulang magou age sada.
Jalo ma ruti na pansing in! Parhiteian ni daging-Ni.
Nai homa anggur na pansing in! Parhiteian ni daroh-Ni.

4. Ai halongangan do hapeni in, parpadanan na mapansing.
Ai malum do ganup naborit in, hamegahon pangkorhonni.
Jalo ma ruti na pansing in! Parhiteian ni daging-Ni.
Nai homa anggur na pansing in! Parhiteian ni daroh-Ni.

1.Tangihon ma ganupan podah!
Ambilan na maronjolan hata-Ni Tuhan,
na songon ruhut bani partongah jabuon.
Tangihon ma ganup podah!

2. Na dua ningon gabe sada.
Riap saunduk pambalosi bani Tuhan,
ase torsa mardalan ganup pargoluhan.
Na dua ningon gabe sada.

3. Totap sauhur sapanriah.
Ai do tandani na dob marsihaholongan,
sipambalosi domu bai rosuh ni Tuhan.
Totap sauhur sapanriah.

4. Kuria in do gabe saksi.
Napinadomu ni Tuhanta seng boi sirang,
ai anggo lang na sinirang ni hamateian.
Kuria in do gabe saksi.

5. Gabe gareja etek-etek.
Rumah tangga ni Kristen na tarpasu-pasu,
sirsir marhorja mangidangi Tuhan Jesus.
Gabe gareja etek-etek.

1. Ham o Tuhan Naibata
roh do hanami on Bamu,
manjalo pasu-pasu,
mardingat tonah-Mu.

2. Sai ajari Ham Tuhan,
ase irahut holong-Mu,
marpangabak na baru,
ibagas goran-Mu.

3. Ai domma sirsir nuan,
hasomannami on ijon,
sihol manjalo padan,
i lobei-lobei-Mu.

4. Hasomani Ham homa,
janah sai pargogohi ma,
sidea mandalankon,
tohonan na sintong.

1. Sadiha dokah nari Ham Naibatangku,
Layur manipat ari sunsah do au
Sadiha dokah nari paimaonku,
pangkawah-Mu hubangku siholan au
Kawahkon Ham ma ahu Ham Naibatangku,
ulang tarpunjung ahu hun lambung-Mu.
Ganup munsuhkin manidingi au
ai seng adong na mangurupi au.

2. Sadiha dokah nari Ham Naibatangku,
munsuh pagijang diri mangodoh au.
Sai ihatahon bangku hagogohan ni,
sol bondutonni ahu ninuhurnin.
Idop uhur-Mu pangajamankin,
ai pitah Ham do haporusankin.
Urupi Ham ma ahu Ham Naibatangku,
ase ganup munsuhku tunduk Bamu.

1. Borit do tongon, poupou ni goluh on,
Ngayotan marhoih, halani dousa in,
Sai tong do rongom, parlajouan na roh,
seng mangadi in, sipangapasi in
Haporsayaonku, sai totap do toguh,
loja pe au, bai ganup goluhkon.
Bamu do Tuhan, marsuhutan au roh,
holong-Mu Tuhan, songon bah tubuh do.

2. Goran-Mu Tuhan, sai hudilo ijin,
Ham ma rupeihin, au ginomgoman-Mu.
Ondingi Tuhan, au humbai munsuhkin,
‘se sonang ijin, bani linggoman-Mu.
Haporsayaonku, sai totap do toguh,
loja pe au, bai ganup goluhkon.
Bamu do Tuhan, marsuhutan au roh,
holong-Mu Tuhan, songon bah tubuh do.

3. Suankon Tuhan, holong-Mu bangku on,
damei -Mu Tuhan, in ma tong rupeihin.
Sinondang-Mu in, siang baen uhurhin,
ulang magou au, baenon ni dousangkin.
Haporsayaonku, sai totap do toguh,
loja pe au, bai ganup goluhkon.
Bamu do Tuhan, marsubutan au roh,
holong-Mu Tuhan, songon bah tubuh do.

1. Pardalanan ni goluhta,
gatinan marhamaholan.
Halanin sai roh ma hita,
patugahkon bani Tuhan.
Sadar bei ma hita on,
ingat ma Jesus Tuhanta.
Sai sora-Ni ma tangihon,
ase sonang ham mardalan.

2. Hata-Nin ma baen tungkotmu,
bani dalan na malandit.
Sinalsal ni baen suluhmu,
pasiangkon na malotir.
Sadar bei ma hita on,
ingat ma Jesus Tuhanta.
Sai sora-Ni ma tangihon,
ase sonang ham mardalan.

3. Sanjongkal pe lang mapintor,
santopak pe tang matorang.
Ningon Jesus panungkunan,
ase boi das bai tujuan.
Sadar bei ma hita on,
ingat ma Jesus Tuhanta.
Sai sora-Ni ma tangihon,
ase sonang ham mardalan.

4. Nasiholan bani damei,
Tuhan Jesus ma pindahi.
Ase goluh ganup ari.
Tuhan ma mangkasomani.
Sadar bei ma hita on,
ingat ma Jesus Tuhanta.
Sai sora-Ni ma tangihon,
ase sonang ham mardalan.

judul: O Tuhan, Tolong Ham Ma Au On
lirik:
1. O Tuhan tolong Ham ma au on tongtong,
na ibagas paruntolon on
Pitah holong-Mu tumang,
boi pasonang uhur tongtong
Sai tatap Ham ma Tuhan au na sombuh on,
hata-Mu in do Tuhan haluahon
Anggo hudingat ganupan layak-Mu in,
o Tuhan malas ma uhurhin.

2. Anggo roh hamaholon mandorap au
Goran-Mu do hudilo tongtong
In hupindo hu Bamu.
Ase ondos Bamu ma au on.
Sai tatap Ham ma Tuhan au na sombuh on,
hata-Mu in do Tuhan haluahon
Anggo hudingat ganupan layak-Mu in,
o Tuhan malas ma uhurhin.

1. Pamalas uhurta do partubuhni
Jesus Sipaluah haholongankin
Jesus Sipauah haholonghankin

2. Ai buei do dosa, parlajouan pe
manunsahi hita ronsi matei pe
manunsahi hita ronsi matei pe

3. Maparah tumang do hamagouan in
Anggo lang roh Jesus Sipaluah in
Anggo lang roh Jesus Sipaluah in

4. Tuhan Naibatangku, Jesus Ham do in.
Seng anjai marhoru na porsaya in.
Seng anjai marhoru na porsaya in.

5. Sabou do uhurhu, Jesus ibaen Ham.
Damei ‘pa tuahku do ibere Ham.
Damei ‘pa tuahku do ibere Ham.

6. Marhasoman Jesus gok ma dear-Nin,
bangku pe paondos Ham rosuh-Mu in,
bangku pe paondos Ham rosuh-Mu in.

7. Ambit haganupan do mananda Ham,
tontu sai marrohan do marayak Ham,
tontu sai marrohan do marayak Ham.

8. Ai malas ni uhur na masahit pe,
sai bai na madear do manumpak bei,
sai bai na madear do manumpak bei.

9. Ikawahkon Jesus do hun surga in,
halak na tinobus manisia in,
halak na tinobus manisia in.

10. Holsohmin ganupan iahapkon do,
sai pasonangon-Ni na niain-Ni in,
sai pasonangon-Ni na niain-Ni in.

11. Tatang-tatangon-Ni na porsaya in,
