sai paondoson-Ni bai na sonang in,
sai paondoson-Ni bai na sonang in.

12. Sai marmegah-megah do ijin hape,
Amen, haleluya do dodingni bei,
Amen, haleluya do dodingni bei.

1. Ija do jumpah parsaranan sonai ampakon hasonangan
Sai ganup tikki ‘ge ganup panorang, margantih soluk roh ni paruntolon
Sompong tartawa tapi lang madokah, holsoh marganjang mamingkirhon goluh
Lao mansarihon haganup na hurang, lanjar do lalap lang marhasungkupan

2.Seng jumpah hita in bai goluh, anggo lang roh hita bai Jesus
Gok bai Tuhanta do in haganupan, mambere goluh na marhasungkupan
Anggo sonai bai Jesus ma roh hita, mangindo aha do na porlu banta
Sirsir do Jesus mangurupi hita, asal ma Ia tong parsuhutanta

Sai gati holsohan, ibaen parlajouan in
Ai mardondon do sitaronon roh, margantih soluk do in.
Hu Bamu Tuhan martonggo au, sai tangihon Ham ma au on
Seng adong na boi manogu au, pitah Ham hansa tongon.
Na so panagaman megah uhurhin, dob itangihon Ham au.
Ibalosi Ham do tonggokin, marhitei susian-Mu.
Sai hupuji Ham halani in, layak-Mu tumang hansa in.
Ai sirsir Ham tongtong ijin, patorsahon goluhkon.
Na so panagaman megah uhurhin, dob itangihon Ham au.
Ibalosi Ham do tonggokin, marhitei susian-Mu.

1. Bai pardalanan ni goluhku, ningon do Jesus i lambungku
Golap do tong huidah ge siang ni ari,
Anggo lang Jesus ilambungku manondangi
Ai hataMu Tuhan panondang na totap,
na manondangi uhur na golap
Megah mardalan au, hinsah tunggung jagar,
ai ham manogu au bai dalan na lihar
Bai pardalanan ni goluhku, ningon do Jesus i lambungku
Golap do tong huidah ge siang ni ari,
Anggo lang Jesus ilambungku manondangi

2. ‘Ge pe buei roh parmaraan, seng pala au be sai songgotan
Lombang na bagas buntu-buntu hudalani,
Hubotoh Jesus do tongtong mangkasomani
Ai hataMu Tuhan panondang na totap,
na manondangi uhur na golap
Megah mardalan au, hinsah tunggung jagar,
ai ham manogu au bai dalan na lihar
Ge pe buei roh parmaraan, seng pala au be sai songgotan
Lombang na bagas buntu-buntu hudalani,
Hubotoh Jesus ilambungku mangkasomani

1. Tolong Ham ma o, Tuhan, haganup Kuria-Mu,
na dob loja manaksihon goran-Mu
Pargogohi Ham homa, haganup jabolon-Mu,
manaburhon bonih harajaon-Mu
Roh Ham Tuhan, bastu ma Ham,
ai borat tumang do, sibobanon nami on,
laho pajonamkon horja on.
Pitah kuasa-Mu do, hatundalan na sintong,
ase boi marsaksi hanai on.

2. Sai marabur do tongtong iluh-iluhnami on,
mamingkirhon haganup na masa in.
Gogoh nami seng adong laho patorsahon on,
ningon Ham hasomannami tong ijin.
Roh Ham Tuhan, bastu ma Ham,
ai borat tumang do, sibobanon nami on,
laho pajonamkon hata-Mu.
Pitah kuasa-Mu do, hatundalan na sintong,
ase tarambilan goran-Mu.

Hutatap dompak dolog na gijang,
hunja do holi roh pangurupion?
Hulajou do namin manrumang siou na madaoh,
usih do in manampin logou.
Lanjar do au sonin paimahon na so padan in,
ise do in, boi parsuhutan?

Hape, seng jumpah in i tanoh on,
ai partangisan do ijon,
ningon bani Jesus Tuhan in do hita roh.
Paturut Jesus patorsahon,
Tuhan Ham sortalingku.

Tarolos do au roh nuan Tuhan,
manrogop hu Bamu mangalop gogoh.
Urupi Ham ma au pardousa na boratan on,
ai pitah Ham boi pahampungkon.
Hudingat do tongtong jengesni
pangkopkopon-Mu na matei Ham ibaen dousangku.

Hape, seng jumpah in i tanoh on,
ai partangisan do ijon,
ningon bani Jesus Tuhan in do hita roh.
Paturut Jesus patorsahon,
Tuhan Ham sortalingku.

1. Dob hukawahkon Ia.
Megah tumang uhurhu.
mangidah Anak-Mu.
Roh haluahon humbani Bapa,
songon binagahkon-Mu hinan.

2. Malas tumang uhurhu,
sombuh tumang siholhu,
mangidah Anak-Mu.
Damei manongtong humbai Bapa,
songon binagahkon-Mu hinan.

3. Palopas Ham au misir,
ai domma saud huidah,
haluahonku in.
Na dob sirsir ibahen Tuhan,
songon binagahkon- Mu hinan.

1. Sisada angkula do hita ganupan, ragam ni pagori do hita tongon
Na sombuh bayak dos do in bani Tuhan seng dong ilioi isarihon do tong
Tuhanta do na gabe Hayu anggur, rantingni do hita on hajojor
Jolom ma Jesus ulang ham pandur, ase tabun marbuah na ramos

2. Tanda ni sisada angkula do hita, rap marpangarapan bani goluh on
Nai do bani horja rap marsiurupan, ulang dong na marsidalian ijin
Tuhanta do na gabe hayu anggur, ranting-Ni do hita on hajojor
Jolom ma Jesus ulang ham pandur, ase tabun marbuah na ramos

1. Sai porsan ma silang in, irikhon ma Tuhanta in.
Saksihon ma goran-Nin, songon hata ni Jesus in.
“Na ra manaksihon goran-Ku, saksihonon-Ku do gorannin.
Tapi sagala na marnalang Ahu, parnalangon-Ku do ijin”

2. Pararat ambilan in, bai haganupan jolma in.
Porluhon ma Hata in, ulang mabiar ham ijin.
“Parbiar maningon do magou, ai ihargahon hosah ni in.
Magouan hosah halani goran-Ku, sai na jumpahan do ijin”

3. Parlobei pindahi ma, harajaon ni Naibata.
Dob ai tambahkonon ma, aha na porlu use bam.
Sonai do nini Tuhan Jesus, bani na ra mangkorjahon in.
Martambah-tambah do tong pasu-pasu, janah sai sirnip do ijin.

1. Mantin ni in do hape, padan ni Tuhan Jesus
Pamalas uhur tene, bai ganup na tinobus
Dear tumang padan-Nin, na gabe sijoloman
Patoguh uhur do in bai na marpangarapan
Sai hagolukon ma in baen rudang hajengeson
Ase sonang ham ijin gok Tonduy Hasintongan
Hinalayak-Ni do in pasirsir haluahon
Janah damei uhurmin jumpahan hagoluhan

2. Sai jalo Ham Tuhan in na gabe Siparmahan
Baen hatengeran do in ronsi na ondos padan
Seng habiaran be in pori aha na masa
Ai seng ijin ujungnin, goluh ni na porsaya
Sai hagolukon ma in baen rudang hajengeson
Ase sonang ham ijin gok Tonduy Hasintongan
Hinalayak-Ni do in pasirsir haluahon
Janah damei uhurmin jumpahan hagoluhan

1. Porluhon holong o, hasoman, in do tonah banta humbai Tuhan.
Ase malas uhurta tong bani goluh on, rapkon Tuhanta, i tanoh on.

2. Porluhon damei o, hasoman, in do tanda ni hita susian.
Ase malas uhurta tong bani goluh on, rapkon Tuhanta, i tanoh on.

3. Porluhon hita habasaron, in do tanda na marhaluahon.
Ase malas uhurta tong bani goluh on, rapkon Tuhanta i tanoh on

4. Porluhon hita hapormanon, in do goluh na marhaliharon.
Ase malas uhurta tong bani goluh on, rapkon Tuhanta, i tanoh on.

5. Porluhon hita hadaulaton, in do buah ni haporsayaon.
Ase malas uhurta tong bani goluh on, rapkon Tuhanta, i tanoh on.

1. Malas ni uhur na banggal na huambilankon on
Domma tubuh Sipaluah bai hita jolma on
Sangap bani Naibatanta, damei damei damei ma bani jolma
Malas uhur ni Naibatanta, bai hita jolma on

2.Ai saborngin on do poltak bintang bai na golap in
Na lao palihar na golap bani uhurta in
Sangap bani Naibatanta, damei damei damei ma bani jolma
Malas uhur ni Naibatanta, bai hita jolma on

3. Jesus do pardomuanta sinuruh ni Naibata.
Pasalosei ganup dosa ni hita haganup
Sangap bani Naibatanta, damei damei damei ma bani jolma
Malas uhur ni Naibatanta, bai hita jolma on

4. Sai sondangi ma uhurhu, Jesus, ham do Tuhankin.
‘Se marparulihan ahu bai partubuh-Mu
Sangap bani Naibatanta, damei damei damei ma bani jolma
Malas uhur ni Naibatanta, bai hita jolma on

5.Malas ni uhur na banggal, sai sogopi uhurhin.
Ase dihut au pabanggal Goran na Mapansing in.
Sangap bani Naibatanta, damei damei damei ma bani jolma
Malas uhur ni Naibatanta, bai hita jolma on

1. Sihol do uhur nami Tuhan
Pajumpah bohi pakonni Ham
:,: Sai roh ma Ham sonari Tuhan!
Podahi Ham hanami

2. Sipangindoannami nuan.
Sorapi uhurnami Tuhan.
:,; Sai roh ma Ham sonari Tuhan!
Podahi Ham hanami.

3. Ai Ham do na margogoh tongon.
Lao patorsahon hanami on.
:,: Sai roh ma Ham sonari Tuhan!
Podahi Ham hanami.

4. Halani ai sai ondos Bamu.
Baen Ham hanami susian-Mu.
:,: Sai roh ma Ham sonari Tuhan!
Podahi Ham hanami.

5. Uhur sipambalosi Bamu.
Lao mangidangi kuria-Mu.
:,; Sai roh ma Ham sonari Tuhan!
Podahi Ham hanami.

1. Sihol do uhurhu patimbulhon Ham Jahowa,
na pagoluhkon au pardousa
Sanggah na hudilo, goran-Mu lao mangurupi,
sirsir do Ham roh mambalosi
Itogu Ham do, au humbai lombang bagas,
in ma ianan hagolapan
Sai boban Ham ma au hu nagoriatas,
ase tongtong marhasonangan

2. Ganupan musuhku, seng ilopas Ham marmegah,
manangkut au baen jabolonni
Ipatudu Ham do, au bai dalan na gok tuah,
tongtong do Ham mangkasomani.
Itogu Ham do, au humbai lombang bagas,
in ma ianan hagolapan
Sai bobahon Ham ma au hu nagoriatas,
ase tongtong marhasonangan.

3. Ham do patorsahon, pardalanan ni goluhku,
ase ulang ahu tarbador
Ham do parlingodan, dolog batu baen gantarhu,
ase boi au marmalas uhur
Itogu Ham do, au humbai lombang bagas,
in ma ianan hagolapan
Sai boban Ham ma au hu nagori atas,
ase tongtong marhasonangan

1. Ija do jumpah ianan na sonang
ulang holsohan jajat do na hurang
Pitah bai Jesus do jumpah na sonang
parsuhutanta na totap jonam

2. Seng tulakon-Ni hita na roh Bani,
asal ma ra ham! Irikkon bokas-Ni.
Na porlu bam isarihon do ijin,
pindo ma sai na bereon-Ni in

3. Halani in ma roh hita bai Tuhan,
ulang ham sangsi bai ganup hata-Ni.
Pasu-pasu-Ni sirnip do tong ijin,
porsaya ma! Bereon-Ni do hubam

1. Pitah Ham Tuhan, hatundalan na toguh.
Humbai ganup paruntolon na itanoh on.
Bani haganup pardalanan, pitah Ham panjaga na gogoh.
Ondos ma Tuhan, hanai on nuan, ‘se torsa sadokah goluh on.

2. Tonduy Na Pansing, bere Ham bannami on.
Sai useihon Ham bai uhurnami ‘se sintong
Ase dong pargogoh manlawan, kuasa ni dunia na bajan
Ondos ma Tuhan, hanai on nuan, ‘se torsa sadokah goluh on.

3. Bohi pe minar, megah tong halani Ham.
‘Ge gilumbang roh mandorap goluhnami in.
Bani haganup parsahitan, hata-Mu do tambar na gogoh.
Ondos ma Tuhan, hanai on nuan, ‘se torsa sadokah goluh on.

1. Jesus pangarapannami, roh ma Ham bannami on.
Ham pabayu goluh nami, na dob tinobus-Mu on.
Ai iruntas Ham hurungan, na manrahut hanai on.
Sai bobahon Ham ganupan, bangsa na itanoh on.

2. Gabe tinompa na baru, bahen Ham hanami on.
Janah bangsa sipangihut, bani dalan na sintong.
Boi mangidah hamegahon, in ma harajaon-Mu in.
Pargogohi manundalhon, goluh hagolapan in.

1. Parorot Tuhan, ganup hanai on, bai pardalanan nami.
Ham ruti pakon bah tubuh in, bani tanoh na dorging in.
Ham ruti pakon bah tubuh in, bani tanoh na dorging in.

2. Parorot Tuhan, ganup hanai on, bani sitarononnami.
Ase bohi nami on minar, dohor ma Ham tong namin.
Ase bohi nami on minar, dohor m Ham tong namin.

3. Parorot Tuhan, ganup hanai on, ronsi manlawan na jahat.
Pargogohi Ham ase hinsah, mardalan bai na lihar.
Pargogohi Ham ase hinsah, mardalan bai na lihar.

4. Parorot Tuhan, ganup hanami on, tongtong Ham mamasu-masu.
Tonduy Na Pansing sorapkon Ham, songon bagah-bagah-Mu.
Tonduy Na Pansing sorapkon Ham, songon bagah-bagah-Mu.

1. Siang do sinalsal ni Panondang in, Kristus do Panondang
Ganup isondangi, ai ipasada do hita tongtong

2. ‘Ge buei pe ranting ni hayu in, Jesus do bonani
Hita do ranting-Ni, ai ipasada do hita tongtong

3. Na buei talenta holong-Ni do, holong pasadahon
‘Ge buei talenta, ai ipasada do hita tongtong

4. Ai sada do Tonduy Napansing, Tonduy ni Tuhanta.
Ai sada do Tonduy, ai ipasada do hita tongtong.

5. Sisada angkula ni Kristus in, pagori do hita.
Sada pangahapan, ibagas Kristus sada do hita.

1. Marhitei lima ruti, dua dengke,
itamu Jesus do ganupan na roh in.
Dob itonggohon ipartopiki use,
lanjar ibagihon bai sidea in.
Bosur mangan lima ribu halak,
anjaha dong ope suleini
Dob ipatumpu ganup teba-teba,
dong ope sapuluh dua bantei in.

2. Usih sonin do hita titobus-Ni,
na dob porsaya bani Tuhan Jesus in.
Jumpahan goluh na marlobih-lobih,
asal ma tongtong hita bujur ijin.
Roh ma hita! Irikkon Tuhanta,
In ma tong sibalosanta.
Seng ipaturut hita on gayuran,
tong do iparorot ase sai sonang.

1. Bai ganupan sidalananmu in Jesus ma baen hasomanmu
Iparorot do ham tongtong ijin ronsi ondos bai tujuan mu
Ge daoh mahol sidalanamin ulang ham mandolei ijin
Seng boi sotto ham bahenonni in
Asal Jesus baen hasomanmin

2. Sanggah loja ham mamingkiri in bani Jesus patugah in
Na ngayotan ham bani dalanmin ai ibotoh do ganupan in
Ge daoh mahol sidalanamin ulang ham mandolei ijin
Seng boi sotto ham bahenonni in
Asal Jesus baen hasomanmin

1. O Tuhan tiap jam, au mamorluhon Ham.
Ai ham tumang na boi, pasonang uhurhin.
Bai haganup ianan, Ham do hupindahi.
Na roh do au sonari, holong ma Ham.

2. O, Tuhan tiap jam, sai hasomani au.
Ai anggo rapkon Ham, sibolis in pe lao.
Bai haganup ianan, Ham do hupindahi.
Na roh do au sonari, holong ma Ham.

3. O, Tuhan tiap jam, bamu ma goluhkin
Anggo daoh do Ham, soya do ganup in.
Bai haganup ianan, Ham do hupindahi.
Na roh do au sonari, holong ma Ham.

4. O, Tuhan tiap jam, ajari ham ma au.
Ai ningon do totap, hudingat hata-Mu.
Bai haganup ianan, Ham do hupindahi.
Na roh do au sonari, holong ma Ham.

5. O, Tuhan tiap jam, hupuji goran-Mu.
Ai napansing do ham, sai hot ma au Bamu
Bai haganup ianan, Ham do hupindahi.
Na roh do au sonari, holong ma Ham.

1. Satahun use ma surutni, surut homa ma umurhin
Naha do au na sain dokahni, margagan do parlahouhin
Ganda do haporsayaonku ‘ge holong ni ateihu pe
Bai Jesus pakon Naibatangku, ‘pa bai hasomankin ale

2. Porini matei au sonari, huja ma nani tonduyhin?
Bia hasonangan holi nani rap pakon na mapansing in?
Mamuji Naibata do ahu, ibaen holong ni atei Niin
Atap na hona uhum ahu bai apuy na so miloh in

3. Porini matei au sonari, huja ma nani tonduyhin?
Bai hasonangan holi nani rap pakon na mapansing in?
Mamuji Naibata do ahu, ibaen holong atei-Ni in.
Atap na hona uhum ahu bai apuy na so miloh in?

4. Dousangku seng be tarbilangi, hubahen sain dokahni in.
Na dong tarhira be layak ni Tuhanta Jesus na dob in.
Seng ibalaskon Ham, Tuhanku, hu bangku songon dousangkin.
Lumbang do uhur-Mu hu bangku paidah-idah gabeihin.

5. Halani ai ma ‘se hupuji layakMu in sadari on
Ai na patibal ruji-ruji, sai na tarlobih do in tong
O Jesus, na marholong atei! Ningon hupuji goranMu
Ai Ham do hapeni na pandei mambere bangku layakMu

6. Holong ma atei-Mu hu bangku, mangkasomani au ijon.
Paondos Ham hu surga ahu bai parrotap ni hosahkon.
Na ra do ahu mangihutkon hata-Mu, ‘sal manggoluh au.
Malas uhurhu pararathon barita -Mu ronsi daoh

1. Sanggah loja au bani horja, sai marhoih janah tariluh.
Pitah sada do huparsinta, o Tuhan pargogohi Ham au.
Pitah sada do huparsinta, o Tuhan pargogohi Ham au.

2. Age loja pe au marhorja, tong do ahu marpangarapan.
Ai sirsir do ham mardimata, marhiteihon tonduy-Mu Tuhan.
Ai sirsir do ham mardimata, marhiteihon tonduy-Mu Tuhan.

3. Sanggah bai na ngayotan au, roh do Ham mansahap-sahapi.
Tangan-Mu manompuk-nompuk gurungku, mambaen malas uhurhu ijin.
Tangan-Mu manompuk-nompuk gurungku, mambaen malas uhurhu ijin.

4. Pori jumpah pe halojaon, seng be pala au sai songgotan.
Ai tongtong do ham ilambungku, na dob ondos au on hu Bamu.
Ai tongtong do ham ilambungku, na dob ondos au on hu Bamu.

1. Dong sapuluh halak na gadamon Hu-pamalum.
Tapi pitah sada do na roh dob Hu-pamalum.
Ija na siah nari, dob malum Hu-tambari?
Hatani Jesus do on bai jolma in.
Bai na lang ra martarimakasih.

2. Sahalak tumang do pasangapkon Naibatanta.
Manrogop bai Jesus nini do: “Diatei tupa”.
Nini Jesus hu bani, dob malum itambari.
“Jongjong ma ham janah misir ma ham lao,
haporsayaonmu do paluahkon”.

3. Humbai na sapuluh halak ise ma hita?
Na dob mangahapkon ipamalum narobitta.
Roh ma bani Tuhanta, hatahon diatei tupa.
Ulang namin halani domma jorgit.
lupa hita martarimakasih.

1. Roh Ham Tuhan hujon, pareksa ham ma.
Domma lambin dolgih tanoh on.
Seng dong na boi patorsahon, anggo lang Ham.

2. Domma ranggas nuan, talun harangan.
Nai do ‘ge haganup pangisinin,
domma lambin ranggou ganupan in, jangin tumang.

3. Pagolpa Ham Tuhan, hanai ganupan.
Ase jimot ijaga ganup in,
songon tonah-Mu bai mungkahni in, bai jolma in.

judul: Ai Domma Gorsing Omei i Juma
lirik:
1. Ai domma gorsing omei i juma, barah ma pariama
Idilo Tuhan Jesus do hita, ase dihut marhorja
Riap ma hita sauhur mangidangi, bai horja ni Tuhanta
Sirsir do Tuhanta Jesus mambohali, irikkon malah Ia

2. Humpulan na porsaya do juma, hulanan ni Tuhanta
In ma na sihol arahkononta, sada bai pangarapan
Riap ma hita sauhur mangidangi, bai horja ni Tuhanta
Sirsir do Tuhanta Jesus mambohali, irikkon malah Ia

3. Kuria na tong marhasadaon, harosuh ni Tuhanta
Namangahapkon sada tujuan, sonai ’ge sura-sura
Riap ma hita sauhur mangidangi, bai horja ni Tuhanta
Sirsir do Tuhanta Jesus mambohali, irikkon malah Ia

4. Halani in pahoskos pamonting, gombas mabois gogoh
Ulang adong be omei na tading, humpul ma baen hu hobon
Riap ma hita sauhur mangidangi, bai horja ni Tuhanta
Sirsir do Tuhanta Jesus mambohali, irikkon malah Ia

1. Ham Naibata Jahowa Tuhan nami,
ai horja-Mu do tanoh pakon langit
Sai na tarmurmur do kuasa-Mu,
sangap do Goran-Mu i tanoh on

2. Humbai pamangan dakdanak inuman
Inahkon Ham do kuasa hagogohan
Laho pasipkon ganup imbang-Mu
Na lang ra tunduk bani Hata-Mu

3. Anggo huidah langit na mangerbang
Ampakon bulan nai homa ‘ge bintang
in ma panondang mambahen siang
Dear do ijadihon Ham Tuhan

4. Ise ma gakni jolma na tinompa
na sai tongtong idingat Ham o Tuhan
janah harga tumang do in Bamu
Ai aha ma ijin palaron-Mu?

5. Jolma itompa Ham marhasurungan
ianohkon Ham ma sortali hatunggungan
lao mamarentah tinompa-Mu in
Unduk hubani do ganupan in

6. Pinahan ampa binatang harangan
‘ge manuk-manuk na iawang-awan
ampakon dengke na i laut in
Sai Goran-Mu do pasangaponkin

1. Jahowa Naibata do tongon haluahon in
Sigomgom haganup tanoh on, puji ma In

2. Sai ambilankon ma Hata on, ai sintong do in
Ase ganup dunia on, manjalo in

3. Ipargogohi do hita on, mangorjahon in
Asal mardalan hita sintong, bai rosuh-Nin

4. Goluhta pe ijaga do tong, das bai ujungnin
Ronsi ondos ganup hita on, hu surga in

1. Ringgas hita marhorja,
ase torsa marhasonangan goluhta on.
Sirsir do tong Tuhanta
mambere gogoh lao marhorja hubanta on
:,: Nai ma da tongon, Amen sai saud ma sonin.

2. Horjahon ma rosuh-Ni,
ase dapotan pasu-pasu horjamu in.
Manggargar na sinari,
janah tongtong ihasomani Tuhanta in.
:,: Naima da tongon, Amen sai saud ma sonin.

3. Bolag openi juma.
inganan manaburhon bonih ni Hata in.
Ase ringgas ma hita.
janah tongtong mambere buah bai Tuhan in.
:,: Naima da tongon, Amen sai saud ma sonin.

1. Ise do boi tondok bai lampo-Mu?
Ise do boi das hu dolog-Mu?
Pitah hulanan na porsaya in
na dob tinobus ni Jesus ijin

2. Ra mandalankon hapintoron-Mu
Na mangkorjakon ganup titah-Mu
Na dob mangaku gabe anak-Mu
In do na boi tondok bai lappo-Mu

3. Marhabiaran tongtong hu Bamu
mangkasiholhon hasintongan-Mu
na manghargahon pamilihon-Mu
in do na boi das hu bai dolog-Mu

1. Jenges ni in ganup na tinompa,
na jinadihon ni Naibatanta i dunia on
Ibahen marmusim panorang
Milas, udan ari marsuan, idunia on

2. Sirsir do ijadihon panondang,
mataniari ampakon bulan, bai goluhta on.
Jenges do ganupan itompa,
jimot do homa ipatorsa, bai goluhta on.

3. Manggargar do pinahan i harang,
sonai age binatang i talun, iparmahan Ham.
Maratah do dolog harangan,
bah tubuh torsa do mardalan, iramotkon Ham.

1. Naibata timbul goran-Mu, bai ganup tinompa.
Ai banggal tumang holong-Mu, manobus pardousa.
Ganupan munsuh-Mu, na sai engkar Bamu,
talu baenon-Mu, tunduk do sidea.

2. Pitah Ham haposan Tuhan, bani parmaraan.
Ronsi hatengeran homa, ulang sai holsohan.
Tangi do Ham Tuhan, bai na mardilo Ham,
iurupi Ham, monang do sidea.

3. Hundul Ham bai paratas-Mu, manguhum pardousa.
Uhum na sintong baenon-Mu, bai sagala bangsa.
Marmegah-megah ma, ganup parpintor da,
na unduk Bamu, in ma na porsaya.

1. Ma dapot tahun baru on hubangku ibaen Jesus
Ibaen uhur-Ni bangku on layak-Ni ipatorus
Ai Ia do manogu au, ganup na dorsa ipadaoh
na pamalas uhurhu.

2. Halani ai hupuj i Ham, 0 Jesus Naibatangku;
Ai seng ongga marsaran Ham mambaen hatuahonku.
Uhurhu panuratan ni hinabuei ni layak-Mu,
ai Ham do pangurupi.

3. Ai pe anggo hunjon hujan Ham pangunsagahonk on;
Mahansur pe dunia on, martuah au manongtong .
Ai malas uhur pusok pe, manggoluh barang matei pe,
Ham do hatuahonku.

4. Bai Bapa pakon Anak-Nin ampa Tonduy Na Pansing,
ganupan hasangapon in! Ulang be dong na tading!
Sai puji ma pinujingkon, rap ma mangunsagahkon on.
sintong do tong uhur-Ni.

1. Naibata mandilo, ganup hita on,
goranmu idilo, roh ma ham tongon.
Sol useihonon-Ni do, pasu-pasu-Nin.
Goluh ari-ari jalo ham ma in.

2. Humbai hapoltakan, roh sinalsal-Nin.
Das hu hasundutan, siang baenon-Nin.
Gok kuasa-Ni do ganup, tinompa-Ni in.
Ase hita ganup, Puji goran-Nin.

3. Sion na gok sonang, in do hotak-Nin.
Hot do marsinondang, sangap-Ni ijin.
Rap mandoding do ijin, na porsaya in.
Mamuji goran-Ni, sadokah ni in.

1. Na Pansing, Na Pansing, do ham Naibatanami.
Sigomgom haganup tanoh on, Na Pansing do Ham.

2. Na Pansing, Na Pansing, do ham Naibatanami.
Ai domma roh hanami Bamu, jalo Ham ganup.

3. Na Pansing, Na Pansing, do ham Naibatanami.
Sai sasap dousanami ganup, ’se talup Bamu.

4. Na Pansing, Na Pansing, do ham Naibatanami.
Sondangkon Ham bannai bohi-Mu, idop uhur-Mu.

5. Na Pansing, Na Pansing, do ham Naibatanami.
Dompakkon Ham homa bohi-Mu, sorap damei-Mu.

1. Seng adong na dos, songon Ham o Tuhan,
na sai sirsir mangkasomani hanai on.
Pitah Ham tongon, Naibata na sintong,
ganup pambahenan-Mu gok halonganan do.
Sagala bangsa do, na jinadihon-Mu
Marsombah roh hu lobei-Mu
Pasangapkon Ham, ronsi sadokahnin,
timbul janah pansing do goran-Mu ijin.

2. Sai ajarhon Ham, dalan-Mu bangku on,
ase mardalan au bai hasintongan-Mu.
Sai baluti Ham, uhurhon sai tongtong,
ase marhabiaran bani goran-Mu.
Ai pitah Ham Tuhan, na boi haposankin,
bai goluh sidalanankin.
Bokas-Mu nuan, siirikononkin,
na gabe suluh bani pardalanankin.

1. Roh do hanai manrogop Tuhan,
mansopotkon dousanami.
Holong ma Ham bennami Tuhan,
sasap Ham ma in sonari.
Ulang hanai boratan Tuhan,
uhur pe urah mandolei.

2. Ham hansa pangurupi Tuhan,
age aha pe na masa.
Na gabe panungkunan Tuhan,
pasaudkon ganup horja.
Ase ulang tartolsu Tuhan,
bai horja na lang marguna.

3. Patoguh uhurnami Tuhan,
ase hot haporsayaon.
Ulang lopas hanami Tuhan,
simbei bai sirpang ni dalan.
Ase ulang tarlambat Tuhan,
das hanami bai tujuan.

1. Roh do au nuan marsombah hu Bamu Tuhan.
Mansopotkon ganup dousa na borat tumang.
sai holong ma Ham sasap Ham in,
ase ulang au boratan ibaen dousakin.
Holong-Mu tumang, pahampungkon in,
ase au hinsah mardalan hu lambung-Mu in.

2. Gatinan do au manlembang humbai dalan-Mu,
‘ge domma buei ijin hujalo holong-Mu.
Sai holong ma Ham, sasap Ham ma in,
ase ulang au boratan ibaen dousangkin.
Holong-Mu tumang, pahampungkon in,
ase au hinsah mardalan hu lambung-Mu in.

3. Na talup hinan do ahu sigilaan-Mu,
ai gati lansei uhurhu bai aturan-Mu.
Sai holong ma Ham, sasap Ham ma in,
ase ulang au boratan ibaen dousangkin.
Holong-Mu tumang, pahampungkon in,
ase au hinsah mardalan hu lambung-Mu in.

1. Ham Naibatangku i surga paratas-Mu
manrogop au nuan ilobei-Mu.
Tunggung tumang sangap do goran-Mu,
‘ge kuasa-Mu totap do in toguh.

2. Roh au manowod martonggo hu lobei -Mu,
unduk do au mangindo holong-Mu.
Sai sasap Ham dousangku haganup,
useihon Ham ma hu bangku layak-Mu.

3. Ham do hupuji tongtong bani tonggongku,
marhiteihon goran ni Anak-Mu.
Na dob jonam, pansing janah pintor,
Jesus Tuhanku sigomgom hajojor.

1. Anggo jumpah ari hasosakan,
huja do ham marhaporusan?
Seng dong jumpah in i tanoh on.
bani Jesus ma ham roh.
Pitah sada do na hot ijin.
Hata ni Tuhanta in.

2. Anggo loja ham mansari goluh,
huja do ham mangalop gogoh?
‘Ge buei pe diha-dihamu,
sittib do gogohni in.
Pitah sada do na hot bamu.
roh ma ham bai Jesus in.

3. Anggo roh naborit na mardondon,
huja do ham marhasuhutan?
Bai Tuhanta Jesus in ma roh,
ase sonang ham ijin.
Jesus panambari na gogoh,
malum ham bahenon-Nin.

1. Bai parpoltak ni matani ari sogod in.
Tarbogei lurlur doding ni manuk-manuk in.
Megah do tumang mamuji Sipanompa in
Naibata do in, ipuji ijin.
Naibata do in, ipuji ijin.

2. Rap ampa suan-suanan megah do ijin.
Ipaombus-ombus logou manortor ijin.
Pasangapkon Naibata na marmuduhon in.
Megah do ijin, bai sogod ni in.
Megah do ijin, bai sogod ni in.

3. Hita jolma na tarlobih tinompa -Ni in.
Ningon patut hita dihut marmegah ijin.
Mamuji Tuhanta na marorot hita in.
Puji ma tongon, Naibata tongtong.
Puji ma tongon, Naibata tongtong.

1. Bossala sai mandoding, megah tumang.
Na lao salpu ma borngin, gantih siang
Tuhan Raja panggomgom, tanoh on
Hu Bani ma marondos, hita on.

2. Domma lihar panorang, borngin pe lao.
Kuasa ni hagolapan, domma tinop.
Kristus do haliharon, puho ma.
Ai domma italuhon, na golap.

3. Ai ipapuho hita, na modom in.
Dai holong ni Tuhanta, sai jalo in.
Ai Ia do panondang, na lihar.
Oloskon ma mardalan, sai hinsah.

1. Ai bagas ma borngin Tuhan,
loja dagingkon.
Sihol modom marsaran au,
bai podomankin.
Ham ma manamparhon Tuhan,
parmaraan in.
Ase sonang modom au on,
bai saborngin on.

2. Borngin parsaranan ma on,
sinok baen au on.
Ulang lapar modom tongon
mangkar matangkon.
Pangalopan gogoh ma on,
mambahen dirgas.
Ase patar puho au on
horja pe ringgas.

1. Naibata hasomanmin, lao mangkorjahon horjamu
Ia do pangajamanmu, sai patoruh uhurmi
Naibata hasomanmin, Naibata hasomanmin

2. Naibata hasomanmin! Anggo rapkon Naibata do.
seng tarbahen ho be kahou, sai torang do langkahmin.
Naibata hasomanmin! Naibata hasomanmin!

3. Naibata hasomanmin! Sai na saud do horjamu,
sai das do sura-suramu, jan ah sonang uhurmin.
Naibata hasomanmin ! Naibata hasomanmin

1. Bapa, parholong bangku on,
na manramotkon goluhkon.
Age ija pe au tongtong,
ijaga Ham

2. Ai pitah holong-Mu Tuhan,
manjaga au saborngin on.
Tongtong malas do uhurhon,
ijaga Ham.

3. Bapa, ondingi au tongtong,
humbai pangagou na rongom.
Ham hatundalan na sintong,
manjaga au.

4. Ibagas holong-Mu Bapa,
sai iparorot Ham do au.
In pe diatei tupa ma,
ondos Bamu.

judul: Ai Ise ma na Mambotoh in
lirik:
1. Ai ise na mambotoh in! Panorang ujung ni goluhni?
Porini pe roh hamateian in, ai ise ma boi mangambati?
Sada pe lang hita on hape, na boi mambotoh in.
Ase manggoluh age matei pe, totap bai Jesus in.

2. Sai tong marsihaholongan ma, ganup hita bani hasoman.
Ai sada pe lang boi hita torsa, anggo manggoluh bai dirinta.
Sai hagoluhkon Ambilan in, haluahonta in.
Ase manggoluh ‘ge matei ale, bai Jesus hita le.

3. Ganup tanoh on marondos ma, bai Tuhan simada kuasa.
Seng dong hita on na mambotoh da, manggoluh atap matei hita.
Naibata Bapa i surga do, mambotoh hajojor.
Ase manggoluh ‘ge matei tongon, bai Jesus hita on.

1. Sai sirsir ma ham! Paimahon in!
Barah ma roh Tuhanta,
sihol lao mangalop na porsaya.
Sai sirsir ma ham!

2. Sai jaga ma ham! Janah sai tagam!
Gok minak baen suluhmu,
ulang manosal holi magira.
Sai tagam ma ham!

3. Sai puho ma ham!
Bai parroh-Ni in!
Ai seng dong marpanrantam,
usih do songon panangko borngin.
Sai puho ma ham!

4. Marhobas ma ham!
Janah sai gopas!
Ai na maningon saud do,
isi ni padan parroh ni Tuhan.
Marhobas ma ham!

1. Bogei ma, hasoman!
Bogei ma anjaha tonggor ma.
Ai na roh ma Kristus Tuhan in,
domu bai na tarsurat in.
Ai Ia do Raja na sangap in,
gok kuasa-Ni do tanoh in.

2. Bogei ma, hasoman!
Managam ma janah sai sirsir.
Ai sompong parroh ni Tuhan in,
janah seng marpanrattam in.
Ai songon panangko borngin do,
seng na botoh andigan roh.
Bogei ma, hasoman!
Managam ma janah sai sirsir.

1. Barah ma jumpah, parrohni Jesus hu banta on.
Mamboban upah, bai na porsaya i tanoh on
Manggoki padan ijin
Usih do songon panangko borngin parroh-Ni in.
Seng marpanrattam, seng dong na botoh andigan in
Tagam ma parroh-Niin!

2. Totap ma hita, sirsir paimahon parroh-Ni in
Janah puho ma, ungkab uhurta manjalo In
Gok minak baen suluhmin
Ase dear ma, marjaga-jaga hita ijin
Ulang tartunduh, sinok tarpodom bai tingki in
Tagam ma parroh-Ni in!

3. Humbai sonari, porluhon hita ma Hata on
Ai do tandani, na dob sirsir hita na ijon
Paimahon parroh-Ni in
Marpingkir bei ma! Ulang tarlalap i tanoh on
Marhobas bei ma! Ai ningon saud do Hata on
Tagam ma parroh-Ni in!

1. Tongah borngin marnipi au, bai nipingku roh Tuhanta in.
Tor tarsonggot mabiar au, saud ma hape na tarsurat in.
Tuhan roh gok bai hasangapon-Ni, bani ari paruhuman in.
Marhasoman sora ni tarompit, rap ampakon malekat-Ni in.

2. Hitir ma parjahat ijin, i lobei ni paruhuman in.
Mangonai ma bani ijin, panlanggaron na binaen ni in.
Seng adong ijin be panorangni, manolsoli ganup dousa in.
Hamarsikon do ijin rupeini, na ibagas paruhuman in.

3. Tapi anggo parpintor in, sai marmegah, sonang do ijin.
In ma na totap tong sirsir, paima parroh ni Tuhan in.
Hagoluhan do ijin rupeini, pinasirsir ni Tuhanta in.
Sai mandoding rap mamuji-muji, hapansingon ni Goran-Ni in.

1. Ai na bolag tumang do,
dalan hu hamagouan.
Tapi sompit do anggo,
dalan hu hagoluhan.
Dalan na ijahanin do,
sidalananta?

2. Dear simbili hita,
dalan na mambaen kahou.
Age bolag naidah,
in do mambahen magou
Ai seng ijin dalanta,
nini Tuhanta.

3. Age sompit horbangan,
janah mahol bolusan.
Hunjin hita mardalan,
Tuhanta hasomanta.
In do dalan hu surga,
bai na porsaya.

1. Sanggah manabad ma mata ni ari, soluk do roh panorang borngin in.
Sonin ma moru goluh ari-ari, lambin dohor ajalta in.
Adong do goluh na lang marpunsa bai hita na porsaya in.
Hasonanganta ibaen Tuhanta, domma sirsir i surga in.

2. I tanoh on seng jumpah hasonangan, ngayot marhoih loja tumang ijin
Seng do na hot na boi gabe haposan, sittib do panorang ijin.
Adong do goluh na lang marpunsa, bai hita na porsaya in
Hasonanganta ibaen Tuhanta, domma sirsir i surga in.

3. Marhitei goluh na marpangarapan, pindahi ma sortalimin ijin.
Ai tanoh on lao salpu do ganupan, lupahon ma, tundalhon in!
Adong do goluh na lang marpunsa, bai hita na porsaya in
Hasonanganta ibaen Tuhanta, domma sirsir i surga in.

1. Pesta bolon marpariama, ganup hasoman parjuma in
In ma da na ringgas marhorja manuan omei i juma in
Sai marmegah mangolopkon, Goran-Ni Tuhanta in
Parsimada bai hagoluhan, idop ni uhur tumang do in

2. Pesta bolon marpariama, na mangirikhon Tuhanta in
In mada na ringgas marhorja, mangambilankon hata-Ni in
Sai marmegah mangolobkon, Goran-Ni Tuhanta in
Parsimada bai haluahon idop ni uhur tumang do in.

3. Pesta bolon marpariaman, ganup na bujur maruhur in
In ma da na ringgas marhorja, manuan holong bai jolma in
Sai marmegah mangolopkon, Goran-Ni Tuhanta in
Parsimada bai haluahon, idop ni uhur tumang do in.

1. Tonah ni Tuhanta Jesus, hubanta haganup Kuria-Niin.
Hita do suratni Kristus, marsaksi, mangidangi
Hita do suratni Kristus, marsaksi, mangidangi

2. Tonah ni Tuhanta Jesus, hubanta haganup KuriaNiin.
Hita do suluh na gara, panondang bai na golap.
Hita do suluh na gara, panondang bai na golap.

3. Tonah ni Tuhanta Jesus, hubanta haganup KuriaNiin.
Ase hita songon garam, marsaor pakon hasoman.
Ase hita songon garam, marsaor pakon hasoman.

4. Tonah ni Tuhanta Jesus, hubanta haganup KuriaNiin.
Ase marsihaholongan, sirsir marsiurupan.
Ase marsihaholongan, sirsir marsiurupan.

5. Tonah ni Tuhanta Jesus, hubanta haganup KuriaNiin.
Sihol ma songon bah tubuh, palamlam paruhuran.
Sihol ma songon bah tubuh, palamlam paruhuran.

6. Tonah ni Tuhanta Jesus, hubanta haganup KuriaNiin.
Ase parmahan na bujur, parholong bai hulanan.
Ase parmahan na bujur, parholong bai hulanan.

1. Ganupan hasomanku, sai tiru ma hatangku,
mamuji Naibatanta, napagoluhkon hita.

2. Sai songon na mardalan ibolus hita tahun;
Dong do ope hosahta, isambat Naibatanta.

3. Ai na songon inangta, na tong manjaga hita,
sonin homa Tuhanta, ijaga do hosahta.

4. Tongon do, Tuhannami, seng boi jagaonnami,
tongkin pe tonduynami age pamatangnami.

5. Sai goran-Mu pujion, parlayak-Mu ganupan,
mangidah na marguna bannami na mardousa.

6. Tangihon Ham, o Tuhan, balosi pangindoan,
na dob pinadasnami Bamu, o Tuhannami.

7. Ramoti hosahnami age pamatangnami,
padaoh parsahitan ampakon hadorsaon.

8. Tumpaki Ham ma horja i juma ‘pa i huta,
pasungkup bohal nami mangudut hosahnami.

9. Ampa na lobih harga humbai ganupan arta
tumpakhon Ham bannami tonduy-Mu, Tuhannami.

10.Hubai goluh magira, sai boban Ham hanami,
manean na i surga, sadokah ni dokahni.

1. Sonang rapkon Jesus in, rapkon Jesus tongtong, rapkon Jesus tongtong,
Ia Panondang bai na golap in, Rap Jesus daoh biar ijin.
Baritahon Jesus in, pakon hasintonganNin,
janah ulang mabiar ham ijin.

2. Sai ambilankon ma in, ambilankon ma in, ambilankon ma in.
Hasintongan-Ni sahapkon ma in, rap Jesus daoh biar ijin.
Ambilankon Jesus in pakon ganup Hata-Nin,
janah ulang mabiar ham ijin.
Ambilankon Jesus in pakon ganup Hata-Nin,
janah ulang mabiar ham ijin.

3. Dogei ma bokas-Ni in, sai irikhon ma in, sai irikhon ma in.
Janah tangihon dilo-diloNin, rap Jesus daoh biar ijin.
Sai irikhon Jesus in anjaha balosi in,
janah ulang mabiar ham ijin.
Sai irikhon Jesus in anjaha balosi in,
janah ulang mabiar ham ijin.

1. Ambilan ni Tuhan Jesus, sanggah na iatas dolog.
Martuah ma nasombuh tonduy ijin, ai bani do nagori atas.
Martuah ma nasombuh tonduy ijin, ai bani do nagori atas.

2. Ambilan ni Tuhan Jesus, sanggah na iatas dolog.
:,: Martuah ma na pusok uhur ijin, ai siapohon do sidea.

3. Ambilan ni Tuhan Jesus, sanggah na iatas dolog.
:,: Martuah ma na lamlam uhur ijin, sidea do manean tanoh.

4. Ambilan ni Tuhan Jesus, sanggah na iatas dolog.
:,: Martuah na horahan bai na pintor, sipabosuron do sidea.

5. Ambilan ni Tuhan Jesus, sanggah na iatas dolog.
:,: Martuah ma paridop uhur ijin, ai siidopan do sidea.

6. Ambilan ni Tuhan Jesus, sanggah na iatas dolog.
:,: Martuah ma na borsih uhur ijin, ai idahonni Naibatanta.

7. Ambilan ni Tuhan Jesus, sanggah na iatas dolog.
:,: Martuah ma sibahen damei ijin, in do anakni Naibatanta.

8. Ambilan ni Tuhan Jesus, sanggah na iatas dolog.
:,: Martuah nai parburu gepe pintor, ai bani do nagoriatas.

Hinorhonni hamajuonni jaman on,
buei tumang sihalilian in ijon.
Na gati mambahen taruyun hita on
Goluh na lang margagan tongon.
Halani in ulang tarbador hita on,
lansei ni uhur sai padaoh tongon.
Na pindahi ma pangabak na sintong.
Sai irikkon ma Jesus tongtong.

Ibotoh Jesus aha na porlu bamu
asal ma ra hita marondos tong ijin.
Sai isarihon do goluhta haganup,
ronsi das bani ujungni.
Gepe mahol sipata pargoluhon on
anggo bai Jesus na urah do ganup in.
Ai gok kuasa-Ni do ganup tanoh on,
ise pag na mangulangi?

Naha do pangidahmu, pargoluhon ni Kurianta
Naha do pangahapmu, anggo buei na lang marminggu
Naha hasirsironmu, lao mangarahkon hasomanta
Ase ringgas marminggu, ulang lungun gareja in.
Dong alinan ni umpasa, in ma umpasa na marisi podah
Borit dingis na lang marasar, boritan do asar na lang mardingis
Halani ai, ulang lansei uhurta, torsa ma hita markuria.
Sai ringgas bei.
Nai do homa age kuria, na marnaloja pajongjong gareja.
Borit kuria lang margareja, boritan gareja lang markuria
Tuhanta ma tongtong sibalosanta,
ai Ia Raja Gareja.

1. Roh ma ham idilo Jesus,
ipasirsir do pargoluhon
bani pesta malas uhur
sipanganon sonai ‘ge parhiouon.
Roh ma ham idilo Jesus.

2. Eta ma hupartumpuan,
tumpuan ni na porsaya.
Tuhan Jesus na gabe hasuhuton
mangidangi ronsi na pabosurhon.
Eta ma hupartumpuan.

3. Sai tangihon ma Hata-Ni,
in ma baen goluhni tonduy.
Ase ulang jiris itongah dalan,
lanjar himong manrarat gabe tonjan.
Sai tangihon ma Hata-Ni.

1. Roh ma ham na loja na ngayotan na mamorsan silang in
Jalo ma Tonduy Sipangurupi ulih si pasuang gogoh in
Tonduy Napnasing mambere gogoh
Lao mangkorjahon hatani Tuhanta in
Ulang magang ulang sangsi jolom ma poltik ulihta in

2. Roh ma ham na loja na ngayotan, binahen ni dousamin
Jalo ma Ambilan Namadear, ulih si pamalas uhur in
In ma hata ni Tuhanta Jesus
Mambere buah in ma goluh na lihar
Ulang magang ulang sangsi, jolom ma poltik ulihta

3. Roh ma ham na loja na ngayotan binahen ni horja in
Jalo ma Tuhanta Siparmonang, ase ipasonang ham ijin
Ipasirsir do haluahonta, na dob itobus hita humbai dousa in
Ulang magang ulang sangsi, jolom ma poltik ulihta in.

1. Idilo Tuhan Naibatanta, haganup Kuria-Ni in.
Ase manjalo haluahon, nabinoban ni Kristus in
Tangihon ma dilo-dilo-Ni, pateleng ham ma pinggolmu.
Ulang manosal holi dob ni, bai ujung ni panorangmu.

2. Sai jalo ma ganup hata-Ni, sai buhai ma uhurmu.
Sonai homa ge sinondang-Ni, in ma baen gabe suluhmu.
Tangihon ma dilo-dilo-Ni, pateleng ham ma pinggolmu.
Ulang manosal holi dob ni, bai ujung ni panorangmu.

3. Jumpahan ulih do ganupan, nasirsir manangihon in.
Na seng ongga marsidalian, mambalosi Tuhan in.
Tangihon ma dilo-dilo-Ni, pateleng ham ma pinggolmu.
Ulang manosal holi dob ni, bai ujung ni panorangmu.

1. Holong ni Jesus manggomgom ganup kuria
Na patotapkon hasadaonta in.
Damei-Ni in ma manrahut paruhuranta,
Idop ni uhur batar-batarta in
Damei-Ni in ma manrahut paruhuranta,
Idop ni uhur batar-batarta in.

2. Riap ma hita sauhur martangkap tangan,
Ibagas damei na humbai Tuhan in.
Marpangarapan tongtong bai horja ni Tuhan
Hataridahan ni hasintongan-Nin
Marpangarapan tongtong bai horja ni Tuhan
Hataridahan ni hasintongan-Nin

3. Porsaya ma hita bani tonahni Ambilan,
in ma Hatana-Ni Tuhanta Jesus in.
Na sai mangarap bai Tuhan simada tuah,
jumpahan damei sonang totap ijin
Na sai mangarap bai Tuhan simada tuah,
jumpahan damei sonang totap ijin

1. Goluh naipardalanan, buei do sura-sura nuan on.
Ase ulang hiranan, bai Jesus ma suhutkon
Ase hita ganupan! Tuhanta ma ihutkon.

2. Buei sirpang ni dalan, mangondun ase kahou hita on
Ulang sompat manlembang, Tuhanta na ihutkon.
Ase hita ganupan! Tuhanta ma ihutkon.

3. Bai dalan na malandit, ulang sompat targompang ham dalus.
Dear ma na papoltik, manjolom Tuhan Jesus.
Ase hita ganupan! Sai jolom Tuhan Jesus.

4. Adong do banta hondor, tonah ni Tuhan Jesus na jonam.
Ase ulang tarbador, in ma na baen onjolan.
Ase hita ganupan! In ma na baen onjolan.

5. Bai ganup situjuon, jaga hita ase ulang jiris.
Hotma haporsayaon, irikhon Tuhan Jesus.
Ase hita ganupan! Irikhon Tuhan Jesus.

1. Panorang olob-olob, sai roh ma hita ganupan.
Riap ma mangolobkon, Ambilan na ondos banta
Domma lihar nuan ganup i kehen in, ‘ge i huluan.
In ma kuasa ni Hata-Ni Tuhan in, mandilo hita.

2. Hata ni Naibatanta, do mambaen mangasup hita.
Bani sagala horja, na dear bani Tuhanta.
Domma lihar nuan ganup i kehen in, ‘ge i huluan.
In ma kuasa ni Hata-Ni Tuhan in, mandilo hita.

3. Pasuang hosah loja, jalo ma Hata ni Tuhan.
Pasiang paruhuran, sai totap marpangarapan.
Domma lihar nuan ganup i kehen in, ‘ge i huluan.
In ma kuasa ni Hata-Ni Tuhan in, mandilo hita.

4. Pongkut ma manangihon, hata ni siparambilan.
Usihan ni suruhan, mambobai ganup hulanan.
Domma lihar nuan ganup i kehen in, ‘ge i huluan.
In ma kuasa ni Hata-Ni Tuhan in, mandilo hita.

1.Hupuji holong ni atei-Mu, o Tuhan Jesus Rajangkin
Bamu huondoskon tonduyhu, ai do napinindo Mu in
Huhalupahon ma diringku mamingkir holong ni atei-Mu.

2.Sai ipindahi Ham do ahu, Ham pe huhasiholi do.
Itogu uhurMu uhurhu halani ai hubere do.
lpilih Ham hinan tonduyhu, ai pe hupilih Ham Tuhanku.

3.Huahap maningon mar-Tuhan, ningon manggoluh au Bamu.
Seng jumpah au be hagoluhan, anggo seng pinasirsirMu.
Sai Ham na baen parsarananku, sai gok Bamu mando langkahku.

4.Bamu sadokah ni dokahni, au on o Jesus Tuhankin,
Ham ma lah haganup ompungni, gogohku pakon artangkin,
Ai iberehon Ham darohMu, manggalar utang ni dousangku.

5.Ai domma au iparjabolon, sibolis pakon dousangkin.
Diatei ma Ham roh o Tuhan, manaron uhum bangku in-,
Itaron Ham do hamateian, mambahen bangku hagoluhan.

6.O Jesus, GoranMu uhirhon, bagas, torang bai uhurhon-,
Ase tarsurat ilobeihu holongni ateiMu tongtong,
Hatangku ampa parlahouhu, ningon ipuji do GoranMu.

1. Sai na margantih tahun on sonin rosi magira
Jesus baen ham uhurhon ase tongtong marhira
Bai parsurutni ajalhin, janah manimbang ujungnin.

2. Iudut Ham do hosahkin paidah-idah ahu,
Atap na dong do buah ni horja-Mu in hu bangku;
Hape gati hiranan Ham: Buah ni in seng jumpah Ham

3. Ra ma manringis Naibata mangidah parlahouhu;
Ra ihatahon: “Roboh ma haron na so behangku;
Seng ongga ra marbuah in, benaha be marguna in!”

4. Halani kinahuhon-Mu do au, ase manggoloh;
Sonon nimu bai Bapa-Mu: Paturut ma manggoloh;
Haron, holong ma atei-Mu, taun roh pe das uhum-Mu.

5. O Jesus, au urupi ma bai tahun on mamboan,
Buah na ramos, na tama, padaoh ma hamagouan,
Sai Ham pagogoh au tongtong, pasangap Ham bai goluhkon.

1. Nasiam ganup hasoman puji hita Naibata,
na pasirsirhon haluahon banta
Pasangap ma Goran-Ni rap mandoding homa.
Ai isarihon do pargoluhanta.

2. Taurhon ma Hata-Ni ronsi ujung tanoh on,
pararat ma ambilan pasal Jesus.
Tuhanta siparholong bai ganup jolma on,
na dob manobus hita ulang magou.

3. Ulang sonto idalan ‘ge mahol pe dalan in,
sai parhanalom Jesus mangurupi.
Maningon monang do na bujur uhur ijin,
na tong totap mandalankon Hata-Ni.

1. Sada ma ganup na tardilo rup, manjalo Tuhan in.
Mandoding rumbuk, marmegah pe rup, mamuji Goran-Niin
Mandoding rumbuk, marmegah pe rup, mamuji Goran-Niin

2. Suankon ma da, bai uhurta rup, hasadaonta in.
Sauyun homa, manlangkah riap, ibagas Tuhan in.
Sauyun homa, manlangkah ria, ibagas Tuhan in.

3. Sauhur ganup, na porsaya in, ibagas Tuhan in.
Lurlur do ijin, pandodingni in, mamuji Goran-Niin.
Lurlur do ijin, pandodingni in, mamuji Goran-Niin.

4. Totap ma Tuhan, baen Ham hanai on, sada ampakon Ham.
Sai Ham ma tongtong, Parmahan tongon, manjaga hanai on.
Sai Ham ma tongtong, Parmahan tongon, manjaga hanai on.

1. Diatei tupa Bamu, Tuhan Raja Gareja
Sirsir Ham marmudu, hanami pagori-Mu.
Sai urasi Ham Bapa ganup jabolon-Mu
Na gabe parhorja, na gok kuasa-Mu
Sai Tonduy Napansing ma, mambere hapentaron.
Na lao pararatkon, Ambilan na madear.

2. O Tuhan sorapkon ma, jumbalang hapintoran.
Ase iporluhon, horja lao marambilan.
Ningon hu Bamu tumang, tongtong marpangarapan.
Sirsir lao suruhon, toguh bani onjolan.
Pakei Ham sidea in, parugas mangidangi.
Janah na borani, golgol laho marsaksi.

1. Gok bai malas ni uhur do au, mamuji Ham Tuhanku.
Ai ipanalom Ham hape au, marhorja bai pohon-Mu.
Megah, megah uhurhon, mangkorjahon parentah-Mu.
Boi au dirgas nuan on, Ham do na mamasu-masu.

2. Ham do na boi mambaen au talup, hatengeran bai horja.
Ase torsa horjangku ganup, Ham do na mardimata.
Megah, megah uhurhon, mangkorjahon parentah-Mu.
Boi au dirgas nuan on, Ham do na mamasu-masu.

3. Sanggah na loja ngayotan au, roh do Ham mangurupi.
Sai isahap-sahapi Ham au, ulang sompat mandolei.
Megah, megah uhurhon, mangkorjahon parentah-Mu.
Boi au dirgas nuan on, Ham do na mamasu-masu.

4. Huharinggaskon ma haganup, horja na ondos bangku.
Janah sai huhorjahon pongkut, baen sangap ni Goran-Mu.
Megah, megah uhurhon, mangkorjahon parentah-Mu
Boi au dirgas nuan on, Ham do na mamasu-masu.

Nini Titah na palimahon in, Titah ni Naibatanta
Mangingon pasangaponmu do namatorasmu
Ase martuah ho, anjaha dokah ho manggoluh
Bani tanoh na binerehon ni Naibata hu bam!

1. Misir do au, misir do au,
hu gareja lao do au.
Age buei mangambat au,
maningon lao do au.

2. Misir do au, misir do au,
roh pe udan ningon lao.
Bulung ni galuh huparsaong,
maningon lao do au.

3. Misir do au, misir do au,
rap hasoman lao do au.
Mandoding-doding ma ijin,
mamuji Jesus in.

Idopni Uhur-Ni Tuhanta Jesus Kristus.
Pakon holong ni atei ni Naibata Bapa
Ampa parsaoran ni Tonduy Napansing ma
Mangkasomani hita ganupan.
Amen!

1. Jesus ham do sai tongtong, bahen hatindalan nami.
Gen bai tahun baru on, ningon Ham hasoman nami.
Tanda hot do padan in, marhitehon daroh in.

2. Goran pakon hata-Mu ningon dapot do tangaron,
Ban sab kuria-Mu na megah pasirsirhon
Uhur ni gorini in bahen rumah-Mu ma in.

3. Na binahen-Mu ganup pagoluhkon tonduynami,
Huatuahon pe sungkup, sol gomos jolomonnami;
‘Ge bai tahun baru on, gok Bamu hanami on.

4. Sai marhasomankon ham ma hanami lao mardalan,
Bintang pambobai do Ham, sai tongtong bai pardalanan;
Binaen ni sondang-Mu in gabe lihar dalan in.

5. Jesus, ondos ma Bamu ganup panarononnami,
‘Ge sonaha pambaen-Mu sai marguna do bannami.
Rapkon Ham tarapoh rup uhurnami haganup.

1. Jesus tolong Ham hanami bani tahun baru on
Sai pabayu gogoh nami mangirikkon Ham tongtong
Pasu pasu Ham homa, ganup na porsaya da

2. Pingkiranku ‘pa horjangku, sai pasangap Ham ma in
Puho barang modom ahu, Ham tongtong ilambungkin
Laho luar masuk pe, Ham hasomankin use.

3. Tahun parholong ateian ma hubangku tahun on
Ham patorap hasasapan ni dousaku bangku on
Pitah Ham o, Jesuskin, boi manasap dousakin

4. Apoh Ham homa uhurhu, bai holong ni ateiMu
Janah jalo Ham tonggoku ibaen dear layakMu
Sai padaoh Ham dorunmin, ulang pusok uhurhin

5. Sai pagomos Ham uhurhu, manundalhon dousa in
Tambah ma baen Ham ringgasku mangkorjahon Hata in
Ase ulang uhurhon longkot bai dunia on

6. Sai parorot au, Tuhanku, manipat satahun on.
Tangan-Mu manogu au, anggo rotap hosahkon.
‘Se malas uhurhu lao, ia Ham mandilo au.

1. O Raja na sumurung, o Jesus Tuhankin!
Na so ongga marujung harajaon-Mu in.
Sangap janah mandohar, baen Ham goran-Mu in
Ambilan na Madear, sai ratat baen Ham in.

2. Paruhur na hun purba, na roh manombah Ham.
Luahni pe iboba, lao pasangapkon Ham.
Ai bintang-Mu ididah na marsinalsal in.
Paboa domma tubuh Ham Sipatuah in.

3. Ham na marhasangapon hinan, o Tuhankin.
Ai bani habayakon, seng porlu Bamu in.
Seng roh Ham mamorluhon arta ni tanoh on.
Na sahit do itaron Ham i dunia on.

1. Puho ma parbegu-begu, ase lihar nasiam.
Ai na poltak i baboumu, do panondang nasiam.
Hagolapannima in, isondangi Jesus

2. Na ponop na dokahni uhur ni Tuhanta in;
Seng ibotoh tinornpa-Ni dalan hagoluhan in;
Ai na kahou do jojor bani dalan na seor.

3. Salpu do nuan bornginni, binsar do panondang in;
Domma roh haliharon-Ni bani ganup jolma in.
Sai maluah nasiam humbai golap nasiam.

4. Jesus, sondang ni tonduyhu, na palihar haganup.
Sai paubah Ham uhurhu humbai dousa haganup.
Tarik ampa uhurhon bai na lihar in tongtong.

5. Bai parroh-Mu in, Tuhanku, ningon manondangi au.
Ase tong sonang uhurhu ’ge pe laho matei au.
Barang aha pe na roh, sonang au Bamu ondos.

6. Togu Ham au, o Tuhanku das bai ianan-Mu in.
‘Se magira idahonku Ham i hasonangan in.
Pujionku Ham ijin sadokah-dokah ni in.

1. Bintang ni si Jakob in, pinarbagah ni Jahowa
Na porlu uhurhin, pasangapkon Ham baen tanda.
Na huhaholongi Ham, na dob roh hun surga Ham.

2. Omas bereonku Ham, in ma haporsayaonku;
Ai na dob isuan Ham in hu bangku baen ugasku.
Sai pitah ma omaskin ’ge bai sitarononkin.

3. Timus ni hamonan in, misbou hu hotak-Mu, Tuhan.
Songon tonggo mando in, na hu lobei-Mu huboan.
Jalo Ham ma hatangkin mamuji goran-Mu in.

4. Mir huboban hu Bamu, in ma horu ni uhurhu.
Panunsahingkin Bamu marhiteihon ni dousangku.
Sasap Ham ma dousangkin, jab o Ham ma sombahkin

1. Marmalas ni uhur hita, haganupan Kristen in.
Sai na puji ma Tuhanta, na manasap dousa in.
Iarahkon Jesus in, hita hu Kuria in.
Ai i jalo Naibatanta, songon anak pakon hita.

2. Tuhan Jesus do Rajanta na manggomgom haganup;
Pinarorot ni Tuhanta na marhosah haganup.
Anggo lao hata-Ni in, seng tarbaen lang saud in;
Sai na saud do hata-Ni bai ganup manisia-Ni.

3. Nasiam, alo pardousa, anggo sihol do sonang.
Sai tangihon ganup Hata ni Tuhanta in torang.
Sai paubah uhurmu, jalo Jesus in bamu,
Ase saud ma tonduyta, ipaluah humbai dousa.

4. Domma roh na mangapohi kalak parsinumbah in;
Ondos nuan na jengesni bai na mangakuhon in;
Tuhan Jesus Raja in, na dob roh hun surga in,
Sai Tuhanta ma napuji, nairikkon ma hata-Ni

1. Na poltak ma Panondang in,
Na mangatasi haganup, sagala parsinalsal,
Jojor do sondangan-Ni in ihagolapaan haganup,
na sihol bai sinalsal
Jesus uhur-Mu ma ondos paliharhon manisia,
Mangirikkon Naibatanta.

2. Ham do mangapoh uhurhon,
o Raja ni dunia on, sadokah ni goluhku.
Sai Ham ma gabe rupeihon, seng ra be au ijolom on;
Ganup na laho salpu.
Roh Bamu au na sombuh, na porsaya bai hata-Mu do,
panumpak-Mu in hupindo.

3. Tor ise pasonangkon au?
Age huja pe ahu lao, Ham hansa na hubotoh.
Sai paahapkon Ham holong ni atei-Mu bai dorunkin,
masombuh janah bodoh.
Ulang lopas Ham an kahou, ai Ham do mangkopkop ahu,
ningon Ham do jolomanku.

4. Uhurhu pe malas tumang,
Mangidah Jesus na roh in, mamboban hagoluhan.
Sai Ham ma pujionku tong, sadokah au i tanoh on,
age pe dob ibabou.
Sangap, sangap bai goran-Mu, Ham Rajangku; hudodingkon,
hatunggungon-Mu o Tuhan!

1. Sada do hansa surang-surangku bai ganup dunia on.
Seng anjai lang malas uhurhu anggo jumpah au ma on
Sihol sai ingaton ni uhurhu na binaen ni Jesus bai tonduyhu
Sanggah pinorsan-Ni in haganup dousangkin.

2. Ningon Ia do tongtong ingaton sanggah na tarpaku in.
Bai parsilang in igantungkon, sai madaurus daroh-Nin.
Ai mangkopkop au parah horah-Ni, ase dihut au gabe upah-Ni;
Ikawahkon do au on, ihatahon: ”Domma dob”

3. O Jesusku, pagolpa ahu bai dousangku, hu Bamu;
Sanggah bai na golap ope ahu, sai lumbang do uhur-Mu.
Ai dokah Ham mangindahi ahu, ase ulang magou au na kahou;
Ham manaron marsik in, lao manobus tonduyhin.

4. Gok Bamu ma au, ale Tuhanku, janah Ham ma rupeihin.
Amen, rokamhon Ham ma bangku, goran-Mu bai uhurhin.
Rosuh-Mu na mando sungkunonku bai ganup na lao horjahononku.
In ma parpadanankin hu bamu, o Jesuskin.

1. Ganupan na tinompa roh nasiam manatap,
hagoluhanmu on.
Gantung bani parsilang manaron hamateian,
Sol ingatonmu in tongtong.

2. Pareksa ma badan-Ni, sab daroh angkula-Ni,
Turak hadogas-Nin
Mangongkap parhosah-Ni, manaron parborit-Ni,
Marmor ganup angkula-Nin.

3. Aha do manginsonoh Bamu, sibere tuah,
bai hajolmaon in?
Seng ongga Ham mardousa songon hanami jolma;
Bamu seng ongga masa in.

4. Au on ronsi dousangku, seng targorani ahu,
Ibahen bueni in.
In do pinorsan-Mu ijin, ale Tuhanku,
Marsipal Ham halani in.

5. Tarima kasih ningku Bamu na pala matei
Lao pagoluhkon au.
Tong ma paruhuranku, na masik bunuhonku,
Sai gok Bamu na mando au.

6. Ham na mangkatariluh, ’ge daroh-Mu manirei
Ronsi pandorak-Mu.
In ma parhiteianku, au on anggo lao matei,
Hu surga i lobei-Mu.

1. Ham do ipuji uhurhon Jahowa Tuhankin
Huambilankon do tongtong, ganup binaen-Mu in

2. Hubotoh Ham do bona ni na dear haganup
Ibere Ham buei hunjin bannami haganup

3. Ai aha ma na dong hinan bannai na sombuh on.
Ganup ibere Ham hinan, o Naibata tongon.

4. Ai Ham do na margogoh in, sitompa haganup.
Ham do na pagoluhkon in, marmuduhon ganup.

5. Bai langit na marganjang in, na herbang songon kaen
Marribu-ribu bintang in, tor ise ma mambaen.

6. Ai ise na malayak in, manonggor hita on
Na mangarbahi juma in, pagoluh haganup.

7. Gok omei ganup hobon in, humbani ise da.
Ampa ganup panganon in, lang humbai Naibata.

8. O Naibata, Ham do bayak, sibere hanai on
Ai Ham do na tongtong layak, manumpak jolma on.

9. Ihata Ham pe hanai on, halani dousa in.
Irik do holong-Mu tongtong, mangidah ganup in.

10. Ai anggo pusok uhurhin, halani dousangkin
Urah do mulak uhur-Mu, manasap salahkin.

11. Ham do mangapoh haganup, na pusok uhur in
Iapus Ham do haganup, iluh-iluh ni in.

12. Sai ihirahon Ham hape bani dunia on.
Bai daging pakon tonduy pe, itongos Ham tongtong.

13. Ale tonduyhu hope da, sai ulang ho jornok.
Hatundalanmu Naibata, sitompa haganup.

14. Seng ongga salah Naibata, bai ginomgom-Ni in.
Ibahen barang aha da, dear do ujung nin.

15. Paturut Naibata gelah patorsa langkahmin.
Ase tongtong sonang ho lah, timbul ‘pa tuahmin.

1. Bai pusok ni uhurhu halani dousakin
Pagolpa Ham ma ahu bai parmetei-Mu in
Bai hayu na marsilang in,
igalar ham utangku halani daroh-Mu

2. Tama longang uhurhu mamingkir hata on;
Pangkopkop-Mu, Tuhanku, hubai pardousa on.
Ai hosah ni Anak-Ni in
Ibere Naibatangku manobus tonduyhin.
3. Tor aha pangkorhon ni dosusaku bangku on?
Ai holong ni atei-Ni paluah ahu on.
Ibahen dob matei Jesuskin
Seng be habiaranku nagori toruh in.

4. Aima ase pujion ma Ham, o Jesuskin.
Mardingat na tinaron bai parmatei-Mu in.
Mardingat pandoruh-Mu in
Ronsi ganup na marsik tinaron-Mu ijin.

5. In ma mangojurhon uhurhu, ase tong
Manrotap hajahaton hunbagas uhurhon.
Ulang huhalupahon be,
Ngalut-Mu in, o Tuhan, age santongkin pe.

6. Tolongi Ham au, Tuhan manaron na ijon.
Ganupan pananggungan na roh hu bangku on.
Bai ganup paruntolon in,
Urupi Ham au Tuhan, maniru Ham tongtong.

7. Sai sihol usihanku binaen-Mu bangku on.
Bai ganup hasomanku, urupi Ham au on.
Marholong bai hasomankin,
’se ulang mamparbuat holong ni uhurhin.

8. Sai sonang do uhurhu halani ugah-Mu.
Bai rotap ni hosahku mardingat daroh-Mu!
Tenger uhurhu hu Bamu,
Pamasuk Ham ma ahu mangidah bohi-Mu.

1. O, Ulu na sab daroh ibaen ugah-Mu in
Humbani janggar-janggar duri parsilang in
O ulu hatunggungon hinan sihilapMu
Itaron Ham madorun; manombah au Bamu

2. Ham parsinalsal bohi, tarsulur sangap-Mu.
Ai mase ma marposi sab tijur huyum-Mu?
Ai aha ma halani ’se gombur mata-Mu?
Na miloh sinalsalsi, dob rotap hosah-Mu.

3. Au on talup, o Tuhan manaron sisonin
Dousangku do iporsan Ham na tarsilang in
Sai tonggor Ham, o Tuhan, au na ilobei-Mu
Anjaha patuduhkon hu bangku layak-Mu

4. Ai Ham do Siparmahan, ai pinarmahan-Mu.;
Sai Ham do harorohan, goluhku hun Bamu.
Sai ham ma rohoponku mardingat daroh-Mu.
Sai Ham do jolomoanku mardingat ugah-Mu.

5. Malas tumang uhurhu janah sonang tumang
Mardingat pangkopkop-Mu hu bangku na hinan
Lang be huhabiari sonari dousangkin
‘Ge matei au sonari martuah au ijin

6.Tarima kasih ningku Bamu, ale Tuhan.
Parmatei-Mu, Tuhanku mambaen au sonang.
Ai daroh-Mu madurus, halani dousangkin.
Sai jalo au o Jesus, bani parmateihin.

7. Sanggah tadingkononku na idunia on.
Ijin, ale Tuhanku, dapotkon Ham au on!
Bai na gobir uhurhu manrotap hosahkin.
Sai jalo Ham tonduyhy bani parmateihin.

8. Sai Ham parlingodanku, Pangapoh uhurhin.
Bai rotap ni hosahku, bani parmateihin.
Ijin ma dingatonku ganup tinaron-Mu.
Na timbul do tuahku ibaen parmatei-Mu.

1. Jesus ham do bah tubuhku, sipagoluh tonduyhin.
Ai ibunuh Ham munsuhku in ma hamateian in.
Ham manaron hamagouan, pasirsirhon hagoluhan.
Halanin hupuji Ham sai marribu hali tong.

2. Habileion, apas-apas, lansat ampa tijur pe.
Tali pakon tompa-tompas itaronkon Ham hape.
Paluahkon au na sombuh humbai tangan ni sibolis.
Halanin hupuji Ham sai marribu hali tong.

3. Bai gurung-Mu in do ugah sanggah hona lonsing in;
Parmalum ni ganup ugah na bai uhurhin do in.
Ham do jadi binuraan, au dapotan hagoluhan.
Halanin hupuji Ham sai marribu hali tong.

4. Ranting duri igotongkon bani simanjujung-Mu.
Janah tolong ilipatkon lao pamarsik ulu-Mu.
In itaron Ham Tuhanku marhalahon ni dousangku.
Halanin hupuji Ham sai marribu hali tong.

5. Tangan ampakon nahei-Mu itolpusi paku in.
Jadi tiris ma daroh-Mu roh humbai parsilang in.
In bah tubuh paridian bangku jolma na boritan.
Halanin hupuji Ham sai marribu hali tong.

6. Goran-Mu ma sai hupuji halani boritni in.
Daroh-Mu pe huhargai na binerehon-Mu in.
Pasaloseihon dousanami, ulang magou be hanami.
Ham hupuji halanin sadokah-dokahni in.

1. O Jesusku bai ugah-Mu , roh manombah uhurhon
Sai tarpuji, sai tarpuji na pamalum uhurhon

2.Bai nahei Mu o Jesusku , solsolanku diringkon
Tangisanku tinaron-Mu ibaen hajahatonkin

3. Bai tangan-Mu ma tonduyhu sanggah bai parmateihin
Hu lambung-Mu, o Tuhanku, alop tinobus-Mu in.

1. Laho do Biri-biri in mamorsan ganup dousa,
ni haganupan jolma in ase maluah hita.
Iporsan naboritta in, ibere do diri-Ni in,
Hu tangan ni pamunuh,
itaron do na sahit in, das bai na rotap hosah-Niin
nini “Sai porsanon-Ku”

2. Ai anggo Biri-biri in, in ma huan-huanku,
Na paluahkon tonduyhin, isuruh Naibataku.
Ai nini dompak Anak-Nin: ”Parayak ma pardousa in
Na dob pinapaanku, banggal do ringiskin,
Tapi tarbaen mahombun in pangkorhon ni daroh-Mu”

3. Na ra do au alo Bapa, humbai gok ni uhurhu.
Padas rosuh-Mu, ‘ge huja, ai gok Bamu tumang do”.
O holong ni atei-Mu in, tor aha ma usihannin
na songon Ham margogoh? Ibere Naibata hape,
Anak-Ni lao manaron in, taronon ni na magou.

4. Sadokah na manggoluh au, sai Jesus ingatonku;
Ganup na bangku binaen-Mu, hata-Mu pasaudonku.
Ham sol haholonganku do, jaha ihutkononku do
Bai dalan hagoluhan. Ningon Bamu namando au,
Manggoluh barang matei au, sai ham do jolomanku.

5. O Tuhan, hinajenges-Mu sihol dodingkononku;
Diringku ma berean-Mu, na lao ondoskononku.
Jesus, sai jalo Ham au on, pasiat Ham pamujingkon
Baen sangap ni goran-Mu. Hu surga in paondos au,
Marhitei-hitei daroh-Mu, intan ni sihilapku.

1. Ambit iuhir bai uhurhu bohi-Mu laho matei Ham
Ambit hudingat, o Tuhan-ku, pangkopkopMu bangku naman
Ai Ham do paluahkon ahu, dousangku do pinorsan-Mu
Ham manambari naboritku, martuah au halanin

2. Sai jalo Ham ma au Tuhanku , baen upah na tinaron-Mu
Sihol ingaton ni uhurhu ganupan nabinahen-Mu
Mangkopkop au pardosa banggal, ibaen holong ni atei-Mu
Halani in tarbaen au sonang lao marayakkon huta-Mu

3.Tarima kasih ma uhurhu Bamu, o Jesus Tuhankin.
Sai tong do ham haholonganku, mardingat hinalayak-Mu.
Sai jolom ham tongtong tanganku, manogu au hu lambung-Mu;
Ijalo Ham tong tonggoku tenger uhurhu halanin.

1. Ija ma nani sorodmin nuan o hamateian?
Ija ma hamonanganmin nuan nagori toruh?
Na talu do hanima le, ai talu do sibolis pe,
Ai italuhon Jesus.

2. Marbois gogoh ulog in, mangimbang Puanglima.
Talu homa do jombutnin, tontong ibaen Tuhanta.
Ambihulni ipagut pe, ai lanjar seng ra monang be,
Marosak do uluni.

3. Manggoluh na dob matei in, tutupan iruntaskon.
Igari do munsuh-Ni in, taban-Ni bobahon.
Tor ise na mangasup be, manlawan Puanglima in,
Na so tarbaen lang monang?

4. Manggoluh do Tuhanta in, ai puho hun tanoman.
Itogu do pagori-Nin hu bani hagoluhan!
Seng tading bai tanoman in, ganupan na porsaya in,
Bai Hata ni Tuhanta.

5. Ai barang ise na bujur paubahkon uhurni.
Na mangondoskon in botul bai Jesus in uhurni.
Ai Jesus do hasomanmin manjal hagoluhan in,
Sadokah ni dokahni.

6. Marmalas uhur hita on bai ari parpuho on;
Ai tuah na i tanoh on, i suraga gok jaloon.
Ijon mangarap do hape, ija pe idahonta bei,
Usih bai Jesus hita.

7. O hamateian, talu ma! Talo homa, sibolis!
Nagori toruh, talu ma, in do na dob tartulis.
Napunji Naibatanta in, ibaen hamonanganta in
Marhitei Tuhan Jesus.

1. Sai na puji ma Tuhanta, hita hajolmaon in.
Ai na puho do Tuhanta humbai hamateian in.
Ipasaud Tuhanta in, ganup lahoan-Ni in.
Pasirsirhon haluahon bai ganupan hajolmaon.

2. Anggo utangni dousangku igalari Jesus in.
In do haporsayaonku bai na tinaron-Nin!
Domma saud titah in,domma miloh ringis in.
Bai na puho in Tuhanta, ondos ma goluh-Ni banta

1. Hatuahon do, hamegahon do parpuhoni Tuhanta in.
Roh Sipagoluh bani pardosa, megah-megah ma uhurta in
Roh Sipagoluh bani pardousa, megah-megah ma uhurta in.

2. Hatuahon do, hamegahon do parpuhoni Tuhanta in.
Monang do Jesus, talu sibolis, megah-megah ma uhurta in
Monang do Jesus, talu sibolis, megah-megah ma uhurta in.

3. Hatuahon do, hamegahon do parpuhoni Tuhanta in
Mungkap do dalan hu hagoluhan, megah-megah ma uhurta in
Mungkap do dalan hu hagoluhan, megah-megah ma uhurta in.

1. Pesta Paskah hartuahon, Pesta Paskah haluahon,
Humbai hamateian in, humbai hamateian in,
Tuhan Jesus paulakkon hagoluhan, hasonangan
Bai ganupan jolma in.

2. Talu ho, nagori toruh,s eng na boi be jolomonmu,
Raja Sipagoluh in, raja Sipagoluh in.
Hamateian, hamagouan seng be pala habiaran;
Domma talu in ganup.

3. Jesus do marhamonangan, Jesus Kristus paulakkon,
Hamegahon damei pe, hamegahon damei pe.
Sai hata-Ni golom hita na prosaya bai Tuhanta,
Na so bulih magou be.

4. Sai na puji ma Tuhanta na pamasuk bai uhurta,
uhur pangarapan in, uhur pangarapan in.
’Ge pe matei hasomanta, sai magira idahonta
Hagahup i surga in.

1. Porini dong maribu hali, paraloling ni sorangkin
Bois ni gogoh inggananni, mamuji Naibatanta in,
Ibaen malasni uhurhin, hinorhon ni pambaen-Ni in.

2. Ai ambit ondos ma sorangku, bai ujung ni dunia on,
sagala jolma arahonku, mamuji Naibata tongtong.
Talup do gok ni uhurhin, hubaen pasangap Tuhan in.

3. Ulang ma modom ho tonduyhu, sai puho ho, sai hehe ma.
Pongkut ma ho bani horjamu, sai puji Tuhan Naibata.
Sai baen ma gok ni pandeimin, laho mamuji Tuhan in.

4. Tarima kasih ma uhurhu, Bamu o Naibata tongtong.
Ibahen dearni layak-Mu, binere-Mu hubangku on.
Ai ipatudu Ham tongtong ganup na porlu bangku on.

5. Hupuji pakon Ham, o Jesus, ibaen parholong ateiMu.
Mardingat darohMu madurus, pakon ganupan layak-Mu.
Mambahen haluahon on, hubai pardousa banggal on.

6. Ham pe homa, Tonduy Napansing, sai jalo Ham ma dodingkon.
Margogoh anjaha matunggung do Ham, mangapoh uhurhon
Ia hubaen na dear in, halani gogoh-Mu do in.

7. Ai ise do mamasu-masu, au on o Naibata, lang Ham?
Pamatang rap pakon tonduyhu, sai iparmudu-mudu Ham
Jaha lumbang uhur-Mu in mangidah pardousaonkin.

8. Sai layakMu do pujionku sadokah na manggoluh au.
Sai Goran-Mu pasangaponku sadokah na marhosah au
Ronsi rotap ni hosahkin, sai pujionku Ham ijin.

9. Sai jalo ma, ale Tuhanku, pamujingkon na hurang in.
Paima das au on hu surga, ianan na gok dear in,
Marlaksa hali ma ijin, dodingkononku Tuhankin.

1. Ale tonduyhu na puho Tuhanmu, domma itaban do nagori toruh.
Megah uhurmu martuah ma ho
Rap pakon Jesus manggoluh ma ho,
Rap pakon Jesus manggoluh ma ho

2. Talu sibolis ibahen Tuhanta, ge hamateian, ge dousa ganupan.
Ihamalaskon uhurta ma in.
Pagoluhon-Ni do hita ganup, pagoluhon-Ni do hita ganup.

3. Bujur ma hita mangimbang dousanta,
janah na baen Jesus in hasomanta
Tenger uhurta bai Tuhanta in,
Pamonangon-Ni do hita ganup, pamonangon-Ni do hita ganup.

1. Haleluya na dodingkon nuan
bai ari parpuhoon ni Tuhan Siparmonang in
Domma puho hape Tuhan,
mandarat humbagas tanoman, ai talu hamagouan in
Dob ma horja-Ni in, ibaen Tuhanta in, Haleluya
Ai domma das bai Tuhan in upah-Ni na tarsulur in.

2. Seng be pala habiaran ni hita on be hamateian,
ai hita pe sai puho do
Sai bujur ma na irikkon Tuhanta in bai paruntolon,
maningon hu lambung-Ni roh
Iboban Jesus in ma hita on ganup, Haleluya
Parmonang in! Sai saud ma in! Binaen ni hagogohon-Mu.

3. Ho panorang parpuhoon, sonaha nani ahaponkon
ni uhur bai panorangmin?
Seng otik malas ni uhur bai parontian ni na sambor,
age ganup na sahit in.
O Jesus togu ma, hanai bai Naibata, bai na sonang
O Rajangkin, Bamu ma au, hu lambung-Mu ma ondos au.

1. Jesus hatengerankin, ham do Tuhan na manggoluh.
In hubotoh, halanin, hupasabou ma uhurhu.
’Ge tarsosak uhurhin mangkirahon ajalhin.

2. Jesus Sipagoluh au, domma puho o tonduyhu.
Ho magira ningon lao bai ianan ni Tuhanmu.
Tor tartading baenon ni ulu ni pagori-Nin?

3. Domu au bai Jesuskin halani pangarapanku.
Ai haporsayaonkin marondolan bai Tuhanku.
Na so bolas sirang be humbai Jesus au hape.

4. Daging ahu! Halanin ningon gabe orbuk ahu.
Hansi pe hubotoh in, seng be pala rusak au.
Ningon suang hosahkin ipaulak Jesus in.

5. Na galek i tanoh on sai margogoh do magira.
Na masombuh in ijon, sai marsangap do magira;
Partonduyon do use, daging on ijin hape.

6. In pe haporluhon ma manundalhon hahisapon.
Sai hombari Naibata, uhur daging in rotapkon.
Sai palongkot uhurmin bai siparayakonmin.

1. Domma talu hamateian ibaen Tuhan Jesus in
Ai manggoluh use Tuhan songon binagahkon Nin
Haleluya, Haleluya domma puho Jesus in.
Haleluya, Haleluya domma puho Jesus in .

2. Roh manorih hu tanoman, parinangon in hujin
Seng ijin be Jesus Tuhan, domma puho in hunjin
Haleluya, Haleluya domma puho Jesus in .
Haleluya, Haleluya domma puho Jesus in .

3. Sai marmegah-megah hita ibaen puho Jesus in
Ai maluah ganup hita humbai hamagouan in
Haleluya, Haleluya domma puho Jesus in,
Haleluya, Haleluya domma puho Jesus in.

4. Sai na puji ma Tuhanta na marholong atei in
Na pasangap ma lah Ia na maridop uhur in
Haleluya, Haleluya domma puho Jesus in
Haleluya, Haleluya, domma puho Jesus in.

1. Ingatonma sadari on parnaik ni Tuhanta.
Hubai hotak-Ni na tongtong na so tarbaen maseda
Na sombah ma Tuhan ta in, na mulak bai Bapa-Niin
na puji ma lah Ia.

2. Ai domma mungkap dalan in bai halak na porsaya
Lao mammasuki surga in lopas ma na madorsa
Na patut mangonai in bai ganup sipardousa in
na puji ma Tuhanta.

3.Marmegah-megah ho botul bai Jesus in Tuhanta
Paubah uhurmin bujur, ihutkon ma lah Ia
Irikkon ma Hata-Ni in, usihi pambahen-Ni in
sadokah ho manggoluh.

4. Na roh do use Tuhan in bai ari paruhuman.
Idabuh ma parjahat in bai apuy na so miloh.
Tapi halak parpintor in, ganup haholongan-Niin,
hu surga bahenon-Ni.

5. O Jesus, Tuhan nami on, holong ma ham bennami!
Kawahkon Ham hanami on bai paruntolonnami.
Patoguh Ham hanami on, tumpaki Ham monang ijon
torus ronsi magira.

1. Domma naik ham lao hu surga in,
Tuhan Jesus, Rajanami, ham do irikonon nami.
Pambobai in lao hu surga in.

2. Mahol dalan on, togu hanai on.
Ase bansah ma hanami humbai ganup munsuh nami.
Na itanoh on, togu Ham tongtong.

3. Suruh Tonduy-Mu jadi gantih-Mu.
Roh hubagas uhurnami mambobai tonduynami.
Lao hu surga in bai na sonang in.

1. O Puanglima na tongon sonon ijia ari on
lao naik Ham marsangap
Domma dob horja-Mu ijon
na pasirsirhon haganup manghopkop hajolmaon
Sabou, sangou do Ham mulak
Bai paratas na maharga husiamun ni Jahowa

2. Marlaksa-laksa Serapim, marribu-ribu Herubim,
mamuji Ham na pantas.
Ibaen na pinadomu-Mu, ganupan manisia in,
bai Naibata i atas.
puji, Jesus Kristus, haganupan ilahoi,
tinonahkonni Bapa-Ni.

3. 0 Jesus Ham do uluni ganupan na porsaya in;
pagori do hanami.
Ham hagoluhannami on, Ham hasonangannami on,
Ham hagogohonnami.
Ojur, juljul uhurnami tong sirsir lao mamberehon
Hu Bamu ma hasangapon

4. Sai togu Ham uhurhu tong, urupi Ham ma an tongtong
mangimbang ganup dousa.
Papansing Ham ma uhurhin, torsa baen Ham parlahouhin,
sonai age parhata.
Tombei Ham ma hauhuron na bayu ‘se monang ahu,
lao, mangimbang ganup dousa.

5. Patorsa langkah nami bei, papintor dalan nami pe,
marayak hasonangan.
O Jesus. sai kawahkon on, ai lang tarbaen i tanoh on
mardamei barang sonang.
Sonang, monang, i lambung-Mu in hanami on magira,
anggo domma das hu surga.

1. Marhitei olob-olob do naik Tuhan in.
Ganupan do marolob Malekat in ijin.
Ringgas ma hita pe napuji ma Tuhanta
Mogah ma pandodingta, marolob-olob bei.

2. Na mulak bai hotak-Ni Tuhanta in.
Hu lambung ni bapa-Ni i siamun-Ni in.
Ganup parsurga in manombah na dob monang,
Tuhanta in na sonang, na roh hun tanoh in.

3. Ihutkon ma bokas ni dalan ni Tuhan on;
Ai hita pe homani sol lao hu surga in.
Tangkas na ingat ma, ai anggo Jesus, Tuhan
Sai tong do ipadalan nidok ni Naibata.

4. Itaron hamateian mangkopkop hita on,
Paturei pardalanan na roh hun tanoh on.
Manogu hita rap hu lambung ni Bapa-Ni;
Ijin ma, ilobei-Ni sol ondos haganup.

5. Ai pe ringgas ma hita manlawan dousa in.
Manrotap uhur daging ’ge hajahaton in.
Na hasiholi bei Tuhanta na i surga;
Ai Ia do na pantas, in ma usihi bei.

6. O Jesus, Tuhannami, holong ma atei-Mu.
Sai sasap dousanami paluah hanai on.
Pamasuk hanai rup, bai goluh simagira.
Se boi hanami dihut mamuji Ham tongtong.

1. Tarik gomos bamu darngos pasihol uhur nami.
Hu surga in, ianan-Mu, o Jesus Tuhannami.

2. Togu tongtong hanai Bamu, bai dalan-Mu hu surga.
Anggo seng in baloson-Mu, sai saud do au maseda.

3. Tapi torang, seng anjai lang urupan-Mu hanami.
Pinorsan-Mu do dousa in mambahen goluhnami.

4. Halani in sai gok Bamu, sai sol irikononku.
do hata-Mu ’ge langkah-Mu sadokahni goluhku.

5. Tarik gomos Bamu darngos au hu nagori atas.
Ase ijin pujionkin parlayak-Mu o Jesus.

1. Jesus Kristus in do Raja, ipabangkit Naibatanta
Manggomgomi hajojor, manggomgomi hajojor,
Janah ganup hajolmaon, ningon Bani do mar Tuhan
Iakuhon in botul, iakuhon in botul

2. Haganupan Malekat-Ni manlioti paratas-Ni.
Pasangapkon Raja in, Pasangapkon Raja in.
Na humbabou markuasa harajaon i tanohta.
Mangirikkon titah-Nin, mangirikkon titah-Nin

3. Naibatanta sahalak-Si, Jesus hansa usihan-Ni.
Anak pakon Bapa in, Anak pakon Bapa in.
Seng be morot paratas-Ni, seng marsibar be goluh-Ni.
Tong do gomgoman-Ni in, tong do gomgoman-Ni in.

4. Jesus do na pasirsirhon, ‘se maluah hajolmaon.
Halani daroh-Ni in, halani daroh-Ni in.
Domma ondos hagoluhan sai tongtong do hatuahon.
Bai diri ni Jesus in, bai diri ni Jesus in.

5. Haganupan na mardousa, na boratan ‘ge na loja.
Marhalahon sahit in, marhalahon sahit in.
Sai ondoskon uhurnima pakon hinolsohkonnima.
Bai Tuhanta Jesus in, bai Tuhanta Jesus in.

6. Nasiam ganup na pansing pakon haganup parpintor
Na dob gabe monang in, na dob gabe monang in
Neta ma marsorap-sorap, ase rap marolob-olob
Puji ma Tuhanta inb, puji ma Tuhanta in.

7. Dihut au sihol marsombah sol marolob bai Tuhanta
Lao mamuji Jesus in, lao mamuji Jesus in
Jesus Kristus in do Raja, ningon tunduk ganup hita
Mangirikkon Raja in, mangirikkon Raja in.

1. O Jesus hasomani hanami haganup
Pasada uhur nami, ase torang ganup

2. Seng boi dalanonnami sanlangkah na torsa:
Dob Ham hasomannami. torang age huja.

3. Sai Ham hasomannami, ase ganup jorei.
Ganupan munsuhnami, mangunduk talu bei.

4. Songon hasomannami, urupi hanai on:
Bai hasosakannami, na i dunia on.

5. Parorot Ham hanami, na dob jabolon-Mu
Ampa hasomannami, sai ondos ma Bamu.

6. Dob bois bohalnami, holong ma atei-Mu.
Pamasuk tonduy nami, bai hasonangan-Mu.

7. Sai tenger do uhurhu mardingat Hata-Mu;
Ham do hatundalanku, bai paruhuman-Mu.

judul: Ham o Tonduy Na Pansing in
lirik:
1. Ham o Tonduy Napansing in, masuki uhurnami bei,
papansing uhurnami.
Ham sondang na hun surga in, sondangi uhurnami bei,
pamalas uhurnami.
Ase masa gabe Hata-Mu ma dalanonkon nami,
uhur-Mu ma hubannami.

2. Ham do sibere uhur in, bai ganup na porsaya in,
tumpaki uhurnami.
Patoguh uhurnami rup, padas Ham hata-Mu ganup,
hu bani huannami.
Sai totap ma Ham mambere paruhuron, hatuahon,
Goran-Mu do sipujion.

3. Pagogoh Ham hanami rup, lao mangirikkon hata-Mu,
bai pardalanannami.
Haporsayaonnami pe tambahi Ham, ge naha pe,
na sahit roh bannami.
Pingkir, tungkir, dirinami, sai pasonang uhurnami,
ase monang tong hanami.

4. Puhoi uhurnami on ‘se tong gogoh hanami on,
manlawan dousanami.
Patenger uhurnami on, sonai `ge tonduynami on,
bai parlawanannami.
Goki, goki uhurnami ‘se ringgas ma mangambungkon,
rayoh pakon halengahon.

5. Ham batu gingging na toguh, na patut palas na botul,
pajonam uhurnami.
Bai Hata hasintongan in, sai ulang dong na kahou in,
‘ge sada pe hanami.
Bere uhur na toguh janah bujur laho mamuji,
Jesus Kristus Tuhannami.

6. Pangapoh na hun surga in, sogopi uhumami in,
sai damei-Mu bannami.
Papandei Ham hanami on, mamboan uhur na holong,
hubai hasomannami.
Ulang masa tinggil, domdom, ase tong sonang hanami,
mandalani dalannami.

7. Papansing Ham hanami on, sai uras Ham hanami tong,
sorapi uhurnami.
Tanggali hun bannami on, pamisir dousa in tongtong,
na mangagou hanami.
Togu tonduy bai na sonang, na i babou, mangarapkon,
hagoluhan hasonangan.

1. Ham Pangapoh na tarlobih, Tonduy ni Tuhan in, uhurhin masuki.
Iparbagah Tuhan nami, ningon Ham do na roh mangajar hanami.

2. Seng adong pambotohnami na dear, na torang humbai dirinami.
Ningon Ham do manondangi uhur ni jolma in, jaha manorangi.

3. Ham isombah uhurnami, holong atei-Mu in pabayu hanami.
Lambin sah ma patandahon jangin ni dousa in, sai tong tundalonkon.

4. Sai patorang Ham bannami marsik ni Jesus in, haluahonnami.
Sai pintor ma uhurnami binaen ni daroh ni Jesus Tuhannami.

5. Sai pabujur uhurnami, uhur ni daging in talu baenonnami.
Ulang sirang be hanami halani dousa in humbai Tuhannami.

6. Anggo barah ma manostos, togu rup haganup hu nagori atas.
Tumpak Ham hanami monang das hubai surga in haganupan sonang.

1. Masuki Ham uhurhu, iankon Ham ma au on.
O Tonduy Naibatangku, pasonang Ham au on.
Na marparatas Ham rap pakon Naibatangku
Sonin Jesus Tuhanku, sai pujionku Ham.

2. Paahap Ham patuduh hu bangku gogoh-Mu.
Pargogoh-Mu paluah au humbai dousangkin.
Urasi uhurhon, papansing Ham tonduyhu
Ai sihol balosanku do hata-Mu tongtong.

3. Seng dong marhapintoron pardousa au hinan;
Seng dong marhasonangan na matei au hinan.
Bai pandidion in bonam ganup dousangku.
Bai daroh ni Tuhanku, pansing au halanin.

4. O Tonduy sipodahkon tonggongku na sintong.
Ham do na tinangihon ni Bapa in tongtong.
Ajari Ham au on mambaen pangindoanku.
Humbai gok ni uhurhu, tangihon Ham au on.

5. Sibere hamegahon pamalas uhurhon;
Puhoi janah patugah au niapohan-Mu.
Hotop itungkir Ham ganup parsitaronon.
Sibere hasonangan bai na marhoru in.

6. Sai goki Ham uhurhu bai holong atei-Mu.
Padear Ham hatangku, bani hasomankin.
Daoh pamisir Ham ingorhu, halateion.
Patimbul hadameion, na sambor padaoh Ham.

7. Gok baen haporsayaon bai uhurnami bei;
Panumpak-Mu gandahon bai artanami pe
Pamisir tonduy in, tonduy si panlanglangi
Na tong roh manunsahi uhur na dear in.

8. Paringgas uhurnami manlawan dousa in
Tambahi gogohnami bai pangujian in.
Sai tolong Ham tongtong manlawan munsuhnami
Sai ulang isorapi dunia uhurhon.

9. Sai baen parlahounami hombar bai uhur-Mu
Anggo rob ajalnami, bai na lao matei in
Padaoh Ham bajannin, pamalas uhurnami.
Manjalo rupeinami bai harajaon-Mu.

judul: Roh ma Ham, Tonduy Na Pansing
lirik:
1. Roh ma Ham Tonduy na Pansing, Naibatangku na botul,
Uhurnami ma papansing, mambalosi Ham bujur.
Sai sondangi Ham totap uhurnami na golap.

2. Bere Ham bai uhurnami hapentaran hun Bamu.
Ase ibotoh hanami marpangabak hu Bamu;
Humbai hakahouon pe Ham ma paluahkon bei.

3. Patuduhkon Ham bannami dalan hagoluhan in;
Sai pabayu uhurnami, sai padaoh dousa in.
Sai pagogoh au tongtong bani na madear on.

4. Pabotohkon Ham bannami na niambilankon-Mu:
Naibata do Bapanami, hanai on do anak-Nin.
Daroh niuseihon in, do ondolan lao hujin.

5. Roh pe sitarononnami na sahit mandondon in.
Ulang holi Tuhannami roh daohni halanin.
Bere Ham pangapoh in roh hubagas uhurhin.

6. Ia jumpah ajalnami, pabotohkon Ham torang.
Hinalayak-Mu bannami, ‘se hanami saud sonang.
Tampei ma sortali in bani ulunami in.

1. Ale Tuhan Bapa nami na marholong atei in.
Suruh Ham ma hu bannami Tonduy-Mu Na Pansing in.
Ham pabayu tonduyhin jadi rumah-Mu ma in.
Tangar Ham pangindoanku holong atei-Mu hu bangku.

2. Lang adong hagoluhanku anggo seng roh Tonduy-Mu,
marianan bai uhurhu ase tong margogoh au.
Mandalankon hata-Mu manghormati goran-Mu;
Ai tongtong golap uhurhu Ham hansa palihar ahu.

3. Ai hunja ma tandaonku Ham, o Jesus Tuhankin?
Tor ija ma akuonku: Ham do hagoluhankin,
anggo seng roh Tonduy in paliharhon uhurhin?
Ai pe Ham ma marsuruhsi ase roh bangku hata-Ni.

4. Arta na tongtong manahan sadokah ni dokahnin.
Ningon Ham do manlayakkon janah mamberehon in.
Ham Tonduy ni Naibata, halanin tangihon Ham.
Hata ni pangindoanku sai masuki Ham uhurhu.

5. Patandahon Ham hu bangku dousa na ponop homa.
In do tong manirang ahu humbai Tuhan Naibata.
Ase husopothon in bai Tuhanku Jesus in,
gabe au marhaluahon humbai dousa haganupan.

6. Tonduy, ajar Ham ma ahu janah togu-togu ma,
ase ahu marparlahou na mapansing na tama.
Sai pabujur uhurhon manangihon Ham tongtong.
Ase anggo roh ajalhu, tangan-Mu manogu ahu.

1. Ham o Tonduy Namapansing in sai masuki Ham bai uhurhin
Pasorap holong atei-Mu ampakon hinalayak-Mu.
Roh bangku baen Ham Sondang-Mu sonai bai jolma haganup
Ai sol patumpuon-Mu rup bai Tuhan Jesus jolma ganup.
Haleluya! Haleluya.

2. O Sondang na mapansing in masuki hauhuronkin!
Lihar baen Ham pingkirankon mananda holong-Mu tongtong.
Daoh ma habodohon in sinabur ni sibolis in;
Hubaen ma Tuhan Jesus in ihutan ampa pangguruankin.
Haleluya! Haleluya!

3. Pangapoh na tarsulur in! Tarapoh baen Ham uhurhin.
Manaron na masahit tong sadokah au i tanoh on.
Mangkopkop goran-Mu tongtong sai pargogohi Ham au tong,
Manlawan ganup munsuhkin ai sihol surga masukankin.
Haleluya! Haleluya!

1. Baen ma gaba-gaba ampa bunga-bunga pakon kahul in.
Ai nuan ma jumpah ari pardingatan Pentakoste in.
Bai parrohni Tonduy in, in ma Tonduy Napansing, roh bai Kuria-Ni.

2. Jalo ma parroh-Ni ai holong atei-Ni roh hu banta on;
Ase sondangan-Ni siang bahenon-Ni paruhuron tong.
Sai jalohon Ia da ase lao ganup holsohmu `ge sitarononmu.

3. Tonduy pangapohi na roh mangajari susian-Ni in.
Jesus Kristus Tuhan roh ma Ham patorang langkahkin tongtong.
Bai na lao hu surga au pargogohi ase monang das hubai na sonang.

1. Sai sogopi Ham au on, Ham alo Tonduy Napansing
Sai ajari Ham tongtong, baen sonang janah papansing
Sai martonggo bai Jahowa, na tong manangihon hata

2. Tonduy hasangapon in, sai iankon uhurnami
Tumpak Ham hanami bei, lao manlawan musuhnami
‘Se maluah ma hanami, humbai hadosaonnami

3. Jolma manisia da, sai sondangi Ham ganupan
Ase roh ganup homa, hubai Jesus Kristus Tuhan
Rarat ma harajaonNi, bai ganup manisia-Ni

1. Halelu ya! Na puji ma salak-Si hansa Naibata, sitompa haganupan.
Ai holong ni atei-Ni in, gogoh-Ni pe jombut do in sai ningon dodingkonon.

2. Haleluya! Na puji ma na susur humbai Naibata, in do hansa Anak-Ni.
Na matei ibaen dousa in, paturei hagoluhan in, ningon dodingkononta.

3. Haleluya! Na puji ma panondang humbai Naibata, sinuruh bai uhurta.
Pangapoh na taranjuk in, ihutan pangajari in, ningon dodingkononta.

4. Haleluya! Bai Bapa in, bai Anak ampa Tonduy in, puji-pujiannami.
Bamu ma hamogahan in, ampa hamuliaon in, ibere uhurnami.

1. Patimbul bei ma tunggung ni Jahowa Naibatanta
Baen ma tarimakasih in bai Naibata Bapanta
Ai ganup hasombuhon in
amampakon na mabajan in ilawan Naibatanta.

2. Tongtong sombahonnami Ham lao paondos pujian.
Ibaen na igomgomi Ham kuria-Mu ganupan.
Na so marsibar gogoh-Mu,
sai ningon saud do uhur-Mu ase dong tuahnami.

3. O Jesus, ai sahalak Ham do Anak ni Jahowa.
Na magou ipagoluh Ham maronti hata rana.
O Jesus Tuhannami on,
tangihon sombahnami on urupi Ham hanami.

4. Ham o Tonduy Na Pansing in parorot Ham ganupan,
pinaluah ni Kristus in marhitei sitaronon!
Sai olat ma sibolis in,
padaoh hadorsaon in patenger uhurnami.

1. Tuhan Naibata, sai parorot Ham.
Daging pakon tonduy nami, in ma na pinindo nami
sai pajorgit Ham, ganup hanai on

2. Jesus Ham botul, Raja na bujur
Ham paluah tonduy nami, humbai pardousaonnami:
Pasu Ham tongtong ganup hanai on.

3. Sai papansing Ham, janah rajai Ham,
Ham ale Tonduy Napansing, uhurnai gabe napansing,
Bani Hata-Mu, songon nidok-Mu.

1. Haleluya! Na puji ma Bapanta Tuhan Naibata
ibaen dear layak-Ni.
Sai tong ringgas ma hita bei pasangap Naibatanta in
ibaen holong atei-Ni.
Sangap, sangap, hagogohon, hatoguhon, hapentaran
bai Bapanta na i babou.

2. Haleluya! Bai Jesus in sombahkon hasangapon in,
age puji-pujian.
Ibere do daroh-Ni in manguras ganup hita on
managang hapintoron.
Nai ma, nai ma, pardomunta bai Tuhanta `ge tunggung-Ni,
sorap do bai kuria-Ni.

3. Haleluya! Bai Tonduy in Na Pansing na matunggung in,
ondos tarima kasih.
Ai ambit lang do Tonduy in bai uhur na so toguh in,
ganupan ningon latih.
Tuah, tuah ma rupeita bahenon-Ni sadokahni,
i lobei ni Naibatanta.

4. Haleluya! Sai ganda ma biarta bani Naibata
‘pa holong ni ateita.
Sai in mangojur hita on pasangap Naibata tongtong,
marhitei parlahouta.
Puji, puji Naibata Sitolu sada do Tuhanta,
hasangapon ondos Bani.

1. Naibata do na margoran Bapa, Anak, Tonduy in.
Siilohkon paringoran na manirang tonduyhin
humbai hagoluhan in, na tagang i surga in.
Na dob sasap do dousangku i baen holong-Mu hubangku.

2. Sai iankon Ham uhurhu sai papansing Ham ma au.
Ase tong bujur hatangku ulang be martadung au.
Haganup na dorsa pe tanggal ma humbangku le.
Ham ipuji, o Tuhanku, hata ampa parlahouhu.

3. Ham manolong hasomanku in ma bangsanami in.
Haganupan sindohorhu `ge na so hutanda in.
Togu Ham ganupan in marhitei ambilan in.
Ase dihut in maluah humbai bolis ampa dousa.

4. Harajaon-Mu pararat bai ganup dunia on.
Hata-Mu pe marhidorat bai ganupan tanoh on.
Ganup nilinggoman ni hamateian ope in.
Togu Ham bai hasiangan ase dapot hasonangan.

1. Totap padanku bai Jahowa binaen ni Jesus Tuhankin.
Ai hutadingkon na madousa hujalo pandidion in.
Malas uhurhu halanin, sadokah ni dokah ni in.

2. Iparhioui Naibatangku tonduyhu na madorsa in.
Paboa sasap ma dousangku au hinaholongan-Ni in.
Malas uhurhu halanin sadokah ni dokahni in.

3. Ai anggo hiou ni tonduyhu, daroh ni Tuhan Jesus do;
In do binere ni Tuhanku manguras ahu pakon ho
Malas uhurhu halanin sadokah ni dokahni in.

4. Isuruh Naibata Jahowa Tonduy-Ni mangajari au,
Manlawan ganup na madorsa anjanah papansingkon au.
Malas uhurhu halanin sadokah ni dokahni in.

5. Domma isurat Naibatangku goranku bai buku-Ni in,
Tanda na dob totap rupeihu na i nagori atas in.
Malas uhurhu halanin sadokah ni dokahni in.

1. Seng hapalang be megahku ibaen na tardidi in.
Mambur do hadorsaonku ampa ganup dousangkin.
na mananda arta na majenges na maharga,
lobih humbai tuahkin sadokah dokahni in.

2. Sahei ma ganup utangku ibaen na tardidi au:
Uhum seng habiaranku ikahui Jesus au.
Ai daroh-Ni huparidi sanggah masuk au tardidi.
Jadi malas uhurhin sadokah-dokahni in.

3. Bolis, tangar ma hatangku: domma tardidi au.
Ningon ho taluhononku anggo ujionmu au.
Seng be dong ahamu bangku Jesus do ompungni au.
Jadi malas uhurhin sadokah-dokahni in.
